Short Respones

Web Chat Responses

Abandoned / Misc / Newchatlanded / Noresponse / Closedbycm

=========================================================

Dear Customer, please take a moment to review the attached PDF file for information.Kindly attached

Muaziz Saarif, aap details attached PDF file sy check kar skty hain.

=========================================================

Dear Customer, Assalam o Alikum, how may I help you?

Dear Customer, Welcome to Alfa Chat. I am your Personal Banking Assistance. How May I help you?

Dear Customer, Hello.

Dear Customer, Hi.

============================================================================

Dear Customer, I am good. Hope you're doing great too.

Dear Customer, Kheriat se, umeed hai ap bhi kheriat se hounge.

===================================================================================

Dear Customer, Walaikum Assalam.

Dear Customer, how may I assist you?

 Dear Customer, How May I help you?

================================================================================

Dear Customer, kindly clarify/elaborate your query. What would you like to know?

Dear Customer, Apna sawal wazeh kijiye. Kya janna chahengy ap?

================================================================================

Dear Customer, what would you like to know?

Dear Customer, Kya janna chahengy ap?

==========================================================

Dear Customer, what would you like to know about it?

Dear Customer, Kindly tafseel batain. Kya janna cha rahy hain?

===============================================================

Dear Customer, anything else I can assist with you?

Dear Customer, Mazeed kuch janna chahain gey?

===============================================================

 Dear Customer, are you connected with us?

Mauziz Sarif, kia ap hamare sath connected hain?

===============================================================

Dear Customer, we're sorry for the inconvenience caused.

Dear Customer, Takleef ke lye bhut mazrat chahengy.

===========================================================================

Dear Customer, Kindly confirm against which product would you like to register alfa app? Account/debit card/credit card/wallet or Roshan Digital Account?

Dear Customer, App kis product ke against registration karr rahe hain? Account/debit card/credit card/orbits /wallet ya phir Roshan Digital Account?

===================================================================================

Dear Customer, can you please confirm against which product have you registered with? Account/debit card/credit card/wallet or Roshan Digital Account?

Dear Customer, Apne register kis product se kya tha alfa app pe? Account/debit card ya phir credit card/orbits /wallet ya Roshan Digital Account?

=========================================================================================

Dear customer, would you please confirm the error that you are facing?

Dear Customer, Kya issue/ error arha hai?

=========================================================================================

Dear Customer, kindly clarify your query.

Dear Customer, Apna sawal wazeh kijiye.

=================================================================

Dear Customer, Kindly call at our helpline in order to confirm the status in this regard. Our helpline number is 021/042 111 225 111.

Dear Customer, Ap hamari helpline par raabta kar ke is bary men status confirm kijiye. Hamari helpline number hai 021/042 111 225 111.

=========================================================================================

Dear Customer, have you called our helpline in order to confirm the status in this regard?

Dear Customer, Apny is hawaly sy hamari helpline par call kar k status confirm kiya abi tak?

 

Claim lodgment Process

If Customer amount has debited & want to lodged claim:

Reverse TAT for 24hours

English Script

Dear Customer, if your amount has been debited then it will be auto reversed within 24 hours. However, if it is not reversed then you can call at our helpline 021/042-111-225-111 to lodge your request/claim.

Reverse TAT for 24hours Passed

Dear Customer, if your amount has been debited and still not received at other end then you can call at our helpline 021-111-225-111 to lodge your request/claim.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, agar apki amount debit ho chuki hai to 24 hours mei auto reversed hojaygi. Agar amount reversed na ho to ap hamari helpline 021 111 225 111 par call kar ke claim lodge karwa skty hain.

Muaziz Saarif, agar apki amount debit ho chuki hai aur other end par receive nahi hoi to ap hamari helpline 021 111 225 111 par call kar ke claim lodge karwa skty hain.

WhatsApp Banking Channel

WhatsApp Banking Channel is another step towards customer convenience, whereby, using WhatsApp platform customer can get information related to Banking Services, Roshan Digital Account, Premier Banking, Loans, Offers and Discounts or Chat with Live Agent.

We acknowledge that we do not take any responsibility of Third Party Services, since third party services that is WhatsApp are used and Installed with the mutual Understanding of Customer and Third Party Application.

If any harm is provided by, the third party is a complete responsibility of user and Third Party Agreement of Usage.

Bank Alfalah only provide general information over WhatsApp. This is the reason Bank Alfalah never ask customer to provide complete information Over WhatsApp Banking Channel.

If customer opt for account balance over whatsapp BAFL never, ask complete information rather incomplete information such as last four digit of account number and year of birth.

The possibilities of risk eliminate since no complete information is available.

Please share the given below message as a response if customer want to enquire about the data protection

English Script

Dear Customer, Bank Alfalah credit card activation via WhatsApp BOT is highly secure & protected; your provided details to BOT are fully secured with no manual involvement.  

Urdu Script

Mauziz Sarif, Bank Alfalah kay credit card ki activation WhatsApp BOT kay zariye mukammal tor par secure aur protected hai, apki faraham karda maloomat BOT ko mukammal tarikay say secure hai bagair kisi ki involvement kay. 

Internet Banking  

Account Statements through Internet Banking/Alfa/helpline/Branch:

English Script

Dear Customer, you can get your bank account statement up to 1 year through internet banking or by calling our helpline 042/021 111 225 111. Additionally, you can get up to 3 years of your bank account statement through the Alfa App. However, if you need statements for a period longer than 3 years, you will need to visit your parent branch/any nearest branch for assistance.

Below mentioned are the procedures through Internet Banking & Alfa App:

Through Internet Banking:

Dear Customer, to access your bank account statement through internet banking, kindly follow these steps:

·         Login to internet banking account

·         Go to the "Overview" section

·         Click on the "Account Statement" option

·         Enter the date range for the statement you wish to view

·         Click on "Generate" to view or download the statement

Through Alfa App:

Dear Customer, to access your bank account statement through the Alfa App, kindly follow these steps:

·         Login to Alfa App

·         Click on the "Quick Balance" feature

·         Click on "View Statement"

·         Select the date range for the statement you wish to view

·         Click on "Send Now" to view or download the statement

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, ap apny bank account ki statement internet banking aur helpline 042/021-111-225-111 par call kar ke sy hasil kar skty hain up to 1 year aur up to 3 years ap Alfa App sy ley skty hain. Mazeed agar ap 3 years sy ziyada ki account statement lena chahty hain tou apni parent branch visit kjiye.

Internet Banking & Alfa App ke through process nechy mentioned hain:

Internet banking ke zariye

·         Internet banking mein login karein

·         Overview mein jayein

·         Account Statement par click karein

·         Date enter karein

·         Generate par click karein

Alfa App ke zariye

Alfa mein login kijiye

-      Quick Balance par click kijiye

-      View Statement par click kijiye

-      Date select kijiye

-      Send Now par click kijiye

Internet Banking Canned

Value Added Service

Banker’s Cheque

English Script

Dear Customer, to request a Banker's Cheque, please follow these steps:

·         Log in to Internet Banking account

·         Go to the "Value Added Service" section

·         Select "Banker's Cheque" option

·         Enter the account number from which the funds will be debited

·         Enter the desired amount for the Banker's Cheque

·         Enter any required details such as the payee's name and address

·         Review the details and click on "Proceed" to submit the request for the Banker's Cheque

Urdu Script

Agar Banker's Cheque ki request karnay ke lye, neechay diye gaye steps follow karein:

-      Apnay Internet Banking account mein login karein

-      "Value Added Service" section par jayein

-      "Banker's Cheque" option select karein

-      Funds debit karnay kay liye account number enter karein

-      Banker's Cheque ki desired amount enter karein

-      Agar payee ka naam aur address zaroori hain toh woh details enter karein

-      Details ko review karein aur "Proceed" par click kar ke Banker's Cheque ki request submit kar dein

Mini Statement Check via Internet Banking:

·         Dear Customer, you can check your account mini statement through internet banking, please follow the steps below:

·         Login Internet Banking by visit below mentioned link:

https://netbanking.bankalfalah.com/ib/Login.aspx#

·         You will see mini Statement is reflecting beside QR Code. 

·         Click on “Mini Statement”

·         Select the desired dates from calendar

·         You may be able to have the mini statement accordingly. 

 

Cheque Book Management

English Script

Dear Customer, to apply your cheque boook, please follow these steps:

·         Log in to Internet Banking account

·         Go to the "Value Added Service" section

·         Select "Cheque Management" option

·         Select the number of cheques per page you wish to view. Options available are 25, 50, and 100

·         Click on "Submit" to view the list of cheques

Urdu Script

Aap chequebook ke liye apply karna chahte hain, is ke liye neechay diye gaye steps follow karein:

-      Internet Banking account mein login karein

-      "Value Added Service" section mein jayein

-      "Cheque Management" option select karein

-      Apnay pasandeeda number of cheques per page select karein. Options available hain 25, 50 aur 100.

-      "Submit" par click karein cheques ki list dekhne ke liye

CNIC Expiry Update

English Script

Dear Customer, to update your CNIC expiry date, please follow these steps:

·         Log in to Internet Banking account

·         Go to the "Value Added Services" section

·         Select "CNIC Expiry Update" option

·         Follow the prompts and enter the required information, such as your updated CNIC expiry date

·         Submit the updated information

Urdu Script

CNIC expiry date update karne ke liye neechay diye gaye steps follow karein:

-      Internet Banking account mein login karein

-      "Value Added Services" section mein jayein

-      "CNIC Expiry Update" option select karein

-      Prompt messages ko follow karein aur zaroori details jaise updated CNIC expiry date enter karein

-      Update ki gayi information submit karein

Withholding Tax (Statement/Certificate)

English Script

Dear Customer, to request a statement or certificate, please follow these steps:

·         Log in to Internet Banking account.

·         Go to the "Value Added Services" section.

·         Select the account for which you want to view the statement or certificate.

·         Select the date range for which you want to view the statement or certificate.

·         Select the type of statement or certificate you require, such as account statement, balance certificate, etc

·         Click on "Generate" to view or download the statement or certificate.

Urdu Script

Aap statement ya certificate ki request karna chahte hain, is ke liye neechay diye gaye steps follow karein:

-      Internet Banking account mein login karein

-      "Value Added Services" section mein jayein

-      Account select karein jis kay liye aap statement ya WHT Tax certificate dekhna chahte hain

-      Date range select karein jis kay dauran aap statement ya WHT Tax certificate dekhna chahte hain

-      Required statement ya certificate ki type select karein, jaise account statement, balance certificate, etc.

-      "Generate" par click kar ke statement ya WHT Tax certificate ko view ya download karein

 

Credit Card Withholding Tax (Statement/Certificate)

English Script

Dear Customer, to request a Credit Card statement or certificate, please follow these steps:

·         Log in to internet banking

·         Navigate to the "Value Added Services" section

·         Select your credit card

·         Select a date range for which you want to view your statement or generate a certificate

·         Select the specific statement or certificate you wish to generate

·         Generate the statement or certificate

Urdu Script

Credit Card statement ya Withholding Tax certificate ki request karna chahte hain, is ke liye neechay diye gaye steps follow karein:

-      Internet banking account mein login karein

-      "Value Added Services" section mein jayein

-      Apna Credit Card select karein

-      Date range select karein jis kay dauran aap statement ya Withholding Tax certificate certificate dekhna chahte hain

-      Seleect karain woh specific statement ya Withholding Tax certificate certificate jo aap generate karna chahte hain

-      Statement ya Withholding Tax certificate certificate generate karein

Account Maintenance Certificate

English Script

Dear Customer, to request an Account Maintenance Certificate through internet banking, you would need to:

·         Log in to your internet banking account

·         Navigate to the "Value Added Services" section

·         Select the account for which you want the Account Maintenance Certificate

·         Be aware that there will be a fee of PKR 225 (+16%FED) charged from your account for the certificate.

·         Click on "Generate" to view or download the Account Maintenance Certificate

Urdu Script

Account Maintenance Certificate ki request karna chahte hain to, is ke liye neechay diye gaye steps follow karein:

-      Internet banking account mein login karein

-      "Value Added Services" section mein jayein

-      Aisa account select karein jis kay liye aap Account Maintenance Certificate chahte hain

-      Certificate ke liye aap kay account se PKR 225 (+16%FED) charge kiya jayega

-      "Generate" par click karein taake Account Maintenance Certificate dekh saken ya download kar saken

 

Own Account

English Script

Dear Customer, to make a transfer from one account to another (Own Account) through internet banking:

·         Log in to your internet banking account

·         Navigate to the "Services" or "Transfer" section

·         Select the option for "My Account" or "Own Account" transfer

·         Select the "From Account" (the account you want to transfer from)

·         Select the "To Account" (the account you want to transfer to)

·         Enter the amount you want to transfer

·         Click on "Proceed" to initiate the transfer

Urdu Script

Internet Banking ke through ek account sy dusary account (own account) mein fund transfer karny ke lye nechy diye steps follow karain:

-      Apne internet banking ke account mein login karein

-      "Services" ya "Transfer" section karein

-      "My Account" ya "Own Account" ka option select karain

-      "From Account" (jis se aap funds transfer krna chahty hain) select karain

-      "To Account" (jis mein aap funds transfer krna chahty hain) select karain

-      Jo amount transfer krna chahty hain wo enter karain

-      Transfer initiate karny ke lye "Proceed" par click karein

Inter Branch

English Script

Dear Customer, to make an Inter Branch transfer through internet banking:

·         Log in to your internet banking account

·         Navigate to the "Services" or "Transfer" section

·         Select the option for "Inter Branch" transfer

·         Select the "From Account" (the account you want to transfer from)

·         Select the "To Account" (the account you want to transfer to)

·         Enter the account number of the beneficiary account

·         Enter the title of the beneficiary account

·         Enter the amount you want to transfer

·         Enter the Otac# (One Time Authorization Code)

·         Click on "Proceed" to initiate the transfer

Urdu Script

Internet banking ke zariye Inter Branch Transfer karne ke liye, nechy mentioned tareeqay ka istemaal karen:

-      Apne internet banking account mein login karen

-      "Services" ya "Transfer" section mein jayen

-      "Inter Branch" transfer ke liye option select karen

-      "From Account" (jis account se aap paise bhejna chahte hain) ko select karain

-      "To Account" (jis account mein aap paise bhejna chahte hain) ko select karain

-      Beneficiary account ka number enter karen

-      Beneficiary account ka title enter karen

-      Transfer karnay kay liye amount enter karen

-      Otac# (One Time Authorization Code) enter karen

-      Transfer karne kay liye "Proceed" par click karen

Inter Bank

English Script

Dear Customer, to make an Inter Bank transfer through internet banking:

·         Log in to your internet banking account

·         Navigate to the "Services" or "Transfer" section

·         Select the option for "Inter Bank" transfer

·         Select the "From Account" (the account you want to transfer from)

·         Select "Other Bank" option

·         Enter the amount you want to transfer

·         Enter the name of the bank of the beneficiary account

·         Enter the account number of the beneficiary account

·         Enter the title of the beneficiary account

·         Enter the Otac# (One Time Authorization Code)

·         Click on "Proceed" to initiate the transfer

 

Urdu Script

Internet banking ke zariye Inter Bank Transfer karne ke liye, nechy mentioned tareeqay ka istemaal karen:

-      Apne internet banking account mein login karen

-      "Services" ya "Transfer" section mein jayen

-      "Inter Bank" transfer ke liye option select karen

-      "From Account" (jis account se aap paise bhejna chahte hain) ko select karen

-      "Other Bank" option ko select karen

-      Transfer karnay kay liye amount enter Karen

-      Beneficiary account ki bank ka naam enter karen

-      Beneficiary account ka number enter karen

-      Beneficiary account ka title enter karen

-      Otac# (One Time Authorization Code) enter karen

-      Transfer karne kay liye "Proceed" par click karen

Payees

English Script

Dear Customer, to make a transfer to a Payee through internet banking:

·         Log in to your internet banking account

·         Navigate to the "Services" or "Payees" section

·         Select the Payee you want to transfer to

·         Click on "Transfer" button

·         Select the account you want to transfer from

·         Enter the payee information

·         Enter the amount you want to transfer

·         Click on "Proceed" to initiate the transfer

 

Urdu Script

Internet banking ke zariye Payee ko Transfer karne ke liye, nechy mentioned tareeqay ka istemaal karen:

-      Apne internet banking account mein login karen

-      "Services" ya "Payees" section mein jayen

-      Payee ko select karen jisay aap paise bhejna chahte hain

-      "Transfer" button par click karen

-      Account select karain jisay aap paise se bhejna chahte hain

-      Payee select karain

-      Transfer karnay kay liye amount enter karen

-      Transfer karne kay liye "Proceed" par click karen

 

Utility Payments

English Script

Dear Customer, to make a utility payment through internet banking:

·         Log in to your internet banking account

·         Navigate to the "Utility" section

·         Select the company you want to pay to

·         Click on "Fetch Details" to retrieve the account information

·         Enter the required details such as account number, amount, and other relevant information

·         Click on "Proceed" to initiate the payment

Urdu Script

Internet banking ke zariye Utility Bill ki payment ke liye, nechy mentioned tareeqay ka istemaal karen:

-      Apne internet banking account mein login karen

-      "Utility" section mein jayen

-      Company ko selcet karen jisay aap pay karna chahte hain

-      Account ki maloomaat hasil karnay kay liye "Fetch Details" par click karen

-      Account number, amount, aur dusri zaroori maloomaat enter karen

-      Pay karne kay liye "Proceed" par click karen

Credit Card Payments

English Script

Dear Customer, to make a credit card payment through internet banking:

·         Log in to your internet banking account

·         Navigate to the "Credit Card" section

·         Select the account you want to transfer from

·         Select the credit card you want to make the payment for

·         Enter the amount you want to pay

·         Click on "Fetch title" to retrieve the credit card account information

·         Click on "Proceed" to initiate the payment

 

Urdu Script

Internet banking ke zariye Credit Card payment kay liye, darj zail tareeqay ka istemaal karen:

-      Apne internet banking account mein login karen

-      "Credit Card" section mein jayen

-      Account ko muntakhib karen jisay aap se transfer karna chahte hain

-      Credit card ko muntakhib karen jisay aap payment karna chahte hain

-      Adaigi kay liye rakam dakhil karen

-      Credit card account ki maloomaat hasil karnay kay liye "Fetch Title" par click karen

-      Adaigi shuru karne kay liye "Proceed" par click karen

Mobile Payments

English Script

Dear Customer, to make a mobile payment through internet banking:

·         Log in to your internet banking account

·         Navigate to the "Mobile" section

·         Select the carrier you want to pay to

·         Select whether it is a prepaid or postpaid plan

·         Enter the mobile number you want to make the payment for

·         Select the payment method

·         Click on "Pay Now" to initiate the payment

 

Urdu Script

Internet banking ke zariye Mobile payment kay liye, nechy mentioned tareeqay ka istemaal karen:

-      Apne internet banking account mein login karen

-      "Mobile" section mein jayen

-      Carrier ko select karen jisay aap payment karna chahte hain

-      Prepaid ya postpaid plan mein se select karen

-      Mobile number enter karen jisay aap payment karna chahte hain

-      Payment kay liye tareeqa select karain

-      Payment karne kay liye "Pay Now" par click karen

1Bill Payments

English Script

Dear Customer, to make a 1Bill payment through internet banking:

·         Log in to your internet banking account

·         Navigate to the "1Bill" section

·         Select the payment type (Invoice Payment or Top up Payment)

·         Enter the invoice number

·         Click on "Fetch Details" to retrieve the invoice information

·         Review the details and click on "Proceed" to initiate the payment

 

Urdu Script

Internet banking ke zariye 1Bill Payment ke lye nechy mentioned tareeqay ka istemaal karen:

-      Apne internet banking account mein login karein

-      "1Bill" section mein jayein

-      Payment type select karain (Invoice Payment ya Top up Payment)

-      Invoice number enter karain

-      "Fetch Details" par click karein invoice ki maloomat haasil karne ke liye

-      Tafseelat ka jaeza lein aur adaigi karne ke liye "Proceed" par click karein

Payee Management

English Script

Dear Customer, to manage Payee through internet banking:

·         Log in to your internet banking account

·         Navigate to the "Payee Management" section

·         Select "Inter Bank" option

·         Select the bank of the payee account

·         Enter the account number of the payee account

·         Click on "Fetch Title" to retrieve the payee account information

·         Submit the information

Urdu Script

Payee ko internet banking ke zariye manage karne ke liye nechy mentioned steps follow karain:

-      Apne internet banking account mein login karein

-      "Payee Management" section mein jayein

-      "Inter Bank" option select karein

-      Payee account ki bank ko select karein

-      Payee account ka account number enter karein

-      "Fetch Title" par click kar ke payee account ki information retrieve karein

-      Information submit karein

Account Summary

English Script

Dear Customer, to access your account summary in internet banking. Here is a summary of the steps:

·         Log in to your internet banking account

·         Navigate to the "Overview" or "Accounts" section

·         Look for the option "Account Summary"

 

Urdu Script

Apne account ki summary internet banking mein dekhne ke liye, yeh aapke liye aasaan tareeqa hai:

-      Apne internet banking account mein login karein

-      "Overview" ya "Accounts" section mein jayein

-      "Account Summary" option select karain

Mini Statement

English Script

Dear Customer, steps to view a mini statement of your account through internet banking:

·         Log in to your internet banking account

·         Navigate to the "Overview" or "Accounts" section

·         Look for the option "Mini Statement"

·         Select the account for which you want to view the mini statement

·         Select the date range for which you want to view the mini statement

·         Click on "Generate" to view the mini statement

 

Urdu Script

Apne account ki mini statement ko internet banking ke zariye check ke liye tareeqa ye hai:

-      Apne internet banking account mein login karein

-      "Overview" ya "Accounts" section mein jayein

-      "Mini Statement" option select karain

-      Us account ko select karein jis ki mini statement aap dekhna chahte hain

-      Date range select Karain jski ap mini statement check karna chahty hain

-      "Generate" par click karein

SMS Alert

English Script

Dear Customer, steps to enable SMS alerts for your account through internet banking:

·         Log in to your internet banking account

·         Navigate to the "Requests" or "Alerts" section

·         Look for the option "SMS Alert"

·         Select the account for which you want to enable SMS alerts

·         Enter the mobile number where you want to receive the SMS alerts

·         Select the network of the mobile number you entered

·         Click on "Submit" to enable SMS alerts for the selected account

 

Urdu Script

Apnay account ke liye SMS alerts ko internet banking ke zariye enable karne ke liye, is tarah ke steps follow karein:

-      Apnay internet banking account mein login karein

-      "Requests" ya "Alerts" section mein jayein

-      "SMS Alert" option ko search karein

-      Wo account select karein jis ke liye aap SMS alerts enable karna chahte hain

-      Wo mobile number enter karein jis par aap SMS alerts receive karna chahte hain

-      Enter kiye gaye mobile number ka network select karein

-      Select kiye gaye account ke liye SMS alerts enable karne ke liye "Submit" par click karein

Transaction Limit/change package

English Script

Dear Customer, steps to set a daily transaction limit for your account through internet banking:

·         Log in to your internet banking account.

·         Navigate to the "Requests" or "Settings" section.

·         Look for the option "Transaction Limit".

·         Select the daily package limit that you want to set for your account.

·         Select the account for which you want to set the daily transaction limit.

·         Enter the amount of the daily transaction limit you want to set.

·         Click on "Submit" to set the daily transaction limit for the selected account.

 

Urdu Script

Apnay account ke liye daily transaction limit internet banking ke zariye set karne ke liye, is tarah ke steps follow karein:

-      Apnay internet banking account mein login karein

-      "Requests" ya "Settings" section mein jayein

-      "Transaction Limit" option ko search karein

-      Apnay account ke liye daily package limit select karein jo aap set karna chahte hain

-      Wo account select karein jis ke liye aap daily transaction limit set karna chahte hain

-      Wo amount enter karein jo aap daily transaction limit ke liye set karna chahte hain

-      Select kiye gaye account ke liye daily transaction limit set karne ke liye "Submit" par click karein"

User activity/e-receipt

 

English Script

Dear Customer, steps to view user activity in internet banking:

·         Log in to your internet banking account.

·         Navigate to the "Overview" or "Settings" section.

·         Look for the option "User management".

·         Select "User activity".

·         Select the date range for which you want to view the user activity.

·         Click on "Generate" to view the user activity.

·         A reference number will be generated, click on it to open an e-receipt that you can print out.

 

Urdu Script

Internet banking mein user activity dekhne ke liye, ye steps follow karein:

-      Apnay internet banking account mein login karein

-      "Overview" ya "Settings" section mein jayein

-      "User management" option ko search karein

-      "User activity" select karein

-      Wo date range select karein jis ke liye aap user activity dekhna chahte hain

-      User activity dekhne ke liye "Generate" par click karein

-      Ek reference number generate hoga, jis par click kar ke aap e-receipt open kar sakte hain, jo aap print out kar sakte hain

 

Add Account

English Script

Dear Customer, steps to add or link an account to your internet banking profile:

·         Log in to your internet banking account

·         Navigate to the "Overview" or "Settings" section

·         Look for the option "Manage Account"

·         Select the option "Add Account" or "Link Account"

·         Submit the information to add or link the account to your internet banking profile

 

Urdu Script

Internet banking mein apnay account ko add ya link karna chahte hain, to ye steps follow karein:

-      Apnay internet banking account mein login karein

-      "Overview" ya "Settings" section mein jayein

-      "Manage Account" option ko search karein

-      "Add Account" ya "Link Account" option ko select karein

-      Account ko apnay internet banking profile se add ya link karne ke liye information submit karein"

 

Other Payments through Internet Banking

Kuickpay

·         Log in to Internet banking

·         Go to Services

·         Click on Payments

·         Select Kuickpay > Other > Email

·         Enter Consumer No/Account Number/Payment ID

·         Fetch details and provide additional information

·         Follow prompts to complete payment

Engro

·         Log in to Internet banking

·         Go to Services > Payments

·         Select Engro > Other > Email

·         Enter Consumer No/Account Number/Payment ID

·         Fetch details and provide additional information

·         Follow prompts to complete payment

 

Kindly login to Internet banking > services > payments > PayPro > other > email > Consumer No/Account Number/Payment ID > Fetch details > enter required details and proceed.

Kindly login to Internet banking > services > payments > Jazz Cash > other > email > Consumer No/Account Number/Payment ID > Fetch details > enter required details and proceed.

Kindly login to Internet banking > services > payments > Haball > other > email > Consumer No/Account Number/Payment ID > Fetch details > enter required details and proceed

Kindly login to Internet banking > services > payments > IBA > other > email > Consumer No/Account Number/Payment ID > Fetch details > enter required details and proceed.

Kindly login to Internet banking > services > payments > Beacon house > other > email > Consumer No/Account Number/Payment ID > Fetch details > enter required details and proceed.

Kindly login to Internet banking > services > payments > City School > other > email > Invoice Number > enter required details and proceed.

Kindly login to Internet banking > services > payments > Sindh Revenue Board > other > email > Invoice Number > enter required details and proceed.

Kindly login to Internet banking > services > payments > Government of Punjab > other > email > Invoice Number > enter required details and proceed.

Kindly login to Internet banking > services > payments > FBR/PRA > other > email > Invoice Number > enter required details and proceed.

Kindly login to Internet banking > services > payments > Central Depository Company of Pakistan > other > email > Invoice Number > enter required details and proceed.

Kindly login to Internet banking > services > payments > Securities & Exchange Commission of Pakistan > other > email > Invoice Number > enter required details and proceed.
