Hold & Waiting

Dear Customer, you are requested to please wait for a moment while we fetch your required information.

English Script

 

Dear customer, we apologize for the delay. All agents are currently working to assist all of our customers in a timely manner. Your call is important to us and we will be with you as soon as an agent becomes available.

Urdu Script

 

Muaziz Saarif, apsy guzarish hai ke intizar kjiye kyun ke hamary tamam agent customers’ ki rehnumai men masroof hai. Apsy request hai kuch dair intizar ke baad call kjiye. Takleef ke lye mazrat chahty hain. Ap ke taw’won ka bohat shukriya.

Loan

English Script

 

Dear Customer, would you like to confirm which type of loan are you interested in Home loan, Auto loan or Personal loan?

 

Urdu Script

 

Muaziz Saarif, Konsy loan Ke bary men janna chahty hain? Home loan, Auto loan or Personal loan?

BOT

A WhatsApp BOT is a software solution that can automatically perform routine tasks and respond to inquiries with minimal human intervention. It helps to streamline operations and enhance the customer experience by providing prompt and efficient assistance.

Account Balance Inquiry

English Script

 

Dear Customer, you can check your account balance by using the WhatsApp automated service by providing few details. If you like to use the WhatsApp automated service, this chat will be closed, then you can start a new chat. Select the relevant option and check your account balance.

Step by step, guide to check Account Balance is mentioned below:

·         Access Bank Alfalah’s WhatsApp BOT

·         From main menu, select option 1 for Banking Services

·         Select Option 3 “Account Balance Enquiry”

·         Enter the One-Time Password (OTP) that you will receive on your registered mobile number

·         Select the desired account for which you want to check the balance

·         Select Option 1 “Account Balance”

·         Your Account balance will reflect accordingly

You can also check your account balance by using online banking service (Alfa App/Internet Banking) or by calling at our helpline 042/021-111 225-111.

 

Urdu Script

 

Muaziz Saarif, ap apna account balance WhatsApp automated service use karty hoye check kar sakty hain chand details provide kar ke. Agar ap WhatsApp automated service use karna chahty hain to mujhy apki ye chat close karni hogi phir ap new chat start kar ke relevant option select kr ke apna account balance check kar skty hain.

Step by step account balance check karny ka mentioned tareeqa ye hai:

-      Bank Alfalah ke WhatsApp BOT ko access karain

-      Main menu se option 1 for Banking Services ko select karein

-      Option 3 “Account Balance Enquiry” ko select karein

-      Apko apnay registered mobile number par OTP enter karna hoga

-      Woh account Select karein jiska account balance check karna chahte hain

-      Option 1 “Account Balance” ko select karein

-      Apka account balance accordingly reflect hojyga

 

Mazeed ap apna account balance online banking ko use karty hoye (Alfa App/Internet Banking) ya phir helpline par call karty hoye bhi maloom kar skty hain. Hamari helpline number hai 042/021-111-225-111.

 

Account Mini Statement

English Script

 

Dear Customer, you can check your account mini statement by using the WhatsApp automated service by providing few details. If you like to use the WhatsApp automated service, this chat will be closed, then you can start a new chat. Select the relevant option and check your account mini statement.

 Step by step guide to check Account Mini Statement is mentioned below:

-      Access the WhatsApp BOT of Access Bank Alfalah

-      From the main menu, select option 1 for Banking Services

-      Select option 3 for “Account Balance Enquiry”

-      Enter the One-Time Password (OTP) that you will receive on your registered mobile number

-      Select the desired account for which you want to check the balance

-      Select Option 2 for “Mini Statement”

-      Your account mini statement will reflect accordingly

You can also check your account mini statement by using online banking service (Alfa App/Internet Banking) or by calling at our helpline 042/021-111 225-111.

 

Urdu Script

 

Muaziz Saarif, ap apni Account Mini Statement WhatsApp automated service use karty hoye check kar sakty hain chand details provide kar ke. Agar ap WhatsApp automated service use karna chahty hain to mujhy apki ye chat close karni hogi phir ap new chat start kar ke relevant option select kr ke apni Account Mini Statement check kar skty hain.

Step by step Account Mini Statement check karny ka mentioned tareeqa ye hai:

-      Bank Alfalah ke WhatsApp BOT access karein

-      Main menu se option 1 for Banking Services ko select karein

-      Option 3 “Account Balance Enquiry” ko select karein

-      Apko apny registered mobile number par One-Time Password (OTP) enter karna hoga

-      Woh account Select karein jiski account mini statement check karna chahte hain

-      Option 2 "Mini Statement" ko select karein

-      Aapky account ki mini statement accordingly reflect hojygi

 

Mazeed ap apni account mini statement online banking ko use karty hoye (Alfa App/Internet Banking) ya phir helpline par call karty hoye bhi maloom kar skty hain. Hamari helpline number hai 042/021-111-225-111.

 

Credit Card Balance Inquiry

English Script

 

Dear Customer, you can check your Credit Card balance by using the WhatsApp automated service by providing few details. If you like to use the WhatsApp, automated service this chat will be closed, then you can start a new chat. Select the relevant option and check your Credit Card balance.

Step by step guide to check Credit card balance inquiry is mentioned below:

-      Access the WhatsApp BOT of Access Bank Alfalah

-      From the main menu, select option 1 for Banking Services

-      Select Option 1 for “Cards”

-      Select Option 2 for “Credit Cards”

-      Select Option 2 for “Credit Card Balance Inquiry”

-      Select Enter the One-Time Password (OTP) received on your registered mobile number

-      Provide the last four digits of your credit card, followed by a space, and the year of birth. For example, “1111 1900”

-      Your credit card balance will be displayed accordingly

 

You can also check your Credit card balance/bill by using online banking service (Alfa App/Internet Banking) or by calling our helpline 021-111 225-111.

 

 

Urdu Script

 

Muaziz Saarif, ap apna Credit card balance WhatsApp automated service use karty hoye check kar sakty hain chand details provide kar ke. Agar ap WhatsApp automated service use karna chahty hain to mujhy apki ye chat close karni hogi phir ap new chat start kar ke relevant option select kr ke apni Credit card balance check kar skty hain.

Step by step Credit card balance check karny ka mentioned tareeqa ye hai:

-      Bank Alfalah ke WhatsApp BOT access karain

-      Main menu mein se, Banking Services ke liye option 1 select karain

-      Phir, “Cards” ke liye option 1 ko select karein

-      “Credit Cards” ke liye option 2 ko select karain

-      “Credit Card Balance Inquiry” ke lye option 2 ko select karain

-      Apne registered mobile number par receive hone wale One-Time Password (OTP) ko enter karein

-      Apne credit card ke last 4 digits, ek space ke baad apni year of birth. For example, “1111 1900” provide kjiye

-      Apka credit card balance accordingly reflect hojyga

 

Mazeed ap apna Credit card balance online banking ko use karty hoye (Alfa App/Internet Banking) ya phir helpline par call karty hoye bhi maloom kar skty hain. Hamari helpline number hai 042/021-111-225-111.

 

Credit Card Statement Inquiry

English Script

 

Dear Customer, you can check your Credit card statement by using the WhatsApp automated service by providing few details. If you want to use the WhatsApp automated service, then I have to close this chat, then you can start the new chat & by selecting the relevant options you will be able to check your Credit card statement. Step by step, guide to check Credit Card Statement is mentioned below

-      Access the WhatsApp BOT of Access Bank Alfalah

-      From the main menu, select option 1 for Banking Services

-      Select Option 1 for “Cards”

-      Select Option 2 for “Credit Cards”

-      Select Option 3 for Credit Card Statement”

-      Select Enter the One-Time Password (OTP) received on your registered mobile number

-      Provide the last four digits of your credit card, followed by a space, and the year of birth. For example, “1111 1900”

-      Your credit card balance will be displayed accordingly

 

You can check your Credit Card statement (Last 10 approved transactions) by using our online banking service (Alfa App/Internet Banking), you can also get your monthly E-statement on your registered email address by calling our helpline at 042/021-111 225-111.

 

Urdu Script

 

Muaziz Saarif, ap apni Credit Card Statement WhatsApp automated service use karty hoye check kar sakty hain chand details provide kar ke. Agar ap WhatsApp automated service use karna chahty hain to mujhy apki ye chat close karni hogi phir ap new chat start kar ke relevant option select kr ke apni Credit Card Statement check kar skty hain.

Step by sep Credit Card Statement check karny ka mentioned tareeqa ye Hai:

-      Bank Alfalah ke WhatsApp BOT access karain

-      Main menu mein se, Banking Services ke liye option 1 select karain

-      Phir, “Cards” ke liye option 1 ko select karein

-      “Credit Cards” ke liye option 2 ko select karain

-      “Credit Card Statement” ke lye option 3 ko select karain

-      Apne registered mobile number par receive hone wale One-Time Password (OTP) ko enter karein

-      Apne credit card ke last 4 digits, ek space ke baad apni year of birth. For example, “1111 1900” provide kjiye

-      Apka credit card balance accordingly reflect hojyga

 

Mazeed ap apni Credit Card Statement (last 10 apporved transactions) hamari online banking (Alfa App/Internet Banking) ko use karty hoye ya phir helpline par call kar ke apny registered email address par hasil kar skty hain. Hamari helpline number hai 042/021-111-225-111.

 

Debit Card Activation

English Script

 

Dear Customer, you can activate your debit card by using our WhatsApp automated service, Alfa app, Internet Banking, Alfalah Rapid and by calling at our helpline 021/042-111-225-111.

To activate your debit card via Bank Alfalah's WhatsApp BOT service. Here are the instructions in a step-by-step format:

·         Access Bank Alfalah's WhatsApp BOT service from your registered mobile number

·         From the main menu, select option 10 for Debit Card Activation

·         Enter the last four digits of your Account Number (e.g. 2387)

·         Enter the last four digits of your CNIC number (e.g. 7859)

·         Enter the year of birth e.g. 1986 (YYYY)

·         Enter the last four digits of your Debit Card (e.g. 2387)

·         Enter the One-Time Password (OTP) that you receive on your registered mobile number (OTP will expire in 10 minutes)

·         Enter the four-digit debit card PIN code that you wish to use

·         Re-enter the same four-digit PIN code for confirmation

·         The BOT will provide a confirmation message for debit card activation, and you will receive an SMS notification

·          

*Please note that the chat needs to be initiated from your registered mobile number to activate your debit card via Bank Alfalah's WhatsApp BOT service*

 

Urdu Script

 

Muaziz Saarif, ap apna Debit Card WhatsApp automated service, Alfa App,Internet Banking, Alfalah Rapid  aur helpline 021/042 111 225 111 par call kar ke bhi activate karwa skty hain.

·         Apny registered mobile number ke through Bank Alfalah ki WhatsApp BOT service access karain

·         Main menu sey debit card activation ke lye option 10 select karain

·         Apny Account Number ke last 4 digits enter kjiye (e.g. 2387)

·         Apny CNIC number ke last four digits enter kjiye (e.g. 7859)

·         Apni year of birth enter kjiye e.g. 1986 (YYYY)

·         Apny debit card ky last four digits enter kijiye (e.g. 2387)

·         Apny registered number par sent kiya gaya OTP enter karain (OTP 10mins mein expire hojayga)

·         Apni marzi ka 4 digits Debit Card PIN Code enter kjiye

·         Debit Card ke 4 digits PIN Code tasdeeq ke lye dubara enter karain

·         BOT ki janib sy apko Debit Card Activation ka confirmation message send kiya jayga mazeed apko SMS ke through bhi aagha kiya jayga

 

 *WhatsApp BOT services ke through Debit Card Activation ke lye apko chat registered number sey start karni hogi*

Credit Card Activation

English Script

Dear Customer, you can activate your credit card by using our WhatsApp automated service, Alfa app, Internet Banking, Alfalah Rapid and by calling at our helpline 021/042-111-225-111.

To activate your credit card via Bank Alfalah's WhatsApp BOT service. Here are the instructions in a step-by-step format:

·         Access Bank Alfalah's WhatsApp BOT service from your registered mobile number

·         From the main menu, select option 8 for credit card activation

·         Provide the last four digits of your credit card number (e.g. 2387)

·         Enter the last four digits of your CNIC number (e.g. 7859)

·         Enter your credit card expiry date in the format of YYYYMM (e.g. 202312)

·         Enter your year of birth in the format of YYYY (e.g.,1986)

·         Provide the One-Time Password (OTP) that you receive on your registered mobile number. The OTP will expire in 10 minutes

·         Enter the four-digit credit card PIN code that you wish to use

·         Re-enter the same four-digit PIN code for confirmation

·         The BOT will provide a confirmation message for credit card activation, and you will receive an SMS notification

 

*Please note that the chat needs to be initiated from your registered mobile number to activate your credit card via Bank Alfalah's WhatsApp BOT service*

 

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, ap apna Credit Card WhatsApp automated service, Alfa App,Internet Banking, Alfalah Rapid  aur helpline 021/042 111 225 111 par call kar ke bhi activate karwa skty hain.

Bank Alfalah ki WhatsApp BOT service ke through Credit Card activate karny ke lye step-by-sep format follow karain:

·         Apny registered mobile number ke through Bank Alfalah ki WhatsApp BOT service access karain

·         Main menu sey credit card activation ke lye option 8 select karain

·         Apny credit card ke last four digits enter kijiye (e.g 2387)

·         Apny CNIC  ke last four digits enter kijiye (e.g 7859)

·         Apny Credit Card ki expiry date enter kijiye YYYYMM is format mein (e.g 202312)

·         Apna year of birth enter karain is format mein YYYY (e.g 1986)

·         Apny registered number par sent kiya gaya OTP enter karain (OTP 10mins mein expire hojayga)

·         Apni marzi ka 4 digits Credit Card PIN Code provide karain

·         Credit Card ke 4 digits PIN Code tasdeeq ke lye dubara enter karain

·         BOT ki janib sy apko Credit Card Activation ka confirmation message send kiya jayga mazeed apko SMS ke through bhi aagha kiya jayga

 

*Note: WhatsApp BOT services ke through Credit Card Activation ke lye apko chat registered number sey start karni hogi*

 

Debit Card PIN Code Change

English Script

 

Dear Customer, you can change your debit card PIN code by using the WhatsApp automated service by providing few details. If you like to use the WhatsApp automated service, this chat will be closed, then you can start a new chat. Select the relevant option, then you can change your PIN code.

Step by step guide to activate your debit card is mentioned below:

·         Access Bank Alfalah's WhatsApp BOT service

·         Select Option 1 for Banking Services

·         Select Option 1 for “Cards”

·         Select Option 1 for “Debit Card”

·         Select Option 2 for “Debit Card Activation”

·         You will receive a URL link you need to fill out the required details and then you can change debit card PIN code Or you can also change your debit card PIN code by using online banking service (Alfa App/Internet Banking) or by using this direct link https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/CardManagement_Request.aspx?src=Whatsapp

 

Urdu Script

 

Muaziz Saarif, ap apna debit card ka PIN code WhatsApp automated service ko use karty hoye change/create karwa skty hain. Agar ap WhatsApp automated service use karna chahty hain to mujhy apki ye chat close karni hogi phir ap new chat start kar ke relevant option select kr ke apna debit card ka PIN code change karwa skty hain.

Step by step debit card PIN code change/create karny ka tareeqa ye hai:

·         Bank Alfalah ke WhatsApp BOT service ko access karain

·         Option 1 select karain Banking Services ke liye

·         Option 1 select karain “Cards” ke liye

·         Option 1 select karain “Debit Card” ke liye

·         Option 2 select karain “Debit Card Activation” ke liye

·         Apko ek URL link milega jis mein aapko zaroori details enter hongi, phir aap apna debit card PIN code badal sakte hain. Ya phir aap apna debit card PIN code online banking service (Alfa App/Internet Banking) istemaal kar ke bhi badal sakte hain, ya phir phir is direct link ko istemal kar ke bhi https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/CardManagement_Request.aspx?src=Whatsapp

 

Debit Card Blocking

English Script

 

Dear Customer, you can block your debit card by using the WhatsApp automated service by providing few details. If you like to use the WhatsApp automated service, this chat will be closed, then you can start a new chat. Select the relevant option, then you can block your debit card.

Step by step guide to block your debit card is mentioned below.

Option 1 for Banking Services > Option 1 for Cards > Option 1 for Debit Card > Option 3 for Debit Card Blocking > after that you will receive an URL link in which you need to fill out the required details and then you can block debit card Or you can also block your debit card using online banking service (Alfa App/Internet Banking), by calling us on helpline 042/021-111 225-111 or by using this direct link https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/CardManagement_Request.aspx?src=Whatsapp

 

Urdu Script

 

Muaziz Saarif, ap apna debit card WhatsApp automated service ke zariye block karwa skty hain. Agar ap WhatsApp automated service use karna chahty hain to mujhy apki ye chat close karni hogi phir ap new chat start kar ke relevant option select kr ke apna debit card block karwa skty hain.

Step by step debit card block karny ka tareeqa ye hai.

Option 1 Banking service ke lye > Option 1 Cards ke lye > Optin 1 Debit Card ke lye > Option 3 Debit card blocking ke liye jis k baad apko aik URL link mile ga jis par ap click karny ke baad apni mukhtasar maloomat fill karne baad debit card ko block kar sakey gen. Ya ap apna debit card online banking services (Internet banking/Alfa App), helpline par call kar ke 042/021-111 225-111 bhi block karwa sakty hain ya phir is direct link ko istemal kar ke bhi https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/CardManagement_Request.aspx?src=Whatsapp

 

Internet Banking & Alfa Activation

English Script

 

Dear Customer, you can activate your Internet Banking & Alfa by using the WhatsApp automated service by providing few details. If you like to use the WhatsApp automated service, this chat will be closed, then you can start a new chat. Select the relevant option, then you can activate Internet Banking & Alfa.

Step by step guide to activate your Internet Banking & Alfa.

Option 6 for Digital Banking > Option 5 for Internet Banking / Alfa Activation > Option 1 for Internet Banking & Alfa Activation > after that you will receive an URL link in which you need to fill out the required details and then you can activate Internet Banking/Alfa Or you can also activate Internet Banking/Alfa by using this direct link https://netbanking.bankalfalah.com/IB/IBActivation.aspx

 

Urdu Script

 

Muaziz Saarif, ap apn internet banking/Alfa App activation WhatsApp automated service ke zariye karwa skty hain. Agar ap WhatsApp automated service use karna chahty hain to mujhy apki ye chat close karni hogi phir ap new chat start kar ke relevant option select kr ke apni internet banking/Alfa App activate karwa skty hain.

Step by step Internet Banking/Alfa activate karny ka tareeqa ye hai.

Option 6 Digital Banking ke lye lye > Option 5 Internet Banking/Alfa > Option 1 Internet Banking & Alfa Activation ke liye jis k baad apko aik URL link mile ga jis par ap click karny ke baad apni mukhtasar maloomat fill karne baad Internet Banking/Alfa activate kar sakey gen. Ya phir is direct link ko istemal kar ke bhi ap Internet Banking/Alfa activate karwa skty hain https://netbanking.bankalfalah.com/IB/IBActivation.aspx

 

Internet Banking & Alfa Password Reset

(Only if blocked due to maximum wrong password attempts)

English Script

 

Dear Customer, you can unblock your Internet Banking & Alfa Password by using the WhatsApp automated service by providing few details. If you like to use the WhatsApp automated service, this chat will be closed, then you can start a new chat. Select the relevant option, then you can unblock your Internet Banking & Alfa App.

Step by step guide to activate your Internet Banking & Alfa Password *Reset*

Option 6 for Digital Banking > Option 5 for Internet Banking / Alfa Password reset* > Option 2 for Internet Banking / Alfa Password reset > after that you will receive an URL link in which you need to fill out the required details and then you can reset your password Or you can also unblock your Internet Banking & Alfa Password by using this direct link https://netbanking.bankalfalah.com/IB/IBPasswordReset.aspx

 

Urdu Script

 

Muaziz Saarif, ap apna internet banking/Alfa App password reset WhatsApp automated service ke zariye karwa skty hain. Agar ap WhatsApp automated service use karna chahty hain to mujhy apki ye chat close karni hogi phir ap new chat start kar ke relevant option select kr ke apni internet banking/Alfa App password reset karwa skty hain.

Step by step password reset karny ka tareeqa ye hai.

Option 6 Digital Banking ke lye > Option 5 Internet Banking / Alfa password reset ke lye > Option 2 Internet Banking / Alfa password unblock liye jis k baad apko aik URL link mile ga jis par ap click karny ke baad apni mukhtasar maloomat fill karne baad Internet Banking/Alfa unbock kar sakey gen. Ya phir is direct link ko istemal kar ke bhi ap Internet Banking/Alfa Password reset kar skty hain

https://netbanking.bankalfalah.com/IB/IBPasswordReset.aspx

 

Account/Rapid/RDA/Branchless

English Sricpt

Dear Customer, Bank Alfalah is offering two convenient options for account opening: visiting our branch or utilizing our RAPID online platform. Allow us to guide you through the process and provide you with the necessary information.To explore the range of accounts we offer, please visit the following link: http://www.bankalfalah.com/personal-banking/deposit-accounts/. This will provide you with detailed information on our various deposit account options.

For accessing Bank Alfalah RAPID, you can visit our secure platform at https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/alfalahrapidprod/. Alternatively, you can contact our helpline at 042/021 111-225-111 for further assistance.

If you are interested in opening a RAPID account, we have separate links available for Conventional Banking and Islamic Banking. You can access them as follows:

·         Conventional Banking: https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Home.aspx

·         Islamic Banking: https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Index.aspx

Bank Alfalah now offers the convenience of opening an account digitally. Simply download our Alfa app or visit https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/alfalahrapidprod/ to open an account via our self-remote portal or the Alfa app.Please note that if you wish to open a business account, we kindly request you to visit the nearest Bank Alfalah branch. However, our Roshan Digital Account can be opened online. Non-residents can apply for this product by visiting https://invest.bankalfalah.com/ops/Index.html , while residents can apply for it at the branch. Residents are eligible to apply if they have assets held abroad.

For branchless banking and opening a wallet account, you can utilize our Alfa app. Details can be found at https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/alfalahrapidprod/

 

Urdu Sricpt

Muaziz Saarif, ap branch visit kar ke account open karwa skty hain ya phir Alfalah Rapid online portal use kar ke bhi account open kar skty hain. Kindly mentioned link visit kar ke ap account ke barey mein maloomat ley skty hain: http://www.bankalfalah.com/personal-banking/deposit-accounts/ Rapid ke through account open karny ke lye Conventional Banking and Islamic Banking ki link visit kjiye

·         CONV https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Home.aspx

·         IBG https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Index.aspx

Customers ab Bank Alfalah Account Digitally bhi open kar sakty hain. Simply Alfa download kijiye ya rapid.bankalfalah.com visit kijiye aur account open kjiye via via self-remote portal of rapid ya phir via Alfa app.Mazeed agar ap business account open karna chahty hain to branch visit kijiye ya phir agar ap non-resident hain or Roshan Digital Account open krna chahty hain to link visit kijiye or account open kijiye https://invest.bankalfalah.com/ops/Index.html aur agar ap resident of Pakistan hain.Agar abroad men assets ho.Ya agar ap branchless account open karna chahty hain to Alfa Application https://www.bankalfalah.com/personal-banking/self-service-banking/alfa/ sy open ka skty hain.

Asaan/Freelancer/Current Account

Bank Alfalah Freelancer Digital Current Account

Now freelancers can easily get their work payments from anywhere in the world directly into their bank accounts. Just like their work, freelancers can open a Bank Alfalah Freelancer Digital Account from the comfort of their homes, workplace or anywhere else to meet their banking needs conveniently.

Features and Benefits

-         Available in both LCY and FCY (USD only)

-         No Minimum Balance Requirement

-         Issuance of Bank Alfalah Debit Card (only for PKR Accounts)*

-         Issuance of Cheque Book*

-         Free SMS Alerts on all ADC Transactions

-         Free E-statements

-         Monthly limit of USD 5,000 or equivalent (debit and credit limits shall be applied separately)

-         Cash withdrawal limit of Rs. 500,000 or equivalent per day

Dear Customer, please visit the mentioned link in order to open Bank Alfalah Freelancer Digital Account https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/daolocalprod/IdentityVerification.aspx?type=Conventional&id=1068    

 

Bank Alfalah Asaan Digital Current Account

Hassle free digital account opening from the comfort of your home. Start transacting by opening your Bank Alfalah Asaan Digital Account conveniently with minimal documentation.

Features and Benefits

-         No Minimum Balance Requirement

-         Maximum Credit Balance Limit of Rs. 1 million

-         Monthly Debit Limit of Rs. 1 million

-         Issuance of Alfalah Debit Card*

-         Issuance of Cheque Book*

-         SMS Alert on Every Transaction*

Dear Customer, please visit the mentioned link in order to open Bank Alfalah Asaan Digital Account https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/daolocalprod/IdentityVerification.aspx?type=Conventional&id=1068

 

Alfalah PKR Current Account

Alfalah PKR Current Account has been designed to cater to the everyday financial needs of salaried individuals & small businesses with transactional needs.

Product Features/ Benefits

-         Non-Interest bearing checking account

-         Minimum monthly balance requirement: PKR 5,000

-         Free SMS Alerts on Digital Transactions

-         Free E-Statements

-         Free Local Fund Transfers to any BAFL Account

-         Orbit Reward Points

-         Unmatched Transactional Convenience

-         Frequent access to your account without any limits or restrictions

-         Unconditional Transactional Convenience!

-         Enjoy unlimited waivers across the board without any balance requirement!!

-         Free Online Banking Transactions through 800+ Branches

-         Free Cheque Book issuance

-         Free Banker’s Cheque issuance

-         Free Same – Day Clearing

-         Free Intercity Clearing

-         Free Outward Clearing Returns (including Same-Day & Intercity Returns)

Dear Customer, please visit the mentioned link in order to open Alfalah PKR Current Account https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/daolocalprod/IdentityVerification.aspx?type=Conventional&id=1068

Recording & Voice Messages Access

English Script

Dear customer, we apologize, but we are not able to access or listen to voice messages and videos. Please let us know how we can assist you through text-based communication.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, intehai mazrat chahengy apko ye bataty hoye kay hamary pass apkey voice messages sun’nay ki sahulat nahi hai, apsy guzarish hai kindly humain apna sawal/query text message ke zariye bataiye.

Channel Access

English Script

Dear Customer, apologies this communication channel is intended to provide basic information and support to our customers. For a more comprehensive and secure assistance, we recommend you to reach out to our 24/7 customer service helpline at 021/042 111 225 111.

Urdu Script

Muazziz Sarif, ye channel sirf basic Information or assistance k liye hai, hm customers ko product information or un ki query ke mutallik guidance faraham kar skty hain. Hum customer ki profile ko access nahen kr skte us k liye humain verification darkar hoti hai jis k liye call zarori hai details janny ke lye ap hamari 24/7 helpline par call kar sakty hain. Hamari helpline number hai 021/042 111 225 111.

 

Dear Customer, apologies this channel is only for basic information and assistance. This channel provides information on products, guidance over queries regarding banking products like account, cards digital banking loan products etc. However, we cannot access a customer's profile without verifying a customer, which requires a call. This is for your own security. Kindly call at our helpline in order to confirm the status in this regard. Our helpline number is 021/042 111 225 111.

 

Alfa Device Activation

Generic Response

English Script

Urdu Script

Customer, I am unable to login ALFA through username/password.

Customer, mein Alfa login nai kar pa raha

Officer, could you please confirm the notification/error pop up while trying login ALFA?

Officer, Apko koi notification ya error message araha hai?

Customer, Notification is “Please login from your registered device or contact call center at 111-225-111 to activate this device”.

Customer, “Please login from your registered device or contact call center at 111-225-111 to activate this device” ye notification araha hai

Officer, please confirm, are you using new device (Mobile Phone) to login ALFA by inputting username/password?

Officer, kia ap kisi new device per Alfa login kar rahe hain username/password k zariey?

 

English Script

Dear Customer, this is to update you that bank has changed the process. From now onwards you can login through 1 device only i.e. from 1st May 2022, if you have login Alfa on a device through pin/finger/face ID, then that device is being considered as the registered device.

If you have that device available, you can login through it without any issue. However, if you want to login on another/new device, you need to re-generate your password from helpline (021 111-225-111) and after that you won’t be able to login through previous device and this new device will become a registered device.

 

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, mein apko batana chahunga/chahungi ke bank ne apna process change kardia hai, ab ap sirf 1 mobile phone se Alfa ko login kar saktae hain. Agar apne 1st May 2022 se Alfa login ki hai pin/finger/face ID k zariey to wo mobile phone apki registered device ban gaya hai.

Muaziz Saarif, agar apk pass wo mobile phone hai to ap ussi pe baa-asaani login kar saktay hain. Aur agar wo mobile phone apk istemaal mein nai hai to apko helpline (021 111-225-111) par call kar ke Alfa password re-generate karwa skty hain, aur us k baad ap apne previous phone se login nai kar sakengae or apka naya phone registered device ban jae ga.

ALFA Journey IOS/Android

English Script

Customer Journey of Android Users for Forgot Credentials on un-binded device

·         If you are an android user, please update your Alfa App through Play Store

·         Please login with your User name & Password

·         Upon entering User name & Password you will be directed to OTP authentication

·         screen, where Alfa App will auto fetch OTP (there will be no manual option to enter the

·         OTP for Android Users), registered mobile number/SIM should be entered in same

·         device

·         On successful OTP or Biometric verification customer needs to setup login PIN to use

·         Alfa on same device

Urdu Script

Android Users ke lye un-binded device par forgot credentials ki journey

·         Agar ap android user hain, tou play store sy Alfa app update kijiye

·         Apny User name & Password sy login kijiye

·         User name & Password sy login karny par apko OTP authentication screen par direct kiya jayga, jaha Alfa app OTP auto fetch karegi (Android users ke lye OTP manual fetch karny ka option nahi hai), registered mobile number/SIM same device mein honi chahye

·         Successful OTP ya Biometric verification par customer login Pin setup karega same Alfa device par

English Script

Customer Journey of IOS Users for Forgot Credentials on un-binded device

·         If you are an iOS user, please update your Alfa App through App Store

·         Please login with your User name & Password

·         Upon entering User name & Password you will be directed to OTP authentication

·         screen, where Alfa App will auto fetch OTP (there will be no manual option to enter the

OTP for iOS Users), registered mobile number/SIM should be entered in same device

·         On successful OTP, Biometric verification is also required as customer needs to setup

·         login PIN to use Alfa on same device

 

Urdu Script

IOS Users ke lye un-binded device par forgot credentials ki journey

·         Agar ap IOS user hain, tou play store sy Alfa app update kijiye

·         Apny User name & Password sy login kijiye

·         User name & Password sy login karny par apko OTP authentication screen par direct kiya jayga, jaha Alfa app OTP auto fetch karegi (IOS users ke lye OTP manual fetch karny ka option nahi hai), registered mobile number/SIM same device mein honi chahye

·         Successful OTP, Biometric verification par customer login Pin setup karega

·         Alfa login PIN same device par use hogi

IB Login changes of OTAC

Changes in Internet Banking Login- Implementation of OTAC

English Script

Dear Customer, this is to inform you that below mentioned process has been implemented on Internet Banking where now, customer will receive OTAC (SMS & Email) on every login on a new device/browser (i.e. Mozilla Firefox, Internet Explorer, Chrome etc)

·         If customer want to login on new device/browser again then he/she will receive OTAC (SMS & Email) and his/her previous device/browser will be marked detached

·         Transactions to new beneficiaries via Internet Banking have been stopped and only transactions on existing beneficiaries can be performed. However, transactions on new beneficiaries can be performed via Alfa App

·         RDA users can add new beneficiaries on Internet Banking and Alfa both

 

Note: Transactions includes all type of transactions i.e. UBP/mobile top up/ TPFT/ IBFT etc.

Urdu Script

Mauziz Customer, apko aagha kiya jata hai ke Internet Banking par below mentioned process implement kiya gaya hai jaha ab, customer ko new device/browser (yani Mozilla Firefox, Internet Explorer, Chrome waghera) par har login par OTAC (SMS & Email) mausool hoga.

·         Agar customer dubara new device/browser par login karna chahy to customer ko OTAC (SMS & Email) receive hoga aur iska previous device/browser remove hojayega

·         Internet Banking ke through new beneficiaries par transactions ko stop kardya gaya hai jab ke alredy added beneficiaries transactions perform kar sakty hain Alfa App ke through

·         RDA users Alfa aur Internet Banking dono ke through new beneficiaries ko add kar skty hain

Note: Transactions mein tamam types ki transactions shamil hain jaisy UBP/mobile top up/ TPFT/ IBFT waghera.

Ask Alfa CDD

English Script

Dear Customer, as per the regulatory requirement bank need to update the document of every account so you can update those document from the home without visiting branch from Alfa App.

You only need to click on AlfaApp without login, go to Chat option (left Bottom), Authenticate and then you will have AskAlfa Option where a Form will be reflecting, you only need to validate and provide information and Submit. This will help you to update the required document without visiting branch.

Urdu Script

Dear Customer, regulatory requirement k mutabiq bank ko har account k documents update karne hain. Is lie ab ap ghar baithae document update kar saktae hain Alfa App k zariey.

Apko Alfa App pe click karna hoga aur login kie bagair Chat option (left per araha hai) mein jana hoga, details authenticate kar k AskAlfa ka option aega aur wahan form mojood hai. Apko apni information enter kar k form ko submit karna hoga. Is k zariey ap darkaar document update kardaingae, branch visit kie bina.

 

Bank Alfalah’s account holders are required to fill the Know Your Customer (KYC) form which has been designed for your ease and upload necessary document.

If you are registered in Alfa App already then follow the below mentioned process.

If you have received a Notification from CDD Unit at Alfa App > then click the Bell Icon of Alfa App > performs Authentication > then Clicks Ask

Alfa > Open form & Authenticate > Choose Authenticate Matrix > go through

OTP Verification > fills Form and Submit.

If you are non-user of Alfa App, then follow the below mentioned process.

Open SMS receined from CDD Unit > then click on link mentioned on that SMS > download

App and click Chat > performs Authentication > Clicks Ask Alfa > Open form & Authenticate > Choose Authenticate Matrix > go through OTP Verification > fill Form and Submit

IBFT Charges

English Script

Dear Customer, as per State Bank, the limit for inter-bank fund transfer (IBFT) without any fee is Rupees 25000. If the amount exceeds this limit, a fee of 0.1% or Rupees 200+16% FED, whichever is lower, will be charged. It is also important to note that this monthly limit of Rupees 25000 applies for IBFT. *Note Premier Account holders are exempted from IBFT charges. However, Asaan RDA (Roshan Digital Account) Account holders will be charged for IBFT transactions*

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, state bank ke mutabiq, ap bina kisi fees ke Rs 25000 transfer kar skty hain. Agar ap Rs 25,000 sy ziyada transfer karty hain to 0.1% ya 200 Rs (jo bhi kam ho) charge hongy. Kindly note kijiye Rs 25000 IBFT ki monthly limit hai. *Note: IBFT charges Premiere Account holder ke lye wavied off hain jab ke Asaan RDA account holders ko IBFT charges lagun hongy*

Please note that Bank Alflah Limited will not be liable and responsible for any wrongly payment made by customer via IBFT.

IBFT Formats

“Check your account status” error message can occur when incorrect account number or format is entered. Verify account number and format by crosschecking with bank statement or contacting the bank.

Bank Alfalah

Please Enter Account Number

Conventional A/C

Enter Account Number Starting with 4-Digit Branch Code and 10-Digit Account Number

BBBBAAAAAAAAAA

Or

4-digit Branch code and 8-digit Account number

BBBBAAAAAAAA

Islamic A/C

4-digit Branch codeand 14-digit Account Number

BBBBAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

Branchless Banking Account

11 Digit Mobile Number

03XX XXXXXXX

Soneri Bank IBFT format

The Soneri Bank account number format for IBFT is as follows:

BBBB-AAAAAAAAAAA

Please enter your Soneri Bank account number in this format, where BBBB represents the 4-digit branch code, and AAAAAAAAAAA represents the 11-digit account number.

Summit Bank

Provide your Summit Bank account number in the 20-digit format, as shown below:

e.g., 01020120311714020909

Please enter your Summit Bank account number following this layout, ensuring that it consists of 20 digits.

Allied Bank

Provide your Allied Bank account number in one of the following formats:

For a 13-digit account number:

BBBBAAAAAAAAA

Where, BBBB represents the branch code and AAAAAAAAA represents the account number.

For a 20-digit account number:

BBBBAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

Where, BBBB represents the branch code and AAAAAAAAAAAAAAA represents the account number (16 digits).

 

United Bank

Provide your United Bank account number in one of the following formats:

For a 13-digit account number:

BBBB-AAAAAAAAA

Where, BBBB represents the branch code and AAAAAAAAA represents the account number.

For a 16-digit account number:

BBBB-BBBB-AAAAAAAAA

Where, BBBB represents the branch code and AAAAAAAAA represents the account number.

 

Habib Metro

Provide your HABIBMETRO account number using the following 19-digit format:

(CZZBBSSSSSCCCAAAAAA)

In this format:

C represents the country code.

Z represents the zone code.

B represents the branch code.

S represents the subhead code.

C represents the currency code.

A represents the account number.

Askari Bank

Please enter your Askari Bank account number, ensuring that it consists of 14 digits BBBBAAAAAAAAAA, in this format: BBBB represents the branch code and AAAAAAAAAA represents the account number.

Bank Al Habib

Please enter your Bank Al Habib account number using this layout, ensuring that it consists of the appropriate number of characters.

BBBBTTTTBBBBBBRRC

In this format:

BBBB represents the branch code.

TTTT represents the account type.

BBBBBB represents the base number.

RR represents the running number.

C represents the check digit.

Habib Bank

Provide your Habib Bank account number in the following format:

BBBBAAAAAAAATT

In this format:

BBBB represents the branch code.

AAAAAAA represents the account number.

TT represents the account type, where 03 represents CD (Certificate of Deposit) and 06 represents SB (Savings Account).

Please enter your Habib Bank account number using this layout, ensuring that it consists of the appropriate number of characters.

Standard Chartered

Please enter Standard Chartered Bank Ltd Account Number. Enter 11 or 16-digit Account Number. Layout as below. XXXXXXXXXXX. XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX.

Provide your Standard Chartered Bank Ltd account number in one of the following formats:

For an 11-digit account number:

XXXXXXXXXXX

For a 16-digit account number:

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

Please enter your Standard Chartered Bank Ltd account number using the appropriate format based on the length of your account number.

Faysal Bank Limited

Please enter 14 or 16 digit Faysal Bank Limited Account Number. BBBBAAAAAAAAAA or BBBBAAAAAAAAAAAA. B = Branch Code. A = Account Number.

Provide your Faysal Bank Limited account number in one of the following formats:

For a 14-digit account number:

BBBBAAAAAAAAAA

For a 16-digit account number:

BBBBAAAAAAAAAAAA

In these formats:

BBBB represents the branch code.

AAAAAAAAAA represents the account number.

Please enter your Faysal Bank Limited account number using the appropriate format based on the length of your account number.

JS Bank

Provide your JS Bank Limited account number in one of the following formats:

For JSBL Core Banking Account (6 digits):

XXXXXX

For Mobile Wallet (Mobile Number) Account (11 digits starting with "03"):

03XXXXXXXXX

Please enter your JS Bank Limited account number using the appropriate format based on the type of account you have.

Bank of Punjab

Provide your Bank of Punjab account number in one of the following formats:

For a 17-digit account number:

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

For a 16-digit account number:

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

Please enter your Bank of Punjab account number using the appropriate format based on the length of your account number.

Meezan Bank Limited

Provide your Meezan Bank Limited account number in one of the following formats:

For a 14-digit account number:

BBBBXXXXXXXXXX

For an 11-digit account number (starting with "03"):

03XXXXXXXXX

In these formats:

BBBB represents the branch code.

XXXXXXXXXX represents the account number.

Please enter your Meezan Bank Limited account number using the appropriate format based on the length of your account number.

 

Dubai Islamic Bank

Please enter Dubai Islamic Bank Account Number. Following the layout below.

<10-Digit Account Number > e.g. 0123456789.

Provide your Dubai Islamic Bank account number in the following format:

<10-Digit Account Number>

For example: 0123456789

Please enter your Dubai Islamic Bank account number using this layout, ensuring that it consists of 10 digits.

National bank

Please enter your account number using the format AAAAAAAAAA, where A represents a digit from 0 to 9.

For example: 1564799640

Please ensure that your account number consists of exactly 10 digits.

MCB Bank Limited

Provide your MCB Bank account number in one of the following formats:

For Conventional Account:

Enter a 16-digit account number in the format 1234567890123456.

For MCB Lite Account:

Enter an 11-digit mobile number in the format 03xxxxxxxxx.

Please enter your MCB Bank account number using the appropriate format based on the type of account you have.

Down Time Reponses

 

If Alfa App is working slow or giving slow response

English Script

Dear Customer, we apologize for any inconvenience caused by this issue. Our technical teams are aware of the problem and are working to resolve it as soon as possible. Meanwhile, you may use our internet banking facility to access your account, which is currently working fine. You can visit the link https://netbanking.bankalfalah.com/ib/Login.aspx# to use the internet banking facility.

 

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, hum apko inform krna chahty hain kay kisi technical issue kie wajah sy, Alfa App munasib tareeqay sy kam nahi kr rhi hai. Hamari technical teams jald az jald is ke hal ke lye kam kr rhi hai. Al batta internet banking ki sahoolat sahi kam kr rhi hai ap nechy di gayi link ke through internet banking use kart skty hain:https://netbanking.bankalfalah.com/ib/Login.aspx#

 

Alfa Downtime Communication

Follow the below mentioned standard response if customer complaint about the degraded response of Alfa App on Chat Channels;

English Script

Dear Customer, Thank you for reaching us. Please be informed that, we are facing technical issues on Alfa-App, which will be resolved shortly. If you wants to know Account or Credit Card Balance enquiry or Mini Statement etc. We would suggest you to use WhatsApp BOT for the same.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, apka rabta karne ka shukriya. Apko inform kiya ata hai ke Alfa-App par takniki masail ka samna kar rahe hain, jo jald hal hojayenge. Agar aap account ya credit card balance ya mini statement check karna chahte hain, to hum ko WhatsApp BOT istemal karne ki suggest karty hain.

 

Downtime Notice - Scheduled Maintenance - ADC Switch

English Script

This is to inform you that downtime has been observed as per following schedule. Debit Cards, ATMs / CCDMs, Branchless Banking Wallets, and Internet Banking, Alfa & ADC services (transactions / enquiries) will be unavailable. Please have the details below:

 

Maintenance Activity Schedule:

Date: Saturday, April 01, 2023

Duration: 01:00 AM – 04:00 AM Hrs. PST (Saturday early morning)

Downtime: 03 Hours

 

Alfa | Issue on IPhone

English Script

Dear Customer, we are regretful for the inconvenience you have faced. If you have updated your IPhone on new IOS 16, you may face issue while using Alfa App. Please perform the below-mentioned task to revamp the temporary disruption.

·         Shutdown the phone, hold volume down button and power button on the phone. After restart ALFA should work

·         In case app is still not initializing, reinstall ALFA on the phone

Further, our technical department are already working on it & have this sorted for you. Thank you for your patience.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, hum apki pareshani ko samjhaty hain jis sy ap guzar rhy hongy aur zehmat ke lye mazrat chahty hain. Agar apny apna IPhone IOS 16 par update kiya hai to apko Alfa App use karty hoye ye issue aaskta hai. Is temporary khalal ko hal karny ke liye ap nechy mentioned process follow karain.

·         Phone ko band karain, phone par volume down button aur power button ko daba kar rakhain phone restart karny ke bad Alfa work karegi

·         Agar phir bhi Alfa work nahi kar rhi hai to Alfa reinstall kjiye dubara.

Generic use for all

English Script

Dear Customer, we apologize for the inconvenience you have experienced. We are aware of the issue and have notified our technical teams to investigate and resolve it as soon as possible. We understand the frustration and inconvenience this may have caused and we sincerely apologize for any trouble it may have caused. We appreciate your patience as we work to resolve this issue.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, hum apki pareshani ko samjhaty hain jis sy ap guzar rhy hongy aur zehmat ke lye mazrat chahty hain. Hum is masley sey agha hain aur humeny apni technical teams sey kaha hai ke woah isey jald iaz jald hal karain. Ap ke taw’won ka bohat shukriya.

  If timeline is not available, you may use the below:

English Script

Dear Customer, we apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Our relevant team is already working on resolving the issue. Unfortunately, we cannot confirm a specific timeline for resolution at this time, but we are doing our best to resolve it as soon as possible. We appreciate your patience and understanding in this matter.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, yeh issue highlighted hai or department is per kaam kr raha hai. Hum issue resolve hone ka muqarrara waqt nhi bata sakte. Aap se darkhuast hai intezaar kijiye.Takleef ke lye mzat chahengy.

Furthermore, if timeline is available you may use the below:

English Script

Dear Customer, we understand the hassle you must have gone through & sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We are aware of the issue and have asked our technical teams to resolve this at the earliest. Services might be restored by 6:00 PM. Your patience would be highly appreciated.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, hum apki pareshani ko samjhaty hain jis sy ap guzar rhy hongy aur zehmat ke lye mazrat chahty hain. Hum is masley sey agha hain aur humeny apni technical teams sey kaha hai ke woh isey jald iaz jald hal karain. Service sham 6:00 PM tak bahal ho sakti hai. Ap ke taw’won ka bohat shukriya.

 

Downtime - Branchless Banking | EOBI and Payroll

English Script

Dear Customer, we would like to inform you that scheduled maintenance activity is planned, which will affect certain services. We appreciate your patience and understanding during this period. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Service Impact and Timings:

ATM, Debit Card on POS, IBFT & few IB/Alfa Services: From 01:00 AM to 04:30 AM

EOBI/Payroll Cards & Wallet Services: From 12:00 AM to 08:00 AM

 

Urdu Script

Muaziz Sarif, ap ko yeh aagah kiya jata hai ke planned maintenance ki waja sey kuch services asar andaz hongi. Takleef ke lye bohat mazrat chahengy.

Service Impact ki Timings:

ATM, Debit Card on POS, IBFT & kuch IB/Alfa Services: 01:00 AM se 04:30 AM tak

EOBI/Payroll Cards & Wallet Services: 12:00 AM se 08:00 AM tak

 

If helpline number is not responding due to technical issues

English Script

Dear Customer, due to some technical error your call is not connecting at our helpline, we request you to please call tomorrow. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.

Urdu Script

Moazziz sarif, technical issue ki wajah se aap ki call hamari helpline par connect nahi ho rhi hai, aap se request hai aap kindly kal call kijiye. Takleef ke lye bhut mazrat chahengy.

Jazz Cash & Easy Paisa and other option are temporarily disabled

English Script

Dear Customer, the required service to transfer funds through Internet Banking/Alfa on new beneficiaries for accounts/wallets on both 1Link/RAAST of JazzCash, Easypaisa, Upaisa, Finja, JS, Sadapay, Nayapay and Paymax/Zong till further notice as option won’t be appearing to them due to some technical maintenance, we cannot confirm you any timeline at the moment. However, customers can conduct transaction on existing beneficiaries as per the process. We regret the Inconvenience caused in this regard. 

 

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, customers account/wallets ke 1Link/RAAST, JazzCash, Easypaisa, Upaisa, Finja, JS, Sadapay, Nayapay and Paymax/Zong ke new beneficiaries par Internet Banking/Alfa ke through funds transfer karny ki saholat till further instructions tak available nahi hogi technical maintenance ki waja sy, service bahaal honey mein kuch time lag skta hai jo hum confirm nahi kar skty is waqt. Jab ke customers already addes beneficiaries par as per process transaction kar skty hain. Takleef ke lye bhut mazrat chahengy.

Jazz Cash & Easy Paisa option is temporarily disabled

English Script

Dear Customer, we are really regretful for the inconvenience you have faced. The required service to transfer funds to Easy Paisa & Jazz Cash accounts is currently unavailable on IB and Alfa till further notice, we understand the hassle you must have gone through & sincerely apologize for the inconvenience.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, hum behad mazrat khuwan hain key aap ko is issue ka saamna karna para, JazzCash aur Easypaisa par Internet banking or Alfa App key zarye funds transfer karny ki sahulat filhaal available nahi hai. Hum samajh saktey hein key aap ko is hawaley say pareshani ka saamna hoga or hum is hawalay say mazrat khuwa hien.

 

Generic use for all:

English Script

Dear Customer, we are really regretful for the inconvenience you have faced. We are aware of the issue and have notified our technical teams to look into this at the earliest. We understand the hassle you must have gone through & sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Your patience would be highly appreciated.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, hum apki pareshani ko samjhaty hain jis sy ap guzar rhy hongy aur zehmat ke lye mazrat chahty hain. Ap is masly sy agha hain aur apni technical teams ko jald az jald hal karny ka keh chuky hain. hum apki pareshani ko samjhaty hain jis sy ap guzar rhy hongy aur zehmat ke lye mazrat chahty hain. Ap ke taw’won ka bohat shukriya.

If Customer amount is debited & want to lodged claim:

English Script

Dear Customer, we apologize for the inconvenience caused, if your amount has been debited then it will be auto reversed within 24 hours. However, if it is not reversed then you can call at our helpline 021-111-225-111 to lodge your request/claim.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, takleef ke lye mazraat chahngey. Agar apki amount debit ho chuki hai to 24 hours mei auto reversed hojaygi. Agar amount reversed na ho to ap hamari helpline 021 111 225 111 par call kar ke claim lodge karwa skty hain.

Host Link Down

English Script

Dear Customer, we understand the hassle you must have gone through & sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We are aware of the issue and have asked our technical teams to resolve this at the earliest. Services might be restored by midnight. Your patience would be highly appreciated.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, hum apki pareshani ko samjhaty hain jis sy ap guzar rhy hongy aur zehmat ke lye mazrat chahty hain. Hum is masley sey agha hain aur humeny apni technical teams sey kaha hai ke woh isey jald iaz jald hal karain. Service midnight tak bahal ho sakti hai. Ap ke taw’won ka bohat shukriya.

Call back

English Script

Dear Customer, we apologize this channel cannot take call back request. Please call at our 24/7 helpline regarding your issue. Our helpline number is 021/042-111-225-111.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, hum mazarat chahty hain ke is channel ke through call back ki request nahi li ja skti hai. Apsy request hai is bary men hamari helpline par 24/7 call kar skty hain. Hamari helpline number hai 021/042-111-225-111.

English Script

Dear Customer, would you please like to confirm the reason to arrange a callback?

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, ap kis hawaly sy call back chahty hain please confirm kjiye?

Offering Callback

English Script

 

Dear Customer, please share your contact number/registered contact number along with your CNIC so we may arrange callback for you.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, apna registered/contact number aur CNIC share kijiye ta ke hum apki call back arrange karwa sakain.

English Script

Dear Customer, thank you for providing details, one of our representative will contact you within 24 to 48 working hours.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, tafseelat faraham kerne ka shukriya, hamare numaainde ki janib se 24 to 48 working hour ke darmiyan ap se rabta kia jaega.

E-Commerce Activation & Deactivation Procedure

For Debit Card

 

Way to Activate/Deactivate the Debit Card E-commerce Transaction via Alfa App:

 

English Script

 

Dear Customer, you can activate your Debit Card E-commerce transaction by calling our 24/7 helpline at 021/042 111 225 111, you may also activate your Debit Card E-commerce via Alfa App.

In order to activate your Debit Card E-commerce transaction via Alfa App, please follow the steps below:

·         Login Alfa Application.

·         Tap on ‘Cards Management’.

·         Tap on ‘Debit Card’.

·         Tap on ‘Manage Transaction’.

·         Tap on ‘Enable/Disable on E-commerce transaction’.

·         User will enter OTAC & upon positive validation, confirmation message will be pop up.

 

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, ap hamari 24/7 helpline 021/042 111 225 111 par call kar ke apny Debit Card ki E-commerce transaction ko activate karwa skty hain, mazeed ap Alfa app ke zariye apny Debit Card ki E-commerce transaction ko activate kar skty hain.

Alfa App ke zariye apny Debit Card ka E-commerce activate karny ke lye below mentioned steps follow karain.

·         Alfa App login karain.

·         ‘Card Management’ par tap karain.

·         ‘Debit Card’ par tap karain.

·         ‘Manage Transaction’ par tap karain.

·         Enable/Disable on E-commerce transaction’ par tap karain.

·         OTAC enter kjiye then confirmation ke baad pop up appear hoga.

 

Way to Activate/Deactivate the Debit Cross border/International transaction border via Alfa App:

English Script

Dear Customer, you can activate your Debit Card International transaction by calling our 24/7 helpline at 021/042 111 225 111, you may also activate your Debit Card International transaction via Alfa App.

In order to activate your Debit Card International transaction via Alfa App, please follow the steps below:

·         Login Alfa Application

·         Tap on ‘Cards Management’

·         Tap on ‘Debit Card’

·         Tap on ‘Manage Transaction’

·         Tap on ‘Enable/Disable on International transaction’

·         User will enter OTAC & upon positive validation, confirmation message will be pop up

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, ap hamari 24/7 helpline 021/042 111 225 111 par call kar ke apny Debit Card ki cross border/international transaction ko activate karwa skty hain, mazeed ap Alfa app ke zariye apny Debit Card ki cross border/international transaction ko activate kar skty hain.

Alfa App ke zariye apny Debit Card ki cross border/international transaction activate karny ke lye below mentioned steps follow karain:

·         Alfa App login karain

·         ‘Card Management’ par tap karain

·         ‘Debit Card’ par tap karain

·         ‘Manage Transaction’ par tap karain

·         ‘Enable/Disable on International transaction’ par tap karain

·         OTAC enter kjiye then confirmation ke baad pop up appear hoga

·         Tap on ‘Manage Transaction’
