Debit Card (Act/Block/PIN Change)

For Debit Card Activation

English Script

Dear Customer, I would like to inform you that you can activate your Debit Card through Alfa App, using nearest ATM machine & by calling helpline. Our helpline number is 021-111-225-111.

Alfa App

Dear Customer, you can activate your Debit card through Alfa application, please follow the steps below:

·         Login Alfa Application

·         Tap on ‘Services’

·         Tap on ‘Cards Management’

·         Tap on ‘Debit Card’

·         Tap on ‘Activate Card’ & follow the Instructions

You can also activate your Debit Card by calling our helpline at 021-111-225-111.

Internet Banking

To activate your Debit Card through Internet Banking, please follow the steps below:

·         Access your Internet Banking by entering your login credentials

·         Navigate to the "Services" tab

·         Select "Card Management" from the available options

·         Choose the Card type then select Debit Card

·         Set a secure PIN for your Debit card

·         Click on the "Activation" button

·         Enter the One-Time Password (OTP) that was sent to your registered mobile number and email

·         Address

You can also activate your Debit Card by calling our helpline at 021-111-225-111.

ATM Machine

You can activate your debit card by visiting any Bank Alfalah ATM with your Alfalah Debit Card, CNIC number and your registered mobile number.

·         Insert your Alfalah Debit Card into the Bank Alfalah ATM Machine.

·         Click ‘OK’ when the ATM machine ask you to activate your Debit Card.

·         Enter your 13-digit CNIC number

·         Enter your date of birth (DD-MM-YYYY)

·         You will receive a 4-digit OTP on your registered mobile number, enter the OTP & proceed

·         Enter a 4-digit ATM PIN of your choice using the keypad

·         Re-enter the ATM PIN for validation

·         You will receive the confirmation message for the Activation of Debit Card, also you will be

·         Intimated via SMS

 

You can also activate your Debit Card by calling our helpline at 021-111-225-111.

 

Urdu Script

Alfa App

Muaziz Saarif, ap apna debit card Alfa Application ke zariye activate krwa skty hain, nechy mentioned steps follow kar ke.

·         Alfa App login karain

·         Service par tap karain

·         Cards Management par tap karain

·         Debit Card par tap karain

·         Activate Card par tap karain & hidayat par amal karain

 

Internet Banking

Muaziz Saarif, ap apna debit card Internet Banking ke zariye activate krwa skty hain, nechy mentioned steps follow kar ke.

·         Internet Banking login karain

·         ‘Services’ par tap karain

·         ‘Cards Management’ par tap karain

·         ‘Debit Card’ par tap karain

·         Activate Card par tap karain & hidayat par amal karain

 

ATM Machine

Muaziz Saarif, ap apna debit card BAFL ATM machine ke zariye activate krwa skty hain

Nechy darj diye gaye steps follow kjiye

·         Apna Alfalah Visa Debit Card ATM machine enter kijiye

·         Apna Maujooda ATM PIN enter kjiye

·         New PIN Enter karain

·         Tasdeeq ke lye ATM PIN dubara darj karain

 

For Debit Card PIN change

English Script

 

Dear Customer, I would like to inform you that you can change your Debit Card PIN through Alfa App, Internet Banking & by calling helpline. Our helpline number is 021-111-225-111.

Through Alfa App

·         Log in to the Alfa App

·         Go to Services

·         Click on Card Management

·         Select Debit Card

·         Select PIN Change

·         Enter the One-Time Authorization Code (OTAC) received via email and SMS

·         Follow the prompts to set a new PIN and confirm the changes

 

Through Internet Banking

 

Change your debit card PIN through internet banking, written concisely:

 

·         Log in to your internet banking account

·         Go to Services

·         Click on Card Management

·         Select Debit Card

·         Click on Change PIN

·         Enter a new PIN and confirm it

·         Enter your current ATM PIN for validation

·         Submit the changes and wait for confirmation

 

 

 

Through ATM Machine

Below are the steps to be followed while using Bank Alfalah ATM machine

 

·         Enter your Alfalah Visa Debit Card

·         Enter your existing PIN

·         Screen will ask to change new PIN

·         Enter new PIN

·         Re-enter the New ATM PIN for validation

 

For Debit Card PIN change

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, ap apna Debit Card PIN Alfa App, Internet Banking, ATM machine ya phir helpline par call kar ke bhi change kar saktay hain. Hamari hepline number hai 021-111-225-111.

Alfa App ke through

·         Kindly Alfa App logi karain

·         Service mein jayein

·         Card Managemnet mein jayein

·         Debit Card par click karain

·         PIN change ke lye OTAC#s (Email & SMS) enter karain

·         Confirm par click kjiye

 

Internet Banking ke through

·         Kindly Internet Banking login karain > services mein jayen > Card Management par click karain > Debit Card par click karain > Change PIN par click > New PIN enter karain > Tasdeeq ke lye ATM PIN dubara darj karain.

ATM Machine ke through

Nechy darj diye gaye steps follow kjiye

·         Apna Alfalah Visa Debit Card ATM machine enter kijiye

·         Apna Maujooda ATM PIN enter kjiye

·         New PIN Enter karain

·         Tasdeeq ke lye ATM PIN dubara darj karain.

 

For Debit Card Blocking

English Script

Dear Customer, I would like to inform you that you can deactivate your Debit Card through Alfa App, Internet Banking & by calling helpline. Our helpline number is 021-111-225-111.

Through Alfa App

Kindly login to Alfa App > go to services > Card Management > Debit Card.

·         Block > Temporary/Permanent > Submit.

 

Through Internet Banking

 

Kindly login to internet Banking > go to services > Card Management > Debit Card.

·         Block > Temporary/Permanent > Submit.

 

For Debit Card Blocking

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, apko batana chahunga ke ap apna Debit Card Alfa App, Internet Banking ya helpline par call kar ke bhi block karwa skty. Hamari hepline number hai 021-111-225-111.

Alfa App ke through

Kindly Alfa App logi karain > service mein jayein > Card Managemnet mein jayein > Credit Card par click karain.

·         Block ke lye > Temporary/Permenant par click karain > Submit.

 

Internet Banking ke through

Internet Banking login karain > services mein jayen > Card Management par jayen > Debit Card par click karain.

·         Block > Temporary/Permanent par click karain > Submit karain.

Credit Card (Act/Block/PIN Change)

 

For Credit Card Activation

English Script

Dear Customer, I would like to inform you that you can activate your Credit Card through Alfa App & by calling helpline. Our helpline number is 021-111-225-111.

Alfa App

To activate your Credit Card through Alfa App, please follow these steps:

·         Login to the Alfa app using your username and password

·         Go to the "Cards" section in the main menu

·         Select "Card Management" from the available options

·         Choose the credit card to activate

·         Tap on the "Activate" button

·         Enter the four-digit PIN code that you wish to use for your credit card

 

Internet Banking

To activate your Credit Card through Internet Banking, please follow these steps:

·         Access your Internet Banking by entering your login credentials

·         Navigate to the "Services" tab

·         Select "Card Management" from the available options

·         Choose the Card type then select Credit Card

·         Set a secure 4-digit PIN for your card

·         Re-enter the 4-digit PIN for confirmation

·         Click on the "Activation" button

·         Enter the One-Time Password (OTP) that was sent to your registered mobile number and email address

 

Alfalah Rapid

To activate your Credit Card through Alfalah Rapid Poral, please follow these steps:

·         Visit the official website of Bank Alfalah, Rapid access platform at ww.rapid.alfalah.com   

·         Click on the "Self Service Banking" option on the homepage

·         Choose "Credit Card Management" from the available options

·         Enter the necessary details such as your credit card number, date of birth, and CNIC/NICOP number

·         Enter the One-Time Password (OTP) received on your registered mobile number and email address

·         Follow the instructions to generate a PIN for your credit card

 

Helpline

·         To activate your credit card, kindly call our helpline at 021/042 111 225 111 with your registered number

 

Urdu Script

Alfa App

Muaziz Saarif, ap apna Credit Card Alfa Application ke zariye activate krwa skty hain, nechy mentioned steps follow kar ke:

 

·         Alfa App login karain

·         Service par tap karain

·         Cards Management par tap karain

·         Credit Card par tap karain

·         Activate Card par tap karain & hidayat par amal karain

 

Internet Banking

Muaziz Saarif, ap apna Credit Card Internet Banking ke zariye activate krwa skty hain, nechy mentioned steps follow kar ke:

 

·         Apny credentials ko use karty hoye Internet Banking login karain

·         "Serivce" tab par navigate karain

·         Available option sy "Card Management" select karain

·         Card type karain then Credit Card select karain

·         Apny credit card ke lye 4-digit ka secure PIN enter karain

·         Confirmation ke lye 4-digit PIN enter karain

·         "Activation" button par click karain

·         Apny registered mobile number aur email par bheja gaya One-Time Password (OTP) enter karain

 

Alfalah Rapid

Muaziz Saarif, ap apna Credit Card Alfalah Rapid ke zariye activate krwa skty hain, nechy mentioned steps follow kar ke:

 

·         Bank Alfalah ki official website visit kar ke rapid platform access karain ww.rapid.alfalah.com 

·         Homepage par "Self Service Banking" ke option par click karain

·         Available options sey Credit "Card Management" choose karain

·         Zurur details ko enter kjiye jesy date of birth, aur CNIC/NICOP number

·         Apny registered mobile number aur email par bheja gaya One-Time Password (OTP) enter karain

·         Credit Card ka 4-digit Pin generate Karin

 

 

Helpline

·         Muaziz Saarif, ap apna Credit Card helpline 021/042 111 225 111 par call kar ke activate karwa skty hain

 

 

For Credit Card PIN change

English Script

 

Dear Customer, I would like to inform you that you can change your Credit Card PIN through Alfa App & by calling helpline. Our helpline number is 021-111-225-111.

To change the PIN of your Bank Alfalah credit card through Alfa app, please follow the steps below:

·         Login to the Alfa App

·         Navigate to the "Services" section

·         Select "Card Management"

·         Select "Credit Card"

·         For PIN change, enter the OTAC#s received via email and SMS

·         Confirm the changes

 

Urdu Script

 

Muaziz Saarif, apko batana chahunga ke ap apna Credit Card PIN Alfa App se change kar saktay hain ya phir helpline par call kar ke bhi credit card PIN change kar skty hain. Hamari hepline number hai 021-111-225-111.

Aap Bank Alfalah ki credit card ka PIN change ke liye niche diye gye steps follow karain:

·         Alfa App mein login karein.

·         "Services" section tak pohnchain

·         "Card Management" select karein

·         "Credit Card" par click karein

·         PIN change ke liye, email aur SMS se receive kiye gaye OTAC#s enter karein

·         Badalao ko confirm karein

 

For Credit Card Deactivation

English Script

Dear Customer, I would like to inform you that you can deactivate your Credit Card through Alfa App & by calling helpline. Our helpline number is 021-111-225-111.

To temporarily block your Bank Alfalah credit card, please follow these steps:

 

·         Log in to the Alfa App

·         Go to the "Services" section

·         Select "Card Management"

·         Select "Credit Card"

·         Choose "Block."

·         Choose "Temporary"

·         Submit the request

 

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, apko batana chahunga ke ap apna Credit Card Alfa App se deactivate kar saktay hain ya phir helpline par call kar ke bhi credit card PIN change kar skty hain. Hamari hepline number hai 021-111-225-111.

Aap Bank Alfalah ke credit card ka temporary block karne ke liye niche diye gaye steps follow karein:

 

·         Alfa App par log in karein.

·         "Services" section mein jayein.

·         "Card Management" select karein.

·         "Credit Card" par click karein.

·         Block karne ke liye Temporary Submit karein

Chat Closure

English Script

Dear Customer, if you would like to use the WhatsApp automated service or return to the main menu, this chat will need to be closed. If you would like to continue using assistance, you can start a new chat. Please let us know if you would like to close this chat for now?

If you would like to close the chat for now, simply type "Yes"/"Ok". If you need further assistance, please feel free to ask.

Urdu Script

Mauziz Sarif, agar ap WhatsAcpp automated service use karna chahty hain ya main menu mein                   jana chahty hain to humain apki ye chat close karni hogi. Agar ap further assistance chahty hain to apko new chart start krna hogi. Kindly confirm kjiyga agar ap ye chat close krna chahty hain?

 

Kindly confirm kjiyga agar ap ye chat close krna chahty hain to simply type kijiye “Yes”/”Ok”. Agar ap further assistance chahty hain to confirm kjiye.

Greetings

Appropriate Opening and closing Greetings

No Queue: This standard response will be used by officers if customer already shared his query on BOT:

English Script

Dear Customer, we have received your message, let us check & get back to you. Your patience would be highly appreciated. 

Urdu Script

Mauziz Sarif, apka message humay masool hogaya hai, hum kuch hi dair mai apko rehnumai faraham kartay hain, apke wait karne ka bauhat shukriya.

During Queue: This standard response will be used by chat officer if customer already shared his query on BOT (All officers are busy now) 

English Script

Dear Customer, we regret the inconvenience you had to face, we have received your message, now you are connected with live assistance & we look forward to serve you better.

Urdu Script

Mauziz Sarif, humay is takleef ka afsoos hai jiska apko samna karna para, apka message humay masool hogaya hai, ab ap live assistance per connected hain aur hum apko behter khidmat faraham karne kay muntazir hain.

Preferred language in opening / closing greetings protocols

Opening greeting & Closing greeting would depend upon the customer-preferred language.

Opening Greeting:

English Script

Assalam o Alikum. How may I help you?

Urdu Script

Assalam o Alikum. Hum apki kese madad kar saqte hain?

Closing Greeting:

English Script

Thank you so much for approaching us through our Chat Channel. Please feel free to contact us in future in case of any query. Have a great day.

Urdu Script

Chat channel ke zariye humse raabta karne ka shukriya. Mustaqbil main bhi aap kisi bhi qism ki rehnumai kay liye humse raabta kar sakty hain.

Closing Greeting in case of No Response:

English Script

Sorry, but it seems like you've been disconnected, we would like to close this chat now.

Thank you so much for approaching us through our Chat Channel. Please feel free to contact us in future in case of any query. Have a great day.

Urdu Script

Maazrat chahte hain, mumkin hai ke chat disconnect ho chuki hai, islye chat close ki ja rahi hai.

Chat channel ke zariye humse raabta karne ka shukriya. Mustaqbil main bhi aap kisi bhi qism ki rehnumai kay liye humse raabta kar sakty hain.

Acknowledgement on No Response Chat

Use the standard response with the threshold of 1 minute after the last message. Mentioned standard response will be used by chat officer:

English Script

Dear Customer, are you connected with us?

Urdu Script

Mauziz Sarif, kia ap hamare sath connected hain?

When WhatsApp BOT is down

During the unavailability of BOT, officer have to manually share the Terms & Conditions with the customer. Officer will start responding to the customer if he/she accepts the Terms & Conditions. If customer didn’t accept, the Terms & Conditions then officer will send the inconvenience message & then close the chat.

Step 1:  Officer will share the T&C with the customer.

Step 2:  Officer will share the message, Dear customer, please accept WhatsApp Terms & Conditions in order to use WhatsApp services.

 

Scenario 1: Incase customer accepts the T&C then officer will share the standard opening greeting & continue the chat.

Scenario 2: Incase customer rejects/decline the T&C then officer will share the standard response Dear Customer, you have not accepted the Terms & Conditions due to which we are unable to continue with this chat. We are sorry for inconvenience caused.

Scenario 3: Incase customer starts messaging without accepting the T&C then officer will share the standard response Dear customer, please accept WhatsApp Terms & Conditions in order to use WhatsApp services.

Eid greetings

WhatsApp Banking:

Welcome to Bank Alfalah WhatsApp Banking Channel.

We wish you a very Happy and prosperous Eid.

How may I help you?

ASK ALFA:

Welcome to Bank Alfalah Live Chat Channel.

We wish you a very Happy and prosperous Eid.

How may I help you?

WEBCHAT:

Welcome to Bank Alfalah Live Chat Channel.

We wish you a very Happy and prosperous Eid.

How may I help you?

Debit Card Application Process

English Script

Dear Customer, if you have an account with Bank Alfalah and you would like to apply for a debit card for the first time, you can do so through the following procedures:

·         Send a text message "Debit" to 8287 and you will be contacted within 24-48 working hours.

·         Using the WhatsApp BOT services

·         Visiting Alfalah Rapid through the following links:

For Conventional accounts: https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Home.aspx

For Islamic accounts: https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Index.aspx

·         By calling our helpline at 042/021-111-225-111 for Premier & RDA account dial 0092 21 111 225 226

·         By visiting your parent branch/any branch and submitting the request for a debit card

However, if you need to apply for a replacement of your existing debit card, please call our helpline at 042/021-111-225-111 for Premier & RDA account dial 0092 21 111 225 226.

 

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, agar apka Bank Alfalah men account hai aur first time debit card ke lye apply karna chahty hain tou nechy diye gaye process ke zariye request dy skty hain.

1.    “Debit” likh kar 8287 par SMS send karain apko outbound officer ki janib sy call ajaygi 24-48 working hours mein.

2.    WhatsApp BOT services ko use karty hoye.

3.    Nechy mentioned Alfalah Rapid ki links visit kar ke.

·         Conventional ke lye: https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Home.aspx

·         Islamic Ke lye: https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Index.aspx

4.    Helpline par call kar ke 042/021-111-225-111, Premier aur RDA account ke lye 0092 21 111 225 226 dail kijiye

5.    Ya phir apni parent branch visit kar ke bhi debit card ki request dy skty hain.

Ya agar ap apny debit card ki replamcent ki request dena chahty hain tou kindly helpline par call kijiye. Hamari helpline number hai 042/021-111-225-111, Premier aur RDA account ke lye 0092 21 111 225 226 dail kijiye

 

E-Supplementary Debit Card

What is a Supplementary Debit Card?

Alfalah Supplementary Debit Cards:

Supplementary debit card is a value added facility for Bank Alfalah debit card customers, which can be issued to the family members of a primary cardholder. This card would allow our debit card customers to share the convenience of making day-to-day payments with their near and dear ones.

Features & Benefits:

·         Customized Limits –It simply means that a basic cardholder can set a monthly purchase, cash withdrawal, funds transfer and bill payment limits for each supplementary debit card, offering more control over their account funds. The range of limit for each transaction type can range from “0 up to basic card’s transactional limit”. It can be changed by primary cardholder by any time through Call Centre.

·         Card Usage #NAME? transactions including POS, 3Ds e-commerce, contactless transactions etc. along with cash withdrawals, utility payments and funds transfers.

·         Orbits- The supplementary card is entitled to earn orbits as per the existing criteria of the respective card variant

·         Discounts & Privileges - All existing value propositions shall be applied the same way as it’s on associated primary card

·         Transaction Monitoring - All the transactions conducted on the supplementary cards are recorded in the same statement as that of the primary card, and can be tracked through SMS Alerts.

Bank Alfalah is pleased to announce that now customers can issue supplementary debit cards against Basic debit cardholder through call center.

Eligibility Criteria:

·         All active account holders having Bank Alfalah Debit Card are eligible to request for issuance of supplementary Debit Card.

·         Close family member i.e. Parents, Brothers, Sisters, Children, Spouse will be eligible for availing supplementary Debit Card

·         only.

·         Minors of age 14 years or above could also be eligible for availing Supplementary Debit Card, provided they possess Young

·         Card (Smart Card). issued by NADRA.

·         A maximum five (5) Supplementary Debit Card could be issued upon request of basic Debit Card Holder Supplementary Debit

·         Cardholders will not be entitled to subscribe for Mobile App "ALFA" and / or Internet Banking In lieu of Basic Card Holder.

 

Important Points:

Charges will be charged as per SOCs http://www.bankalfalah.com/schedule-of-charges/

·         RDA customer can also request for Supplementary Debit Card for those only who resides in Pakistan

·         Supplementary Debit Card cannot be issued to following account holders:

o    Premier Account holders

o    CPA Account holders

o    Snapack Debit Cards holders

·         Both Primary or Supplementary cardholder can activate the card.

·         A supplementary card would be delivered at basic cardholder’s mailing address

·         Supplementary Debit Card can be activated through ATM’s as well.

·         Primary cardholder can request for a replacement by calling from a registered number at helpline.

·         Primary card holder will get SMS alerts of transactions performed on supplementary debit Card (if subscribed)

 

How to apply for it?

English Script

Dear customer, you can apply for Bank Alfalah E-Supplementary debit card by sending text message, Just write 'SDC' and send it to 8287, one of our agent will get back to you within 24 to 48 working hours or you can forward your E-supplementary Debit Card request by calling at our helpline. Our helpline number is 042/021 111-225-111.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, ap Bank Alfalah E-supplementary Debit Card ke lye text message ke through apply kar sakty hai ‘SDC’ link kar 8287 par SMS bhejain 24-48 wokring hours mein agent contact karlega ay apny E-supplementary Debit Card ki requesat helpline ke through bhi forward kar skty hain. Hamari helpline number hai 042/021 111-225-111.

Debit Card Upgradation Process

English Script

Dear Customer, you can now upgrade your debit card by making a call at our helpline number 021/042 111-225-111. Our customer service representative will assist you in upgrading your debit card. Alternatively, you can forward your Debit Card Upgradation request by visiting your parent branch, where the bank representative will assist you with the process.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, ab ap apna debit card upgrade karwa skty hain js ke lye ap hamari helpline par call kar skaty hain ya mazeed ap apni parent branch visit kar ke bhi apny debit card upgradation ki request dy skty hain. Hamari helpline number hai 021 111-225-111.

E Supplementary Credit Card

E-Supplementary Credit Card refers to an additional credit card issued to a secondary user who is linked to the primary credit cardholder. It allows the primary cardholder to share their credit limit benefits with family members. The primary cardholder retains control over the card  and is responsible for the charges made on both the primary and supplementary cards.

Supplementary credit cards are commonly used to provide family members, such as spouses, children, or parents, with their own access to credit while allowing the primary cardholder to monitor and control their spending. The primary cardholder can usually set spending limits and restrictions on the supplementary card to manage expenses more effectively.

How to apply for it?

English Script

Dear customer, you can apply for Bank Alfalah E-Supplementary credit card by sending a text message "SUPP" to 8287, one of our agents will get back to you within 24 to 48 working hours. Alternatively, you can forward your E-Supplementary Credit Card request by calling at our helpline number 042/021 111-225-111, our customer service representative will assist you with the process.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, ap Bank Alfalah E-supplementary Credit Card ke lye text message ke through apply kar sakty hai ‘SDC’ link kar 8287 par SMS bhejain 24-48 wokring hours mein agent contact karlega ay apny E-supplementary Credit Card ki requesat helpline ke through bhi forward kar skty hain. Hamari helpline number hai 042/021 111-225-111.

 

SBS

English Script

If you want to purchase products on installments, you will need to have a Bank Alfalah Credit Card.

You can apply for installment products by calling our helpline at 021/042-111-225-111. You can also visit Alfa Mall https://alfamall.com/ to book products on installment.

Please refer the mentioned link for installment plans: https://www.bankalfalah.com/personal-banking/cards/instalment-products/step-by-step-instalment-plans  

*Note: Please note that the prices of products are subject to change and the latest prices and installment plans can be obtained by calling our 24/7 helpline at 021-111-225-111*  Additionally, you can also apply through our WhatsApp BOT services by following these steps:

·         Access the WhatsApp BOT.

·         Go to the "Offers & Discounts" section.

·         Choose the "Installment Plans" option.

·         Select the desired installment product.

·         Request assistance for the installment process.

·         Expect a call within 24-48 working hours for further assistance.

 

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, agar ap installments par product khareedna chahty hain tou Bank Alfalah ka credit card required hoga.

Ap hamari helpline 021/042-111-225-111 par call kar ke ya Alfa Mall https://alfamall.com/ installments par products book karwa skty hain.

Installment plans ki details jan’ny ke lye mentioned link par click karain https://www.bankalfalah.com/personal-banking/cards/instalment-products/step-by-step-instalment-plans

Note: Products ki prices regular basis par revised hoti rehti hain, islye agar ap latest prices aur installment plans ki details ke lye hamari 24/7 helpline 021/042-111-225-111 par call kar skty hain, mazeed ap Whatsapp BOT services ke through bhi apply kar skty hain.

·         WhatsApp BOT tak access karain

·         "Offers & Discounts" section tak jayen

·         "Installment Plans" option select karain

·         Desired installment product ko select karain

·         Installment process ki request karain

·         24-48 working hours mein apko call ajaygi

Credit Card Payment methods

English Script

Dear Customer, you have multiple options to pay your Bank Alfalah credit card bill. If you have an account with Bank Alfalah, you can choose to make a payment through the following modes:

·         Cash Payment (Only conventional BAFL branches)

·         Cheque Payment

·         Mobile Banking (ALFA)

·         I-Net Banking

·         ATM

·         Auto Pay

·         Demand Draft / Bankers Cheque

·         Demand Draft Slip Drop

For customers with accounts in other banks, the following modes are available for making credit card bill payments:

·         Mobile Banking

·         I-Net Banking

·         CDM Machines

·         Cash Payment (Only conventional BAFL branches)

·         Cheque Payment

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, agar apka Bank Alfalah mein account hai tou ap below mentioned services ko use karty hoye apna credit card ka bill pay kar skty hain

Agar Bank Alfalah mein account ho:

1.    Cash Payment

2.    Cheque payment

3.    Mobile Banking (Internet ALFA)

4.    I-Net Banking

5.    ATM

6.    Auto Pay

7.    Demand Draft / Bankers Cheque

8.    Demand Draft Slip Drop

 

Agar Other Bank mein account ho:

Repayment Mode

 

1.    Mobile Banking

2.    I-Net Banking

3.    CDM machines

4.    Cash Payment

5.    Cheque payment

 

SBS request on Credit Card bill amount through Alfa & Helpline

 

English Script

Dear Customer, you can make installment payments for your Bank Alfalah credit card bill through Alfa App, WhatsApp BOT services or by calling the customer service representative on helpline number 042/021 111-225-111.

 

Through Alfa App

Dear Customer, you can make installment payments for your Bank Alfalah credit card bill through the Alfa App by following these steps:

 

·         Login to the Alfa App

·         Go to Cards

·         Select Credit Card Facilities

·         Select SBS

·         Select the card number

·         Enter the credit card expiry date

·         Select the amount

·         Select the tenure

·         Accept the terms and conditions

·         Submit

·         Please note that charges will be as per the bank's Standard Operating Procedures (SOCs)

 

WhatsApp BOT services

Dear Customer, you can make installment payments by using WhatsApp BOT services. Follow these steps:

 

·         Offers & Discounts

·         Installment Plans

·         Installment product Assistance

·         A call will be received within 24-48 working hours to assist you with the process.

 

You can also forward your request for installment payments by calling our helpline number 042/021 111-225-111. Our customer service representative will be happy to assist you with the process.

 

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, ap apnay credit card ka bill installments par karwa skty hain Alfa App ke through nechy diye agye process ke through.

·         Login karain Alfa > Cards > Credit Card facilities > SBS > Select Karain Card Number > Credit Card Expiry > Amount select karain > Tenure Select karain> T&C accept karain > Submit kijiye. (Charges SOCs ke mutabiq hongy)

·         WhatsApp BOT services ko use karty hoye. Offers & Discounts > Installment Plans > Installment product Assistance > 24-48 working hours mein apko call ajaygi.

Mazeed ap helpline par call kar ke bhi apni request dy skty hain. Hamari helpline number hai 042/021 111-225-111.

 

COP request on Credit Card through Alfa & H/L

 

English Script

Dear Customer, you can make Credit On Phone (COP) against your Bank Alfalah credit card through the Alfa App by following these steps:

·         Login to the Alfa App

·         Go to Cards

·         Select Credit Card Facilities

·         Select COP

·         Select the Payment Source

·         Enter the credit card expiry date

·         Select the COP amount

·         Enter the individual name

·         Select the tenure

·         Select the Equated Monthly Installment

·         Accept the terms and conditions

·         Proceed

·         Please note that charges will be as per the bank's Standard Operating Procedures (SOCs).

Alternatively, you can forward your request for a COP by calling our helpline number 042/021 111-225-111. Our customer service representative will be happy to assist you with the process.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, ap credit card ke against credit on phone ki request karwa skty hain Alfa App ke through nechy diye agye process ke through.

·         Login karain Alfa > Cards > Credit Card facilities > COP > Select Karain Card Number > Credit Card Expiry > Amount select karain > Individual name select karain > Equated monthly installment amount enter karain > T&C accept karain > proceed kijiye. (Charges SOCs ke mutabiq hongy)

Mazeed ap helpline par call kar ke bhi apni request dy skty hain. Hamari helpline number hai 042/021 111-225-111.

Bank Alfalah offers a Step-by-Step Installment (SBS) plan facility through which you can easily convert your outstanding balance into flexible monthly installments.

To apply just text "SBS" to 8287 or Call us ta 021 111-225-111

Alternatively, simply log into Alfa App

1.    Go to > Services

2.    Select > Credit Car Facilities

3.    Select > Step by Step

With Bank Alfalah’s Balance Transfer Facility (BTF), you can convert balance of any Bank’s credit card into your Bank Alfalah Credit Card through easy installments.

To apply just text "BTF" to 8287 or Call us at 021 111-225-111

Or simply log into Alfa App

1.    Go to > Services

2.    Select > Credit Card Facilities

3.    Select > Balance Transfer Facilities

4.    Customer can request for BTF on his/her own Credit Card of other bank, it means Beneficiary cannot be different and should be customer himself or herself.

 

Bank Alfalah offers a Credit On Phone (COP) facility through which you can get a pay order instantly against your Alfalah Credit Card available limit.

To apply just text "COP" to 8287 or Call us at 021 111-225-111

Or simply log into Alfa App

1.    Go to > Services

2.    Select > Credit Card Facilities

3.    Select > Credit On Phone

4.    Customer can request for COP on his/her Bank Alfalah account also.

 

1.    Credit Card Limit of customer will be blocked by the amount equal to the price of product. However, only equal monthly installments (EMI) will be charged to the customer as per selected installment plan.

2.    EMI will only be applicable if payment mode is selected as Bank Alfalah Credit Card.

3.    Installment billed to cardholders on cycle date shall be included in minimum payment by said cardholder.

 

How to pay your KE Bill via Installments?

·         Login to Alfa

·         Scan the QR code on the KElectric Bill

·         Select Credit Card as payment method

·         Select your desired installment tenure and proceed

·         Transaction is successful

Blocking Channels

English Script

Dear Customer, we will be arranging a call back for you in this regard. Additionally, you can also call our helpline number 021/042-111-225-111 for service blocking. For debit card blocking, you can use our WhatsApp automated services or use the Alfa/Internet Banking facility. Please note that blocking service is only available for debit cards and does not apply to EOBI cards.It is important to note that the bank will not be held liable in case of any misuse of the card before it is blocked.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, is hawaly sy apko call back arrange karwae ja rhi hai, mazeed ap hamari helpline par call kar ke bhi apni service blocking karwa skty hain, ap hamari WhatsApp Automated Services sy bhi (sirf Debit Card ki blocking kar skty hain) blocking kar skty hain. Ya ap Alfa or Internet Banking facility use kartey hoye apna Debit Card block kar skty hain EOBI card ko chor kar. Mazeed ye ke apko agha kiya jata hai ke blocking sy pehly kisi bhi misuse ki soorat mein bank liable nahi hoga. Hamari helpline number hai 021-111-225-111.

Complaint Channels

English Script

Dear Customer, it seems that you are experiencing a technical error and we apologize for the inconvenience. To report this issue, you can call our helpline at 021/042-111-225-111, email us at contactus@bankalfalah.com , or log the issue through the Alfa app or Bank Alfalah's website.If you would like us to call you back, we can arrange that within 24 hours.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, technical issue ho skta hai.Complaint log karwany ke lye ap hamari helpline 021-111-225-111 par call kijiye ya contactus@bankalfalah.com par email kijiye ya ap Alfa app aur Bank Alfalah’s website ke zariye bhi complaint log karwa skty hain Ya agar ap is channel ke through call back chahty hain to hum 24 hours men karwa skty hain.

English Script

Dear Customer, in order to file a complaint, you can do so by calling our helpline at 021/042-111-225-111, emailing us at contactus@bankalfalah.com  or through the Alfa app and Bank Alfalah's website(https://www.bankalfalah.com/contact-us/complaint-form/).If you would like us to call you back, we can arrange that within 24 hours.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, complaint log karwany ke lye ap hamari helpline 021/042 111-225-111 par call kar sakty hain ya phir contactus@bankalfalah.com par email kar skty hain. Ya agar ap chahen to hum apko complaint ke lye 24 ghanto men call back karwa skty hain.

 

Complaint Form: https://www.bankalfalah.com/contact-us/complaint-form/

Write to us at Complaint Management Unit, Bank Alfalah Ltd., 8th Floor, Business Avenue, PECHS Block 6, Shahrah-e-Faisal Karachi.

You can drop your letter or this form in any Bank Alfalah dropbox. These are available in all Bank Alfalah Branches, Consumer Finance Centers and ATM areas.

Remmitance Tracker

Electronic Proceed Realisation Certificate (ePRC)

English Script

The Electronic Proceed Realization Certificate (ePRC) is an electronic proof of payment issued by the processing bank, Bank Alfalah. The Turnaround Time (TAT) for obtaining an ePRC depends on the request method:

·         If requested through the web, TAT is 2 working days.

·         If requested through a branch for a direct credit, TAT is 2 working days.

·         For all other credit transactions (through IBFT or RTGS), TAT is 5 working days.

·         You can request an ePRC through the web at https://www.bankalfalah.com/eprc-request-form/

 

Urdu Script

Electronic Proceed Realization Certificate (ePRC) Bank Alfalah kay processing bank dwara issue ki gayi electronic payment ki proof hai. ePRC hasil karnay kay liye Turnaround Time (TAT) request method par depend karti hai:

-         Web say request ki gayi to TAT 2 working days hai

-         Direct credit kay liye branch say request ki gayi to TAT 2 working days hai

-         IBFT or RTGS aur credit transactions kay liye TAT 5 working days hai

-         Aap ePRC https://www.bankalfalah.com/eprc-request-form/  say web par request kar saktay hain

IBFT Remittances

English Script

Withholding tax Implementation on IBFT remittances

This is to inform you that deduction of Withholding tax on IBFT remittances (i.e. commercial remittances) will be implemented to customers from now onwards for the fiscal year (i.e. from July 2021 – June 2022) against export services related to IT and other than IT services. As per the taxation department, charges are mentioned below:

Revised withholding tax rates are as below:

·         0.25% for services related to IT services

·         1% for services related to other than IT services

Urdu Script

IBFT remittances (jaise keh commercial remittances) per customers per fiscal year (i.e. July 2021 se June 2022) tak export services ke liye Withholding tax deduct kiya jae ga, IT aur  non-IT services se related services ke liye. Taxation department ke according, charges neeche diye gaye hain:

Revised withholding tax rates yeh hain:

-         IT services ke related services ke liye 0.25%

-         Non-IT services se related hai to 1% hai

Password Reset Process

Alfa App

English Script

 

Dear Customer, you can retrieve your forgotten username or reset your password by following these 4 easy steps:

 

·         Go to the "Forgot Credentials" section when trying to sign in

·         Select the registration source (Account, Wallet, or Other Bank)

·         Enter your CNIC and email

·         Enter the OTAC (One Time Authentication Code) sent to your registered email or mobile number

Alternatively, you can also call our helpline at 021/042 111 225 111 for assistance with retrieving your username and resetting your password.

 

Urdu Script

 

Muaziz Saarif, ap apna bhool gaya hua username ya password recover karne ke liye ye 4 aasan steps follow kar sakte hain:

 

·         Sign in karne ke liye "Forgot Credentials" section mein jayein

·         Registration source (Account, Wallet, ya Other Bank) ko select karein

·         Apna CNIC aur email enter karein

·         Registered email ya mobile number par bheja hua OTAC (One Time Authentication Code) enter karein

Alernatively, ap hamari helpline par call kar ke username or password reset karwa sakte hain. Hamari helpline number hai 021/042 111 225 111.

 

  Internet Banking

English Script

 

Dear Customer, you can retrieve your password by following these 4 easy steps:

Step 1: Visit the link provided https://netbanking.bankalfalah.com/ib/ForgotPassword.aspx

Step 2: Enter your username

Step 3: Select your security question from the options available

Step 4: Enter the correct answer, and click 'Submit'.

 

Note: User name cannot be retrieve through internet banking, you need to use Alfa App

 

 

OTP & Biometric Process

English Script

 

Dear Customer, In order to utilize the Alfa app, it is necessary to only log in from a previously registered device. If you need to access the app from another device or if you have reset your phone, please follow these steps:

 

·         To log in, enter your username and password on the app

·         Verify your identity through either OTP authentication or biometric verification

·         Create a secure login pin for your account

 

If you have forgotten your username, the following steps will assist you in retrieving it:

 

·         From the login screen, select the "Forgot credentials" option

·         Indicate that you have forgotten your username and provide the source of your original registration

·         Verify your identity through either OTP authentication or biometric verification

·         Your username will be sent to you through both SMS and email

 

If you have forgotten your password, follow these steps to reset it:

 

·         Select the "Forgot credentials" option on the login screen

·         Indicate that you need to reset your password and provide the source of your original registration

·         Verify your identity through either OTP authentication or biometric verification

·         Create a new password to secure your account on the Alfa app

 

Urdu Script

 

Muaziz Saarif, Agar aap Alfa app ka istemal karna chahte hain, tou pehle register kiye hue device se hi login hona zaroori hai. Agar aap doosre device se ya apne phone ko reset karne ke baad app ko access karna chahte hain, tou in steps ko follow kijiye.

 

·         Login karne ke liye, App pe apne username aur password enter kijiye

·         OTP authentication ya biometric verification ke zariye apne identity ko verify kijiye

·         Apne account ke liye ek secure login pin bana lijiye

 

Agar aap apne username bhool gaye hain, tou aapko isko retrieve karne mein in steps ko follow karna hoga:

 

·         Login screen se, "Forgot credentials" option select kijiye

·         Apne username ko bhool gaye hain iska indication kijiye aur apne original registration ka source provide kijiye

·         OTP authentication ya biometric verification ke zariye apne identity ko verify kijiye

·         Aapke username dono SMS aur email ke zariye aapko bhej diye jayenge

 

 

Agar aap apne password bhool gaye hain, tou isko reset karne ke liye in steps follow kijiye:

 

·         Login screen se "Forgot credentials" option select kijiye

·         Password ko reset karna hai iska indication kijiye aur apne original registration ka source provide kijiye

·         OTP authentication ya biometric verification ke zariye apne identity ko verify kijiye

·         Alfa app pe apne account ko secure karne ke liye ek naya password banaiye

 

 

If customer has received pop up that, “you are already subscribed with Debit Card”

 

English Script

 

Dear Customer, it seems that you are already subscribed to a service. Please check your account details to confirm which service you are currently subscribed (Account/debit card/credit card/wallet or Roshan Digital Account) to and if you wish to unsubscribe or make changes, you can contact our customer service helpline at 021/042 111-225-111.

 

Urdu Script

 

Muaziz Saarif, hoskta hai ap already kisi product sey subscribe kar chuke hain (account/debit card/credit card/wallet ya Roshan Digital Account) js ki details check karny ke lye aur agar aap unsubscribe karna chahte, to aap hamari helpline par rabta kar sakte hain jiska number hai 021/042 111-225-111.

CNIC Expiry Update Procedure

English Script

Dear Customer, you can update your CNIC expiry through multiple channels i.e. Alfa App, Internet Banking, ATM, CDM, Rapid portal or Branch.

ATM Journey to Update CNIC Expiry

To update your CNIC expiry through ATM, you will need to press any key from the ATM and follow the below steps

·         Select Value Added Services

·         Select Update CNIC expiry date

·         Enter 13-digit CNIC#

·         Place right thumb over biometric device

·         Enter new expiry date

·         Acknowledgment screen will appear

Alfa Journey to Update CNIC Expiry

To update your CNIC expiry through the Alfa App follow the below steps

·         Login to Alfa App

·         Click on Services

·         Click on CNIC Expiry

·         Select CNIC expiry update

·         Enter CNIC issuance date

Update your CNIC Expiry Date through Bank Alfalah Internet Banking

To update your CNIC expiry through the Internet Banking follow the below steps

·         Login to Internet Banking

·         Go to Value Added Services

·         Select CNIC Expiry Update

·         Submit

SMS Banking (Pull Service)

Update CNIC expiry through SMS Banking (Pull Service)

The correct format to update CNIC expiry is: CU (space) <13 digits CNIC without dash/space> (space) <Issuance Date in DD/MM/YYYY>.

-      An example of the correct format is: CU 4210120474733 01/03/2021

-      Make sure to enter the CNIC number and issuance date correctly in the format provided

-      Once you have entered the correct format, send the SMS to the designated SMS Banking number which is 8287

-      The bank will then update your CNIC expiry date accordingly

Alfalah Rapid Portal

The CNIC expiry update service is available through the Rapid Portal, to access the service

-      Visit the appropriate link based on your banking category:

-      IBG customers should visit https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Index.aspx

-      Conventional customers should visit https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Home.aspx

-      Once you are on the Rapid Portal, go to the "Self Service" section and select "CNIC Expiry Updation".

-      Follow the instructions to enter your CNIC number and issuance date, and submit the request

-      The bank will then update your CNIC expiry date accordingly.Please follow the below

-      Mentioned link for video assistance; https://youtube.com/shorts/OdtntJvpoFs?feature=share

Branchless Banking

You can update your CNIC Expiry through Rapid Portal kindly visit the Links then go to home > Self Service > CNIC Expiry Updation:

IBG https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Index.aspx

CONV https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Home.aspx

 

Share your renewed CNIC via Alfa app, email at Cnicexpirydops@bankalfalah.com or by calling at our helpline 021-111-225-229.

 

 

Urdu Script

Muaziz Sarif, aap bank Alfalah mein CNIC ke expiry date ko multiple channels se update kar saktay hai jaise Alfa App, Interne Banking, ATM, CDM, Rapid portal ya Branchless Banking.

ATM Machine se CNIC expiry date update karne ke liye aapko ATM mein koi bhi key press karni hogi aur niche diye gaye steps follow karni hogi:

-         Value Added Services select karein

-         CNIC expiry date update select karein

-         13 digit ka CNIC# enter karein

-         Biometric device par right thumb rakhein

-         New expiry date enter karein

-         Acknowledgment screen show hoga

Alfa App se CNIC expiry date update karne ke liye niche diye gaye steps follow karein:

-         Alfa App mein login karein

-         Services par click karein

-         CNIC Expiry par click karein

-         CNIC expiry update select karein

-         CNIC issuance date enter karein

Bank Alfalah Internet Banking se CNIC expiry date update karne ke liye niche diye gaye steps follow karein:

-         Internet Banking mein login karein

-         Value Added Services par jayein

-         CNIC Expiry Update select karein

-         Submit karein

SMS Banking (Pull Service) se CNIC expiry date update karne ke liye yeh format follow karein: CU (space) <13 digits CNIC without dash/space> (space) <Issuance Date in DD/MM/YYYY> i.e. CU 4210120474733 01/03/2021.

Alfalah Rapid Portal se CNIC expiry date update karne ke liye niche diye gaye links par jayein aur home > Self Service > CNIC Expiry Updation par click karein:

-         IBG https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Index.aspx

-         CONV https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Home.aspx

Branchless Banking se CNIC expiry date update karne ke liye niche diye gaye links par jayein aur home > Self Service > CNIC Expiry Updation par click karein:

-         IBG https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Index.aspx

-         CONV https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Home.aspx

Aap apne renewed CNIC ko Alfa app se, email at Cnicexpirydops@bankalfalah.com se ya hamare helpline 021-111-225-229 se share kar sakte hain.

CC Limit Enhancement Procedure

English Script

Dear Customer, kindly confirm if you are a salaried person or a business person?

For Salaried Indiviuals

To request a credit limit increase as a salaried peson, follow the procedure below:

Make sure you have had at least a 12-month credit card relationship with the bank to qualify for a credit limit increase.

Prepare the following documents:

-      Fresh income documents that are verified and stamped, such as a salary slip.

-      A signed Annexure CF1/declaration form, which can be found at http://www.sbp.org.pk/bprd/2009/Annex_C4.pdf

-      The latest six months of duly signed and stamped bank statements for your salaried account.

-      A copy of your CNIC, salary slip/NTN copy, and an indemnity form.

-      Forward all the required documents to the department handling credit limit increase requests

The Documents Submission Channels:

To request a limit enhancement for your Bank Alfalah Credit Card, follow the steps below:

-      Write an application addressed to the Manager of Customer Service at Bank Alfalah

-      Include your signature on the application

-      Use the subject "Limit Enhancement" on the application

-      Send the application to the BDU department at the following address: BDU Department 23-H, Gulberg 2- 4th floor, Lahore. Once the bank receives your application, they will process your request for a limit enhancement

For Self-Employed Individuals

To request a credit limit increase as a self-employed individual, follow the steps below:

Prepare the following documents:

-      Latest six months of duly signed and stamped bank statements for your personal/business account

-      Proof of business, which can be one of the following depending on your business structure:

-      Sole proprietorship letter (in case of a sole proprietor and business account statement)

-      Partnership deed (in case of a partnership)

-      Form A for private limited firm (PVT LTD) (form 29) also included in Pvt

-      A properly filled declaration form/CF1 (copy attached)

-      Submit all the required documents to the bank to apply for a credit card

The Documents Submission Channels:

To request a limit enhancement for your Bank Alfalah Credit Card, follow the steps below:

-      Write an application addressed to the Manager of Customer Service at Bank Alfalah

-      Include your signature on the application

-      Use the subject "Limit Enhancement" on the application

-      Send the application to the BDU department at the following address: BDU Department 23-H, Gulberg 2- 4th floor, Lahore. Once the bank receives your application, they will process your request for a limit enhancement

Credit Limit Increase (CLI) Eligibility Criteria

·         CLI will occur for customers upon customer request (part of CF1/declaration form).

·         At least 12 months’ credit card relationship is required in order to qualify.

·         Card should be active & open, current or aging 1 at the time of limit increase.  

·         Only one CLI is allowed within a 12 months’ period.

·         TAT processing of request is 9 Working days. Department calculate the TAT from date of request subject to completion of supporting documents.

 

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, kindly confirm kjiye kya ap salaried person hain ya business person/self-employed?

Kindly for limit enhancement karny ke lye nechy darj process ko follow kjiye.

Salaried person credit card limit enhancement ki request ke lye nechy mentioned documents ki list ye hai.

·          Qualify karny ke lye credit card ka 12 months ka relationship hona chaye.

·         Fresh Income Documents jo ke verified aur stamped ho branch sy (Salary Slip)

·         Signed Annexure CF 1/declaration form jo ke available hai is link par http://www.sbp.org.pk/bprd/2009/Annex_C4.pdf

·          Latest six months salaried account bank statement jo ke signed aur stamped ho.

·         CNIC copy, salary slip/NTN copy, indemnity form, department ko forward kjiye.

Documents jama karwany ke lye Channel:

Apko BDU department 23-H, Gulbery 2-4th floor, Lahore, is addess par apni written application apni signature ke sath Manager of customer service Bank Alfalah ko bhejni hai js men apka subject hoga ‘Limit Enhancement’.

 

Kindly for limit enhancement karny ke lye nechy darj process ko follow kjiye.

Self-employed credit card limit enhancement ki request ke lye nechy mentioned documents ki list ye hai.

·         Latest Six months signed aur stamped (personal/business Account) Bank Statement.

·         Sole Proprietorship letter (Sole Proprietor aur Business Account Statement ki soorat mein)

·         Partnership Deed (Partnership ki soorat mein)

·         Form A private limited firm (PVT LTD) ke lye (form 29) Pvt men bhi include hai.

·         Properly filled declaration form/CF1 (attached copy ke sath)

Documents jama karwany ke lye Channel:

Apko BDU department 23-H, Gulbery 2-4th floor, Lahore, is addess par apni written application apni signature ke sath Manager of customer service Bank Alfalah ko bhejni hai js men apka subject hoga ‘Limit Enhancement’.

IBAN#

English Script

Dear Customer, to get your IBAN, you can follow the steps:

·         Visit the website https://www.bankalfalah.com/iban  and generate your IBAN

·         You can also get your IBAN if you are having cheque book

·         You can also contact the helpline at 042/021 111-225-111 for assistance in obtaining your IBAN incase for RDA and Premier account please contact at 0092 21 111 225 226

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, apna IBAN# hasil karnay kay liye aap yeh steps follow kar saktay hain:

-         https://www.bankalfalah.com/iban website par jaiye aur apna IBAN# generate karwaiye

-         Agar aap ke pass cheque book hai to aap wahan se apna IBAN# hasil kar saktay hain

-         Ap 042/021 111-225-111 helpline par rabta kar ke apna IBAN# hasil kar saktay hain mazeed RDA aur Premier account ka IBAN# janny ke liye 0092 21 111 225 226 par rabta kijiye

Account Number

English Script

Dear Customer, in order to check your account number, kindly consider the following options:

- Accessing your account number through online banking (such as Alfa App/IB)

- Reviewing the information provided in your cheque book

- Contacting the helpline general banking 042/021 111 225 111 & for RDA and Premier 0092 21 111 225 226

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, apna account number check karnay kay liye neeche diye gaye steps follow karain:

-         Online banking (Alfa App/IB) say apna account number hasil karain

-         Cheque book ke through apna account number review kar skty hain

-         042/021 111 225 111 helpline par call karkay bhi account number maloom kiya ja skta hai

SWIFT Code

English Script

Dear Customer, I would like to inform you that the SWIFT code for all Bank Alfalah branches is ALFHPKKAXXX and for Roshan Digital Account it is ALFHPKKARDA.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, main aap ko yeh batana chahta hun ke Bank Alfalah ke tamam branches ke liye SWIFT code ALFHPKKAXXX hai aur Roshan Digital Account ke liye ALFHPKKARDA hai.

 

To determine the account number from an IBAN, you should:

For example ALFHPKKA0123001001234567

·         Take the first four digits after "ALFH" in this case "0123"

·         Skip the next "00"

·         Take the remaining last 10 digits of your IBAN number in this case "1001234567"

·         This results in an account number of 14 digits "01231001234567"

Cash Advance

English Script

Dear Customer, you are able to withdraw 50% of your total credit limit on your card from Bank Alfalah ATM/1-link machine. However, please be aware that there will be a cash advance fee charged for this service. The fee will be either Rs.1200+16%FED or 3% of the withdrawal amount (whichever is higher). Additionally, there will be a daily mark-up of 0.12% charged from the date of the transaction until your total outstanding balance is cleared. Please make sure you understand the charges before proceeding with the cash withdrawal.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, ap apny credit card ki total limit ka 50% cash withdrawal kar skty hain Bank Alfalah ATM machine sy, cash withdrawal karny par apko PKR 1,200+16%FED ya 3% withdrawal amount (jo bhi higher ho) as cash advance fee charge hoga. Mazeed agar ap apni total outstanding amount clear nahi karty to apko daily basis par 0.12% ke hisaab sy markup charge hoga from the date of transaction.

For Total Bill

English Script

Dear Customer, If you do not clear your bill or at least the minimum amount within the specified time or due date, which is 21 days, late payment charges will apply. The charges will be 10% of the minimum amount or 1850+16%FED (whichever is higher). Additionally, there will be a daily markup of 0.12% charged from the date of the transaction on the total bill amount balance. It is important to pay the bills with in due date to avoid these charges.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, agar ap apna bill ya atleast minimum amount clear nahi karty with in the specified time ya due date mein, jo ke 21 days par mushtamil hoti hai to apko late payment charges charge hongy. Late charges total bill amount ka 10% ya 1850+16% FED (Jo bhi higher ho) hoskta hai. Mazeed agar ap apni total bill amount clear nahi karty to apko daily basis par 0.12% ke hisaab sy markup charge hoga from the date of transaction.

 

Foreign Transactions - Limit Exceed (Cross Border)

English Script

Dear Customer, as per SBP regulations, foreign transactions on your Bank Alfalah card have been temporarily disabled. This is due to your cross-border payments exceeding $25,000, approaching the annual limit of $30,000. To reactivate foreign transactions up to the remaining limit, please call 021/042-111-225-111.

Foreign Currency Transactions

English Script

Foreign Currency Transactions processed through foreign n merchants will be charged an additional fee of 5% of the transaction amount and PKR 0.4 per US dollar conversion. Additionally, it appears that the bank has implemented a withholding tax (WHT 236 Y) on international transactions executed by debit/credit card customers. Please be aware that these charges will be applied as per the updated terms of service and conditions (SOCs).Further, for filers, the Advance Withholding Tax rate will be 5% of the international spend amount, and for non-filers, the rate will be 10% of the international spend amount.

Urdu Script

Customers agar international transcations ke lye apna Debit/ Credit Card use karengy online ya phir physically to jo transcaitons foreign merchants ke through processed hongi un par 5% of the transaction amount aur PKR 0.4 per US dollar converstion charged hoga.

Ab sey jo international transactions Debit/Credit Cards sy hongi un par bank ki janib sy WHT (236 Y) laago kiya jayga jo as per bank ke updated SOCs ke mutabiq charged hongy.

Filer customers ko international spend amount ka 5% jab ke non filer customers ko 10% advance withholding tax international transactions par charge hoga.

From Visa member bank International ATM | Rs. 350+16% FED or 3.5% of cash withdrawal amount, whichever is higher.

FED amount will not be reversed. Upon deduction, FED is submitted to FBR and cannot be claimed. As a result, the Bank will no longer reverse FED as part of any fee reversal.

Orbit Rewards

Alfalah Orbit Rewards is a Loyalty Program that allows customers to earn Orbits (Points) on entire banking relationship with Bank Alfalah.

In fact, you can earn them on current and savings accounts, debit and credit cards, auto, personal and home loans, Investment products, Bancassurance, SMS alerts, e-statements and transactions through branches, ATMs, Alfa (mobile app) and internet banking, all at the same time.

How to Earn Orbits?

·         Open an Account

·         Activate & Transact with your new Debit/Credit Card

·         Get Loan

·         Make an Investment

·         Register & Login Alfa/Internet Banking

·         Sign up for SMS Alerts & e-Statements

·         Purchase a Bancasurrance Policy

Start now for an ultimately rewarding banking experience!

On Spending:

Currently, for every Rs 50 spent, you earn 1 Orbit point, which is worth Rs 0.25.

Alternate example: Currently, for every Rs 200 spent, you earn 4 Orbit points, which is worth Rs 1. However, on spending Rs 200, you can also earn 1 point worth Rs 1.

ALFALAH ORBIT REWARDS

ALFALAH ORBIT REWARDS, our loyalty program designed exclusively for individual customers and sole proprietors. With ALFALAH ORBIT REWARDS, you can unlock a truly rewarding banking experience. Here are the key details:

Point Value:

Each Orbit earned is equivalent to Rs 1, providing you with significant value for your participation.

Orbits Expiry:

Your Orbits remain valid for a period of 3 years, giving you ample time to accumulate and redeem them.

Ways to Earn:

Product Sign-up:

Earn Orbits by opening an account, making your first transaction on a new card (Debit or Credit), obtaining a new loan, making an investment, purchasing a Bancassurance policy, and more. Additionally, earn Orbits by performing your first login on internet banking/Alfa and registering for SMS alerts and e-statements.

Product Utilization:

Maximize your earnings by engaging in credit transactions within your account, retail spending on your cards (Debit or Credit), and conducting financial transactions through internet banking, Alfa, or ATMs.

Tier Bonus:

Benefit from a tier bonus that awards you a multiplier based on the number of product holdings, allowing you to earn Orbits at an accelerated rate.

Redemption Options:

Enjoy the flexibility of redeeming your Orbits through various channels, including Internet Banking/Alfa, our dedicated Call Centre (for Jet Setter), POS Redemption, and Alfa Mall.

We encourage you to refer to the comprehensive ALFALAH ORBIT REWARDS program guidelines for complete terms and conditions regarding earning and redeeming Orbits through the link provided https://www.bankalfalah.com/personal-banking/orbit

EARN RULES ON PRODUCT SIGN-UP:

Credit Card:

·         Classic Credit Card: Earn 100 bonus Orbits, offering you a rewarding start with our entry-level credit card

·         Gold Credit Card: Elevate your rewards with 250 bonus Orbits when you sign up for our Gold credit card

·         Master Optimus Credit Card: Experience enhanced benefits and earn 250 bonus Orbits with our Titanium credit card

·         Visa Platinum Credit Card: Enjoy exclusive privileges and earn 500 bonus Orbits when you choose our Platinum credit card

·         Premier Platinum Credit Card: Indulge in premium perks and earn an impressive 1,000 bonus Orbits with our Premier Platinum credit card

 

Debit Card:

·         Classic / PayPak Debit Card: Start earning rewards with 50 bonus Orbits by signing up for our Classic or PayPak debit card

·         Gold Debit Card: Upgrade your banking experience and earn 100 bonus Orbits with our Gold debit card

·         Platinum Debit Card: Unlock greater rewards and earn 250 bonus Orbits with our Platinum debit card

·         Visa Signature Debit Card: Experience the prestige of Visa Signature and earn 400 bonus Orbits when you opt for this premium card

·         Premier Visa Signature Debit Card: Enjoy elevated rewards and earn 400 bonus Orbits with our Premier Visa Signature card

 

Deposit Accounts:

·         Current Accounts: Earn 50 bonus Orbits by opening a Current Account and enjoy the convenience of our banking services

·         Premier Current: Enhance your banking experience and earn 100 bonus Orbits with our Premier Current Account

·         Savings Accounts: Start saving and earning with 50 bonus Orbits when you open a Savings Account

·         Premier Savings: Maximize your savings potential and earn 100 bonus Orbits with our Premier Savings Account

 

Loan Product:

·         Home loan: Fulfill your dreams of owning a home and earn a generous 1,000 bonus Orbits when you avail our Home Loan facility

·         Auto Loan: Drive away with rewards and earn 500 bonus Orbits when you finance your car with our Auto Loan

·         Personal Loan: Meet your financial needs and earn 250 bonus Orbits when you choose our Personal Loan option

 

Bancassurance:

·         All Banca products: Protect yourself and your loved ones with our Bancassurance products and earn 500 bonus Orbits

 

ADC (Alternative Delivery Channels):

·         Internet Banking: Experience seamless banking convenience and earn 25 bonus Orbits when you sign up for Internet Banking

·         Alfa Mobile App: Stay connected to your finances on the go and earn 25 bonus Orbits with our Alfa Mobile App

·         SMS Alerts: Stay informed about your account activity and earn 25 bonus Orbits by registering for SMS Alerts

·         E-statement: Embrace eco-friendly banking and earn 25 bonus Orbits by opting for E-statements

 

Investment Products:

All Investment Products:

·         Rs. 100K-2.99M: Earn 500 bonus Orbits when you invest between Rs. 100,000 and Rs. 2.99 million

·         Rs. 3M-9.99M: Earn 1,000 bonus Orbits when you invest between Rs. 3 million and Rs. 9.99 million

·         Rs. 10M & above: Earn an impressive 2,500 bonus Orbits when you invest Rs. 10 million and above

 

REDEMPTION CHANNELS

Internet Banking / Alfa

·         Make QR Payments via Alfa

·         Access the Alfa Mall for redemption

·         Make online bill payments for SSGC, Ptcl, KESC etc (1link billers)

·         Make mobile top-ups (Prepaid & Postpaid)

·         Make donations

·         Online merchant payments

·         Make combination payments using Orbits + Account + Credit Card

·         Transfer Orbits to another Bank Alfalah customer (beneficiary)

Call Center

·         Jet-Setter Redemption (Only for Platinum Card Holders, Premier Banking and Orbit 9 Customers)

POS Machines

·         All BAFL POS Terminals (Max limit of Orbit Redemption on POS is 9,999 per transaction)

Alfa Mall

·         BAFL Owned E-commerce store accessible via Alfa and directly from https://alfamall.com/

·         Explore vast categories of Home Appliances, Electronics, Mobiles, Fashion, Books and Groceries

·         Payment through Orbit, Credit Card, Account or Wallet.

Orbits Redemption through Alfa & IB

Through orbits, you may pay your utility bills, transfer orbits, make donations, utilize at Alfa Mall. You can do all this via Internet Banking/Alfa application orbit id. You have to select orbit in payment mode.

Orbits Redemption through POS

All Bank Alfalah POS terminals have been updated with Orbit redemption feature. You can now visit any merchant where Bank Alfalah POS machine is available for instant Orbit points redemption for up to PKR 9,999 per transaction limit.

How to redeem Orbits

Multiple ways to earn means more Orbits to spend. You can use Orbits to top up your mobile, pay your bills, visit AlfaMall at https://alfamall.com/ for online shopping or pay by scanning a QR at select merchants.

You can redeem your Orbits on the following channels:

Internet Banking/Alfa/POS:

·         Mobile Top-up

·         Bill payments

·         Donations

·         QR payments

·         POS

 

Call Centre:

·         You can contact our call center to redeem your Orbits against Jetsetter Travel Reward Program and credit card fees reversals (reversal is temporary discontinued)

Through orbits

 

Urdu Script

Thorugh the use of the "Orbits" service, customers can pay for utility bills, purchase products through Alfa mall, all via internet banking or through Alfa application using the Orbits. To use the service, customers must select "Orbit" as the payment mode. Additionally, customers can visit merchants that have a BAFL POS machine to instantly redeem their Orbit points. This service makes it easy and convenient for customers to manage their financial transactions and make use of the benefits they have accumulated through the Orbits program.

 

Urdu Script

Orbits ke zariye ap apnay utility bills pay kar sakty hain, orbis transfer kar skty hain aur donations dey skty hain. Different products avail kar skty hain Alfa Mall ke zariye. Yeh sab kuch ap Alfa/Internet Banking aur Orbit ID ke zariye kar skty hain jaha apko payment mode mein orbit select karna hoga. Ap merchants ke through BAFL POS machine ke through point redemption kar skty hain.

 

Mobile top up through orbit

To request for mobile top up using orbits, please follow these steps:

·         Login to Alfa app

·         Select the "Mobile Top-up" option

·         Choose your carrier type

·         Enter the mobile number you wish to recharge

·         Enter the desired recharge amount

·         Select the "Pay" button

·         Select your account details from the drop-down menu

·         From the available options, select "Orbit" as the payment method

·         Click on "Proceed" to complete the transaction

 

·         Customers can use their Orbit points to pay for their utility bills using internet banking or the Alfa application

·         Customers can also use their Orbit points to purchase products through Alfa Mall using internet banking or the Alfa application

·         Additionally, customers can instantly redeem their Orbit points at merchants that have a BAFL POS machine

 

The rewards program offers 1 orbit point for every Rs 400 spent on a debit card and 1 orbit point for every Rs 200 spent on a credit card.

0% Markup Instalment Campaign|COP-SBS–BTF

Bank Alfalah has launched a SBS promotion on 0% markup, but on specific tenures, following are the details:

BTF & COP APR Offers:

Tenure: 3 months

Processing Fee: 7%

APR (Annual Percentage Rate): 0%

SBS 0% APR Offers:

Tenure: 3 months

Processing Fee: 8%

APR (Annual Percentage Rate): 0%

Important Points:

-         This offer will be applicable on SBS for all spend (both online and retail) & BTF and COP for Transactors only

-         0% campaign is for (3-month tenure only)

-         Whereas, 6 & 12 months Markup rate will be charged as per SOCs

WHT

This is to inform you that bank has successfully implemented the WHT (236 Y) on international transactions executed by Debit/Credit Cards customers. Charges will be charged as per updated SOCs.

Adv. Withholding Tax on International Transactions: Filer 5% of the International Spend Amount Non Filer 10% of the International Spend Amount

Whereas, there is no change in withholding tax charged on profits:

·         Persons appearing in ATL – 15%

·         Persons not appearing in ATL – 30%

Branchless Banking

Mobile Wallet will let you store money and make payments when required. Easy, secure and innovative financial solution, that is meant to provide banking facilities like mobile accounts, bill payment, money transfer and digitized payment options to individuals. You have the ability to control you finances and make payments through the use of a China Union Pay Card and a Mobile Wallet.

Significant Features

1.    Get an instant bank account without going anywhere

2.    View account balance, or access last 30 days’ account statement for your wallet.

3.    Pay your credit card bill instantly or view your Alfalah Credit Cards’ details, available limit, due date, outstanding, minimum payment and reward points via wallet

4.    Make instant fund transfers to Bank Alfalah and Other IBFT enabled accounts via wallet account

5.    Recharge your prepaid mobile or pay your postpaid bill instantly via wallet account

6.    Customer can buy movie tickets via wallet account

7.    Pay your utility bills including ISP (Internet Service Provider) via wallet account

8.    Access numerous discounts offered on the branchless banking wallet cards.

9.    Manage your wallet via Alfa. Manage card (Set ATM pin, block, reactivate and order card)

Wallet Opening via Alfa – For New to Alfa users

English Script

The process for opening an Alfa Saving Account (Level 0) via the Alfa app for NTB customers without any BAFL product:

·         Open the Alfa app and select "Open Alfa Account" followed by "Alfa Saving Account"

·         Provide your CNIC, CNIC Issuance Date, and Mobile Number on the subsequent screen

·         Accept the T&Cs and check the box for the two provided statements

·         Click on the proceed button and undergo the required checks

·         In case an existing Alfa Saving wallet is found, you will receive an error message that “Alfa Account already exists”

·         Enter the OTP, generate a 4-digit login pin, and reconfirm

·         Provide your Father's Name, Mother's Maiden Name, Place of Birth, and City of Stay

·         NADRA will automatically fetch and display your Name, Date of Birth, Address, CNIC Expiry, and Gender

·         If any error is received from NADRA, the request will not be processed further

·         Upon successful verification, upload the front and back of your CNIC, and your Level 0 Wallet account will be opened

 

Urdu Script

Customers’ ke liye kisi bhi BAFL product ke baghair Alfa app ke zariye Alfa Saving Account (Level 0) kholne ka tareeqa nechy mentioned hai:

·         Alfa app ko kholen aur "Open Alfa Account" aur phir "Alfa Saving Account" select karain

·         Agli screen par apna CNIC, CNIC issuance date aur mobile number enter karen

·         T&Cs ko accept karen aur diye checkbox par click karen

·         "Proceed" button par click karain

·         Agar koi mojudah Alfa Saving wallet paya jata hai to aap ko aik error message mile ga ke “Alfa Account already exists”

·         OTP enter karain, 4-digit login pin generate karen aur reconfirm karen.

·         Apne Father's Name, Mother's Maiden Name, Place of Birth, aur City of Stay enter karain

·         NADRA aap ki Name, Date of Birth, Address, CNIC Expiry, aur Gender khud-ba-khud fetch aur display kare ga

·         Agar NADRA se koi error aata hai, to darkhwast agay proceed nahi hogi

·         Tasdeeq ke baad, apne CNIC ke front aur back ko upload karen aur aap ka Level 0 Wallet account khol jayega

 

To enjoy higher transaction limits and unlock additional features, you can upgrade your Mobile Account by visiting any Bank Alfalah Branch for biometric verification. Here are the transaction limits for each Mobile Account level:

Level 0 (Before biometric):

·         Daily Debit Limit: PKR 25,000

·         Monthly Debit Limit: PKR 50,000

·         Yearly Debit Limit: PKR 200,000

·         Maximum Balance: PKR 200,000

·         Level 1 (After biometric):

 

Daily Debit Limit: PKR 50,000

·         Monthly Debit Limit: PKR 200,000

·         Yearly Debit Limit: 0 (No yearly limit)

·         Maximum Balance: 0 (No maximum balance limit)

 

By upgrading to Level 1 through the biometric verification process, you can enjoy higher daily and monthly debit limits. Visit any Bank Alfalah Branch for biometric verification to upgrade your Mobile Account and access these enhanced features.

 

Deposit funds into wallet

English Script

Dear Customer, you can deposit funds into your wallet account through Bank Alfalah branches. You can also add funds to your wallet through Easypaisa or Jazzcash retailers or other banks. These convenient options allow you to easily add funds to your wallet account.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, aap deposit kr skte hain apne wallet account mein humari branches ke zariye. Mazeed aap Easypaisa/Jazzcash retailers ke zariye bhi deposit krwa skte hain.

E-Statement

Dear Customer, your Credit Card E-statement is password protected for security reasons. The password for your E-statement is the 9th, 10th, 11th and 12th digit of your credit card number. Please keep this information safe and do not share it with anyone.

Dear Customer, your Account E-statement is password protected for security reasons. The password for your E-statement is the last three digits of your account number. For example, if your account number is XXXX-XXXXXXX123, the password to open the PDF is 123.

Branch Timing

Our branch timings are as follows:
Monday – Thursday: 9 AM till 5 PM (without any break)
Friday: 9 AM till 5 PM (Break for Prayer/Lunch from 1 PM till 2:30 PM)
Saturday: 10 AM till 2 PM (without any break)   

Ramadan Timings

Dear Customer, all branches and offices of Bank Alfalah Pakistan will observe the following office and business (banking) hours for public dealing in the month of Ramadan.

Days

Business (Banking) Hours for Public Dealing

Monday to Thursday

09:00 AM to 02:00 PM (without break)

Friday

08:30 AM to 01:00 PM (without break)

Saturday

10:00 AM to 02:00 PM (without break)

 

Dear Customer, all branches and offices of Bank Alfalah Pakistan will remain closed from 21st to 25 April 2023 (Friday to Tuesday) on the occasion of Eid-ul-Fitr as declared by the State Bank of Pakistan.

Dear Customer, all branches and offices of Bank Alfalah Pakistan will now remain closed from 28th to 30th June, 2023 (Wednesday to Friday) being public holidays on the occasion of Eid-ul-Adha.

Dear Customer, all branches and offices of Bank Alfalah Pakistan will remain closed for public dealing on Monday, July 3, 2023, which shall be observed as “Bank Holiday”, as declared by the State Bank of Pakistan.

 

From within Pakistan dial: +21 111-225-111 or +42 111-225-111.
From outside Pakistan dial: +92 21 111-225-111 or +92 42 111-225-111.
For card authorization: 042 111-225-786.
