Internet banking Registration Process

Subscription process / Channels:

Dear Customer, to subscribe to Bank Alfalah's internet banking services, follow these steps:

·         Visit the internet banking registration page at https://netbanking.bankalfalah.com/ib/TermsConditions.aspx

·         Review the terms and conditions and select your desired option from Credit Card Customers, Debit Card Customers, or Account Holder Customers

·         Complete the required information, including account number or card number, CNIC/SCNIC/NICOP, date of birth, registered mobile number, and security question.

·         Submit the form and confirm the registered email ID

·         Visit the ATM/CDM machine to or Bank Alfalah branch for biometric verification

·         Upon successful verification, an OTAC will be generated and sent to your registered email and mobile number

·         Use the OTAC to log in to internet banking

Internet banking Registration Process (Urdu)

Subscription process / Channels:

Muaziz Sarif, Bank Alfalah ki internet banking services subscribe karne ke liye ye steps follow karein:

·         Internet banking registration page par jaiye https://netbanking.bankalfalah.com/ib/TermsConditions.aspx

·         Terms and conditions ko parh kar aur Credit Card Customers, Debit Card Customers, ya Account Holder Customers se apni pasand ki option select karein.

·         Zaruri information jaisay account number ya card number, CNIC/SCNIC/NICOP, janam din, registered mobile number aur security question ko complete karein.

·         Form submit karein aur registered email ID ko confirm karein.

·         Bank Alfalah ke branch par biometric verification ke liye jaiye ya phir ATM/CDM machine sy bhi kar skty hain.

·         Agar verification successful ho gayi to OTAC generate hoga jo apki registered email aur mobile number par bheja jayega.

·         OTAC ko use kar ke internet banking mein log in karein.

Corporate Internet Banking

Bank Alfalah provides Internet Banking for Company Accounts, Corporate/SME customers. Customers can subscribe initially with view only facility having no financial charges.

Eligibility:

·         Customer should have valid & active account

·         Registration through submission of registration form (from will be download from BAFL Website)

·         Official email id

Registration Procedure:

·         Company need to submit IB registration form (download from BAFL website www.bankalfalah.com).

·         Form will have to submit in corporate account maintaining branch where branch also check client’s documents as per their own operations manual.

·         Branch will forward IB registration form to central account opening department

·         Maker & Check activity on the form will be perform by centralized account opening department

·         Once done an SMS will be sent on the provided cell# (mobile that mentioned in the IB registration form) to inform customer that a link has been sent to him on the email id (email id that was provided in the registration form)

·         Now on the received IB link customer will generate IB user ID and Select security question

·         After following above procedure now customer will receive IB 8 characters’ password, 1st 4 on registered email id and 2nd 4 on SMS.

*Note: To register, unsubscribe and to update IB profile data on company account form must be submitted.

Alfa App Registration Process

Dear Customer, subscription process is mentioned below:

·         Download the Alfa app from the Play store or App store through the link https://www.bankalfalah.com/personal-banking/self-service-banking/alfa/

-      Read and agree to the terms and conditions

-      Select your customer category: Credit Card, Debit Card, or Account Holder.

-      Enter your personal information, including CNIC, card number, and date of birth, registered mobile number, MMNP

-      Enter username, and security question

-      Click on the "Submit" button

-      Your registered email ID will appear on the next screen.

-      Click on the "Confirm" button

-      Visit the Bank Alfalah ATM/CCDM machine or branch for biometric verification. Alternatively, you can perform biometric verification through the Alfa app, but it has a daily limit of Rs. 15000. For the full package limit.

-      After successful biometric verification, an OTAC (One-Time Activation Code) will be generated. The first 5 digits/characters will be sent to your registered email, and the last 5 digits/characters will be sent via SMS to your registered mobile number.

Alfa App Registration Process (Urdu)

Muaziz Saarif, subscription ka tareeqa nechy mentioned hai:

1-Play store/App store se Alfa app download karein https://www.bankalfalah.com/personal-banking/self-service-banking/alfa/

2-Terms and conditions parh kar unko agree karein

Neeche diye gaye options se koi ek select karein:

-         Credit Card Customers

-         Debit Card Customers

-         Account Holder Customers

3-Neeche diye gaye information fill karein:

-         CNIC

-         Credit/Debit/Account Card number

-         Date of birth

-         Registered mobile number

-         MNP (drop-down menu se select karein)

-         Username

-         Ek security question select karein aur uska answer den

4-‘Submit’ button par click karein

5-Agli screen par customer ka registered email ID show hoga

6-‘Confirm’ button par click karein.

7-Customer branch visit karega aur biometric verification perform karega. Lekin, biometric Alfa App se bhi ho sakta hai lekin agar customer full package limit avail karna chahta hai to branch visit zaroori hai. Successful biometric verification ke baad, ek OTAC – One-time activation code generate hoga jis ka pehla 5 digits/characters customer ke registered email par bheja jayega aur baqi ka last 5 digits/characters registered cell number par SMS ke zariye bheja jayega.

IB/Alfa Package

English Script

Dear Customer, the packages for Internet banking/Alfa application are divided into three types, according to customers' usage, and are currently free of cost. The packages and their respective transaction limits (per day) are as follows:

-         Package IB399: PKR 250,000-transaction limit per day

-         Package IB449: PKR 500,000-transaction limit per day

-         Package IB599: PKR 1,000,000-transaction limit per day

Maximum limit of transaction per day is as per your package limit.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, nechy internet banking/Alfa packages ko customers ke istemal ke mutabiq 3 types mein taqseem kiya gaya hai aur ye packages abi free of cost hain.

-         Package IB399: PKR 250,000-transaction limit per day

-         Package IB449: PKR 500,000 transaction limit per day

-         Package IB599: PKR 1,000,000 transaction limit per day

Transaction ki per day maximum limit selected package ke mutabiq hogi.

IB/Alfa Password Criteria

English Script

To create a strong and secure password for your Alfa or IB account, please consider the following guidelines:

-      Your password should be at least 8 characters long

-      Avoid using dictionary words and phrases like "Password123"

-      Use a combination of upper and lowercase letters, special characters, and numbers

-      Create a password that is easy to remember but hard to guess

-      Example passwords might include "TellmeM@re" or "let$g@Home"

Urdu Script

Apke Alfa ya IB account ke liye ek mazboot aur secure password banane ke liye, nechy mention guidelines follow kijiye:

·         Apka password kam se kam 8 characters ka hona chahiye

·         Dictionary words aur phrases jaise "Password123" use karny sy avoid karain

·         Upper aur lower case alphabets, khas characters aur numbers ka istemal karein

·         Aisa password banayein jo yaad rakhne mein aasan ho lekin guess karna mushkil

·         Urdumay misaal ke taur par, "TellmeM@re" ya "let$g@Home" aise passwords ho sakte hain

IB/Alfa Username Criteria

English Script

When creating a username for IB/Alfa, please note the following criteria:

-      The username should be a minimum of 6 characters and a maximum of 10 characters

-      Only alphanumeric characters (letters and numbers) are allowed in the username

-      Please avoid using any special characters or spaces in the username

These guidelines will help ensure that your IB/Alfa username is secure and easy to remember.

 

Urdu Script

IB/Alfa ke liye ek username banate waqt, neechay diye gayi guidelines ko follow karain:

·         Username kam se kam 6 aur ziyada se ziyada 10 characters ka hona chahiye

·         Sirf alphanumeric characters (letters aur numbers) username mein istemal kar sakte hain

·         Username mein koi khaas characters ya khali jagah istemal na karein

Ye hidayat apki madad karegi ke apka IB/Alfa username mazboot aur yaadgar ho aur iska istemal aasaan ho.

The Alfa/IB login password is sent in two parts to the user's registered email address and mobile number, which must be combined to complete the password on the login page. After successful login, users are prompted to change their password immediately. This is to ensure the security of their account and to prevent any unauthorized access.

Difference

Difference between Islamic and Conventional accounts

Conventional Banking

Bank Alfalah offers a comprehensive deposit product suite designed to meet the diverse needs of our customers. Our deposit products include a range of interest and non-interest bearing accounts aimed at providing daily banking services through our vast branch network, transactional privileges and self-service digital banking solutions.

Islamic Banking

Bank Alfalah Islamic Banking offers a wide range of Shariah-compliant deposit accounts. These include basic banking accounts, term deposits, foreign currency and structured savings products, all designed while observing Shariah principles.

 

Conventional Banking

Islamic Banking

Bank Alfalah offers a comprehensive deposit product suite designed to meet the diverse needs of our customers. Our deposit products include a range of interest and non-interest bearing accounts aimed at providing daily banking services through our vast branch network, transactional privileges and self-service digital banking solutions.

Bank Alfalah Islamic Banking offers a wide range of Shariah-compliant deposit accounts. These include basic banking accounts, term deposits, foreign currency and structured savings products, all designed while observing Shariah principles.

 

 

Difference between Current Account & Saving Account

Current Account: it is a bank account that you can take money from at any time and that usually earns no interest.

Saving Account: it is an account that allows you to store cash securely and also you to earn interest on your money.

 

Alfa Upgraded Features

Accounts & Overview

Dear Customer, to access the overview screen, you can tap on account balance on Alfa app. This will give you an overview of your account balance and recent transactions.

 

Mini Statement Check via Alfa App:

Dear Customer, you can check your account mini statement through Alfa application, please follow the steps below:

·         Login Alfa Application

·         Tap on "Show Quick Balance"

·         Tap on your Account Balance

·         Tap on "View Statement"

·         You may be able to see the statement of your account accordingly.

 

IBFT

English Script

Dear Customer, for sending money using Alfa app. The steps are as follows:

·         Log in to the Alfa app

·         Tap on "Send Money"

·         Select the method of payment (e.g. Bank)

·         Choose the bank you want to send money to

·         Enter the required details on the screen and tap on "Next"

·         Verify the details and tap on "Send Now"

·         Tap "Yes" to proceed with the transaction

·         Enter the One-time activation code (OTAC)

·         You will receive a notification of successful transaction

Urdu Script

Alfa app istemaal kar ke paise bhejne ke liye, neeche diye gaye steps follow karein:

-         Alfa app mein login karein

-         "Send Money" par tap karein

-         Payment ka method select (maslan Bank)

-         Woh bank select karein, jis mein paise bhejna hai

-         Screen par zaroori details enter karein aur "Next" par tap karein

-         Details ko verify karein aur "Send Now" par tap karein

-         Transaction ke liye "Yes" par tap karein

-         One-time activation code (OTAC) enter karein

-         Aapko successful transaction ka notification mil jayega

 

Mobile Top Up- Prepaid/Postpaid

English Script

Dear Customer, for topping up mobile balance using Alfa app. The steps are as follows:

·         Log in to the Alfa app

·         Tap on "Mobile Top Up"

·         Enter or insert the mobile number you want to top up and tap on "Next"

·         Select the carrier of the mobile number you entered

·         Enter or select the amount you want to top up and tap on "Next"

·         Verify the details and tap on "Next"

·         Select the payment source and tap on "Pay Now"

·         Tap "Yes" to proceed with the transaction

·         Enter the One-time activation code (OTAC)

·         You will receive a notification of successful transaction

 

Urdu Script

Alfa app ke zariyemobile balance top-up krny k lye darj zail iqdmat kren:

-         Alfa app mein login kren

-         "Mobile Top Up" par tap kren

-         Ap jis mobile number ko top-up krna chahty hen, usy enter kren aur "Next" par tap kren

-         Carrier of the mobile number ko select kren

-         Ap jtna balance top-up krna chahty hen, wo select kren aur "Next" par tap kren

-         Details ko verify kren aur "Next" par tap kren

-         Payment source ko select kren aur "Pay Now" par tap kren

-         "Yes" par tap kren transaction jari rakhny k lye

-         One-time activation code (OTAC) enter kren

-         Ap ko successful transaction ki notification receive ho jaye gi

Bill Payments- UBP

English Script

Dear Customer, for making bill payments using the Alfa app. The steps are as follows:

·         Log in to the Alfa app

·         Tap on "Bill Payments"

·         Select the type of bill you want to pay (e.g. electricity, gas, etc)

·         Select the company for which you want to pay the bill

·         Enter the consumer number and tap on "Next"

·         Verify the details and tap on "Next"

·         Select the payment source and tap on "Pay Now"

·         Tap "Yes" to proceed with the transaction

·         You will receive a notification of successful transaction

Urdu Script

Alfa app se bill payments karne ke liye neeche diye gaye steps follow karein:

·         Alfa app mein log in karein

·         "Bill Payments" par tap karein

·         Jis bill ko pay karna hai us ka type select karein (jaise ke electricity, gas, etc)

·         Jis company ke bill ko pay karna hai us ko select karein

·         Consumer number enter karein aur "Next" par tap karein

·         Details verify karein aur "Next" par tap karein

·         Payment source select karein aur "Pay Now" par tap karein

·         Transaction proceed karne ke liye "Yes" par tap karein

·         Aapko successful transaction ke notification mil jayega

 

Complaints

English Script

Dear Customer, for lodging a complaint using the Alfa app. The steps are as follows:

·         Open the side menu in the Alfa app

·         Tap on "Complaints"

·         Tap on "Lodge a Complaint" or "My Complaints" to check the status of previous complaints

·         Select the product related to the complaint and enter a summary of the complaint

·         Tap on "Next"

·         You will receive a notification of the successful submission of your complaint

 

Urdu Script

Alfa app se complaint lodge karne ke liye neeche diye gaye steps follow karein:

·         Alfa app ke side menu ko open karein

·         "Complaints" par tap karein

·         "Lodge a Complaint" ya "My Complaints" par tap karein previous complaints ke status check karne ke liye

·         Complaint se related product select karein aur complaint ke summary enter karein

·         "Next" par tap karein

·         Aapko apne complaint ke successful submission ke notification mil jayega

·         Go to the "Services" section

·         Select "Cheque book"

·         Select the account number you want to apply the cheque book

·         Select the number of pages you want in the cheque book (25/50/100)

·         Submit the request

-         "Cheque book" ko select kren

-         Wo account number select kren jis k ly ap cheque book request krna chahty hain

-         Cheque book mein kitni pages hon (25/50/100) select kren

-         Request submit kren

 

 

WHT Statement

 

English Script

To apply withholding tax on their account through Alfa app, please follow these steps:

·         Log in to the Alfa App

·         Go to the "Services" section

·         Select "WHT Condition"

·         Select the account number you want to apply the WHT (Withholding Tax) to

·         Select the type of WHT (Withholding Tax) you want to apply (WHT on Profit/WHT on withdrawal/WHT on Foreign Transaction)

·         Select the duration of the WHT (30 days/60 days/90 days)

 

Urdu Script

Account par withholding tax through Alfa app apply krny k lye nechy mentioned steps follow karain:

-         Alfa App mein login kren

-         "Services" section mein jayen

-         "WHT Condition" ko select kren

-         Wo account number select kren jis par ap WHT (Withholding Tax) apply krna chahty hen

-         WHT (Withholding Tax) ka type select kren (WHT on Profit/WHT on withdrawal/WHT on Foreign Transaction)

-         WHT ki duration select kren (30 days/60 days/90 days)

WHT Certificate

English Script

To request for a WHT Certificate through Alfa app, please follow these steps:

·         Log in to the Alfa App

·         Go to the "Services" section

·         Select "WHT Certificate"

·         Select the account number you  want to generate the WHT (Withholding Tax) certificate for

·         Select the type of WHT (Withholding Tax) you want to generate the certificate for (WHT on Profit/WHT on withdrawal/WHT on Foreign Transaction)

·         Select the "from" and "to" dates for which you want to generate the certificate

·         Click on "Generate" to complete the process

 

 

Urdu Script

"WHT Certificate request through Alfa app karne ke liye, please ye steps follow karein:

-         Alfa App mein login karein

-         "Services" section mein jayein

-         "WHT Certificate" ko select karein

-         Account number select karain jis kay liye aap WHT (Withholding Tax) certificate banana chahte hain

-         WHT (Withholding Tax) ke type ko select karin jis kay liye aap certificate banana chahte hain (WHT on Profit/WHT on withdrawal/WHT on Foreign Transaction)

-         "From" aur "To" dates select karin jin kay liye aap certificate banana chahte hain

-         Process pura karne ke liye "Generate" pe click karein."

 

Debit Card PIN Change

 

English Script

To change the PIN of your Debit card through Alfa app, please follow these steps:

 

-         Login to Alfa App

-         Go to "Services"

-         Select "Card Management"

-         Select "Debit/Wallet Card"

-         Select "PIN Change"

-         Enter the OTAC#s received via Email & SMS

-         Confirm the changes

 

Urdu Script

"Alfa app ke zariye apne Debit card kay PIN ko change karny ke liye, please ye steps follow karein:

 

-         Alfa app mein login karein

-         "Services" mein jayein

-         "Card Management" ko select karein

-         "Debit/Wallet Card" ko select karein

-         "PIN Change" ko select karein

-         Email aur SMS ke zariye prapt hone wale OTAC#s daalein

English Script

-         Login to Alfa App

-         Go to "Services"

-         Select "Card Management"

-         Select "Debit/Wallet Card"

-         Select "Block"

-         Select "Temporary"

-         Submit the request

-         "Debit/Wallet Card" ko select karein

English Script

 

To request for an E-Statement for Account, please follow these steps

·         Login to Alfa App

·         Go to "Services"

·         Select "E-Statement"

·         Select the account for which you want to request e-statement

·         Enter the title for the statement

·         Enter the email address where you want to receive the e-statement

·         Select the frequency of receiving the e-statement

·         Agree to the terms and conditions

·         Submit the request

-         Alfa App mein login karain

-         “Services" mein jayein

-         "E-Statement" select karein

-         Us account ko select karein jis ke liye aap E-Statement darkhwast karna chahte hain

-         Statement ke liye title enter karein

-         Email address enter karein jahan aap E-Statement receive karna chahte hain

-         E-Statement receive karne ki frequency select karein

-         Terms and conditions se muttafiq hon

-         Darkhwast submit karein

 

Orbit Transfer

English Script

 

 

Dear Customer, to request for an Orbit Transfer, please follow these steps

·         Log in to the Alfa App

·         Go to "Orbits"

·         Select "Transfer"

·         Enter the CNIC# of the person you want to transfer orbits to

·         Fetch the title of the person

·         Enter the number of orbits you want to transfer

·         Submit the request

·         Enter the OTAC numbers received via Email & SMS to confirm the transfer

 

Urdu Script

Orbit transfer karne ke liye neechay diye gaye steps follow karein:

-         Alfa App mein login karein

-         "Orbits" par click

-         "Transfer" ka intikhab karein

-         Wo shakhs jisko aap orbits transfer karna chahte hain, uski CNIC# darj karein

-         Shakhs ka title hasil karein

-         Aap orbits ki miqdar darj karein jo aap transfer karna chahte hain

-         Darkhast jama karwayein

-         Aap ko email aur SMS ke zariye mojood OTAC numbers darj karna hoga taakeh orbits ki transfer ki tasdeeq ki ja sake

English Script

To request for an Account Statement, please follow these steps

·         Log in to the Alfa App

·         Click on "Quick Balance"

·         Click on "View Statement"

·         Select the date range for the statement (up to 3 years)

·         Click on "Send Now" to receive the statement

-         Alfa App login karain

-         Account statement dekhne ya download karne ke liye “Quick Balance” par click karain

-         Statement leny karnay ke liye account select karain

-         Statement ki date range select karain (3 saal tak ki maximum)

-         “Send Now” par par click karain

·         Log in to the Alfa App

·         Go to "Services"

·         Select "Account Maintenance Certificate"

·         Select the account for which you want to generate the certificate

·         Agree to view the charges (Note: PKR 225 (16%+FED) will be charged from your account)

·         Generate the certificate

-         Alfa App mein log in karein

-         "Services" par jayen

-         "Account Maintenance Certificate" ko select karain

-         Wo account select karain jiske liye aap certificate banana chahte hain

-         Charges dekhne ke liye agree karein (Note: PKR 225 (16%+FED) aapke account se kata jayega)

-         Certificate generate karein

 

Phone Tagging

English Script

 

To disable the phone tagging option in the Alfa app. The steps to disable phone tagging are as follows:

·         Log in to the Alfa app

·         Open the left side menu

·         Select "My Alfa"

·         Select the 3rd option "Alfapay-QR"

·         Select "Deactivate Phone Tagging"

·         Verify the OTAC (One-Time-Access-Code) that is sent to the customer's registered email or mobile number

 

 

Urdu Script

 

Alfa app mein phone tagging option ko disable karne ke liye, please ye steps follow karein:

-         Alfa app mein login karein

-         Left side menu ko open karein

-         "My Alfa" ko select karain

-         3rd option "Alfapay-QR" ko select karein

-         "Deactivate Phone Tagging" ko select karein

-         Customer ke registered email ya mobile number par bheje gaye OTAC (One-Time-Access-Code) ko verify karein

 

English Script

 

How to Book Alfa Term Deposit?

·         Login on to Alfa and go to ‘Savings’

·         Go to Alfa Term Deposit

·         Select Alfa Term Deposit Conventional

·         Fill out the fields based on your preference

·         Accept T&Cs and Proceed

·         Alfa Term Deposit has been booked

 

Urdu Script

 

Alfa Term Deposit kaise book karein?

-         Alfa mein login karein aur 'Savings' par jayein

-         Alfa Term Deposit par jayein

-         Alfa Term Deposit Conventional ko select karein

-         Apni pasand ke hisaab se fields bharein

-         T&C ko accept karein aur proceed karein

-         Alfa Term Deposit book ho gaya hai

Payments

Credit Card Payments (BAFL)

English Script

 

To make payments of your Credit Card (BAFL), please follow these steps:

·         Log in to Alfa

·         Tap on "Payments"

·         Tap on "Credit Card Payments"

·         Tap on "Bank Alfalah"

·         Select the account from which you want to make the payment

·         Select the credit card for which you want to make the payment

·         Select the CNIC number

·         Tap on "Next"

·         Select the payment option (statement balance/Minimum Amount Due/Other)

·         Tap on "Pay now" to complete the transaction

 

Urdu Script

 

Apne Credit Card (BAFL) ke payments karne ke liye, please ye steps follow karein:

-         Alfa mein login karein

-         "Payments" par tap karein

-         "Credit Card Payments" par tap karein

-         "Bank Alfalah" par tap karein

-         Wo account select karain jisse aap payment karna chahte hain

-         Wo credit card select karain jisse aap payment karna chahte hain

-         CNIC number select karain

-         "Next" par tap karein

-         Payment option select karain (statement balance/Minimum Amount Due/Other)

-         Transaction complete karne ke liye "Pay now" par tap karein

English Script

 

To make payments of your Credit Card (Other), please follow these steps:

·         Log in to Alfa

·         Tap on "Payments"

·         Tap on "Credit Card Payments"

·         Tap on "Other Bank Credit Card"

·         Enter the credit card number of the credit card for which you want to make the payment

·         Tap on "Next"

·         Tap on "Pay now" to complete the transaction

-         Alfa mein login karein

-         "Payments" par tap karein

-         "Credit Card Payments" par tap karein

-         "Other Bank Credit Card" par tap karein

-         Credit card number enter karein jisse aap payment karna chahte hain

-         "Next" par tap karein

-         Transaction complete karne ke liye "Pay now" par tap karein

-         Tap on "Fetch Details"

-         Tap on "Submit" to complete the transaction

-         "Payments" par tap karein

-         Details fetch karne ke liye "Fetch details" par tap karein

-         Details verify karein aur payment amount enter karein

-         Transaction complete karne ke liye "Submit" par tap karein

Add Account

English Script

To add a new account to Alfa App profile, by providing the account number, please follow these steps:

·         Log in to the Alfa App

·         Open the side menu

·         Select "My Alfa"

·         Select "My Alfa App"

·         Select "Add Account"

·         Enter the account number of the account you want to add

·         Fetch the title of the account

·         Enter the OTAC#s received via Email & SMS

·         Submit the request

 

Urdu Script

Mauziz Sarif, aap Alfa App profile mein naya account add karne ke liye, account number provide karke yeh steps follow karein:

-         Alfa App mein log in karein

-         Side menu ko open karein

-         "My Alfa" select karein

-         "My Alfa App" select karein

-         "Add Account" select karein

-         Jis account ka number add karna chahte hain, uska account nnumber enter karein

-         Account ka title fetch karein

-         Email aur SMS ke zariye receive ki gayi OTAC#s enter karein

-         Request submit karein

-         Approval hone ke baad, naya account aapke Alfa App profile mein add ho jayega

 

Login PIN

English Script

To create a login PIN for Alfa App profile, by providing a desired 4 digit PIN, confirm the PIN and then submit the request.

·         Log in to the Alfa App

·         Open the side menu

·         Select "My Alfa"

·         Select "My Alfa App"

·         Select "Create login PIN"

·         Enter the desired login PIN

·         Confirm the login PIN

·         Submit the request

 

Urdu Script

Aap Alfa App profile ke liye login PIN banane ke liye, desired 4 digit PIN provide karke, confirm karein aur phir request submit karein:

-         Alfa App mein log in karein

-         Side menu ko open karein

-         "My Alfa" select karein

-         "My Alfa App" select karein

-         "Create login PIN" select karein

-         Desired login PIN enter karein

-         Login PIN ko confirm karein

-         Request submit karein

-         Bank se PIN creation ke successful confirmation ka wait karein

-         Login PIN ka istemal karein Alfa App mein secure log in karne ke liye

Change Package

English Script

Dear Customer, to upgrade or downgrade your daily package limit in the Alfa App, it can be done by selecting the desired package limit, entering the one-time-access-code and submitting the request.

·         Log in to the Alfa App.

·         Open the side menu.

·         Select "My Alfa".

·         Select "My Alfa App".

·         Select "Package".

·         Select the desired package limit.

·         Enter the OTAC#s received via Email & SMS.

·         Submit the request.

 

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, Apna Alfa package upgrade karny ke lye nechy diya agaya process follow karain:

·         Alfa App login karain.

·         Side menu par click karain.

·         My Alfa par click karain.

·         My Alfa App par click karain.

·         Package par click karain.

·         Apni desired package limit select Karin.

·         OTAC#s enter karain.

·         Request ubmit karain.

English Script

Dear Customer, to view your user activity on the Alfa App for the last 30 days, please follow the below steps:

·         Log in to the Alfa App

·         Open the side menu

·         Select "My Alfa"

·         Select "My Alfa App"

·         Select "User Activity"

·         View the activity of last 30 days

 

Urdu Script

Aap Alfa App par last 30-din ke user activity ko view karne ke liye, niche diye gaye steps follow karein:

 

- Alfa App mein log in karein

- Side menu ko open karein

- "My Alfa" select karein

- "My Alfa App" select karein

- "User Activity" select karein

- Last 30 din ke activity ko view karein

- Aap apne activity ko date ya transaction type ke according filter bhi kar sakte hain

- Kisi bhi particular transaction ke baare mein janne ke liye, uspar simply tap karein

 

 

 

 

Digital Biometric

 

English Script

Bank Alfalah customers can utilize the Alfa app to perform biometric verification and increase their daily transaction limit to Rs 15000. However, if a customer desires to use a higher daily limit based on their Alfa/Internet banking package, they will need to complete biometric verification via one of two options:

1.    Visit a Bank Alfalah ATM or CCDM and select "Value-added services" followed by "Alfa verification" to complete the biometric verification process

2.    Alternatively, the customer may visit their nearest Bank Alfalah branch to complete the biometric verification process

By completing the biometric verification process through either option, customers can benefit from a higher daily transaction limit, based on their specific Alfa/Internet banking package.

 

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, apko yeh bataya jata hai ke Bank Alfalah ke customers Alfa app se digital biometric verification kar k Rs 15000 tak ke transactions kar sakte hain. Agar zyada limit chahte hain to nearby ATM/CCDM ke through “Value-added services” ka option select karain then “Alfa verification par click karain biometric perform karny ke lye ya branch visit kar ke verification karwa sakte hain.bhi biometric verification karwa sakte hain.

How to check Alfa package

 

English Script

You can check your Alfa package by following these steps:

 

·         Log in to the Alfa app on your mobile device

·         Navigate to the "Settings"

·         Click on "My Package” that displays your current Alfa/Internet banking package details

 

Urdu Script

Apna Alfa package check karne ke liye, ye steps follow karein:

-         Apne mobile device mein Alfa app mein login karein

-         "Settings" mein jayein

-         "My Package" par click karein jo aapke current Alfa/Internet banking package ke details dikhayega

 

Perform your Alfa App Biometric Verification without any hassle

Simple Steps;

·         Visit selected ATM/CCDM

·         Press any key on screen

·         Select “Value Added Service”

·         Click on Alfa Activation

·         Enter CNIC Number

·         Perform Biometric Verification

·         Login on Alfa App using temporary password/OTAC received on email & SMS

 

Urdu Script

Alfa App Biometric Verification ki sahulat se faida uthane ke liye, yeh asaan se steps follow karen:

-         Selected ATM/CCDM par visit karain

-         Kisi bhi screen key ko press karen

-         "Value Added Service" ko select karain

-         Alfa Activation ko click karen

-         CNIC Number enter karen

-         Biometric Verification karen

-         Alfa App par temporary password/OTAC ko email & SMS se prapt karke login karen

AKD Securities Portfolio Payment

English Script

 

To invest in an AKD portfolio through the latest version of Alfa, you can follow these steps:

 

·         Log into the Alfa application

·         Navigate to the Save & Invest section

·         Select the AKD Securities Limited option

·         Enter the portfolio number and retrieve the title information

·         Enter the One Time Authorization Code (OTAC)

·         Upon successful completion, the existing portfolio information will be displayed

·         The transaction will be recorded in the statement with a description of the investment made

 

Urdu Script

AKD Securities Portfolio ke liye Alfa ke zariye invest karne aur payments karne ke liye, ye steps follow karein:

 

-         Alfa application mein login karein

-         "Save & Invest" section mein jayein

-         "AKD Securities Limited" option select karein

-         Portfolio number enter karein aur title information retrieve karein

-         Apne registered email ya mobile number par aaye One Time Authorization Code (OTAC) enter karein

-         Details ko verify karein aur apni desired payment method se payment karein

For Roshan Digital Account

Naya Pakistan Certificate Investment Steps

English Script

Dear Customer, you can invest in Naya Pakistan Certificate through internet banking in IPS option and through Alfa App in saving > IPS option.

Kindly go through the process in order to invest in Naya Pakistan Certificates.

1.    Once on the Home Screen of your Internet Banking, click on IPS.

2.    Select your Roshan Digital account number from the dropdown menu then click Proceed.

3.    Select the NPC Certificate you want to purchase. Click buy in the action column of NPC.

4.    Enter the purchase value of certificates, and click Calculate. Please ensure that for PKR Roshan Digital accounts, the face value is in multiples of PKR 10,000; and for FCY Roshan Digital accounts the face value is in multiples of USD 1,000.

5.    Purchase settlement amount will populate accordingly which will be deducted from the Available Balance. Please review, then click Buy.

6.    Click “Submit” to generate a request for purchasing NPC.

7.    The request to purchase NPC will be forwarded to SBP and the certificate will be credited into the account shortly. The customer can view this request in the “Un-Settled Deal(s)” Section.

8.    The customer can view this request in the “Un-Settled Deal(s)” Section.  After receiving the NPC, the customer can view it in “My portfolio” section.

 

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, ap Naya Pakistan Certificate men investment karny ke lye internet banking ke through IPS option ka istemal kar skty hain aur Alfa App ke through saving men ja kar IPS option istemal kar satky hain.

1.    Internet banking ki home screen par IPS par click karain.

2.    Dorpdowm menu sy apna Roshan Digital Account number enter karain aur proceed par click karain.

3.    NPC certificate select karain jo ap purchase krna chahty hain.NPC ke action column men buy par click karain.

4.    Certificates ki purchase value enter karain. Kindly ensure karain PKR Roshan Digital account ke lye face value PKR 10,000 ki multiple ho aur FCY Roshan Digital Account ke lye face value USD 1,000 ke multiple ho.

5.    Purchase settlement amount populate hojaygi jo ke available balance sy kaat li k jaygi, please review karain then buy par click karain.

6.    NPC purchase ki request generate karny ke lye “Submit” par click karain.

7.    NPC purchase karny ke lye generated request SBP ko bhej di jaygi aur certificate jald ki account men credit kar diya jayga. Customer is request ko “Un-settled Deal(s)” section mein dekh skty hain.

8.    Customer is request ko “Un-settled Deal(s) section mein dekh skty hain. NPC receive honey ke baad customer “My portfolio” section men dekh skty hain.

Central Depository Company Investment Steps

English Script

Dear Customer, you can invest in Central Depository Company investment through internet banking in IPS option and through Alfa App in saving > IPS option.

1.    Once on the Home Screen of your Internet Banking, Click on Investment for Overseas.

2.    Select Central Depository Company.

3.    From the Dropdown menu, select preferred Broker to open your CDC Account.

4.    Agree to the Declaration.

5.    Press Submit.

6.    A Popup will appear on your screen once the request has been submitted.

7.    A Popup will appear on your screen once the CDC account has been successfully created.

8.    To invest in stocks through CDC after account creation, customers can transfer funds to CDC Account by clicking on the CDC option in Investment for Overseas Section on the home page.

9.    To invest in stocks through CDC after account creation, customers can transfer funds to CDC Account by selecting their CDC account.

10.  In case of FCVA, it should return a popup message as investment in CDC is only allowed for NRVA account holders.

11.  Once on the portal, NRVA customers can enter the amount that needs to be transferred to your CDC Account.

12.  Press Submit.

13.  A confirmation popup will appear on the screen once the funds have been transferred to your CDC Account.

14.  Customers can now visit CDC Portal to invest in Pakistan Stock Exchange.

 

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, Central Depository Company mein investment ke lye ap internet banking mein IPS option aur Alfa App men saving > IPS option ke zariye invest kar skty hain.

1.    Apni Internet Banking ki home screen par aney ke baad, bairoon mulk sarmaya karai (overseas investment) par click kjiye.

2.    Central Depository Company select kjiye.

3.    Dropdown menu sy apna CDC account open karney ke lye preferred Brocker select kjiye.

4.    Declaration par agree kjiye.

5.    Submit par click kjiye.

6.    Request submit honey ke baad apki screen par Pop up appear hoga.

7.    CDC account create honey ke baad apki screen par apki screen par Pop up appear hoga.

8.    Account banany ke baad CDC ke zariye stocks mein investments karny ke lye, customer home page par investment for overseas section mein CDC option par click kar ke CDC account mein apni raqam(amount) transfer kar skty hain.

9.    Account banany ke baad CDC ke zariye stocks mein investments karny ke lye, customer apny CDC account ko select kar ke CDC account sy amount transfer kar sakty hain.

10.  FCVA ki surat mein, ek pop up message ayega ke investments CDC sy sirf NRVA account holders ke lye hain.

11.  Portal par, NRVA customers who amount enter kr skty hain jo apny CDC account men transfer karna chahty hain.

12.  Submit par click kijiye.

13.  Ap ke CDC account mein amount transfer ke baad screen par ek confirmation pop up ayega.

14.  Customers ab Pakistan Stock Exchange mein investment ke lye CDC portal par ja skty hain.

Investment in Pakistan Stock Exchange

Bank Alfalah Roshan Digital Account customers can now invest in Pakistan Stock Exchange (PSX) through their Bank Alfalah Roshan Digital (PKR) Account. This is an ideal opportunity for non-resident Pakistanis to invest in Pakistan’s capital market and benefit from the competitive returns offered by PSX while participating in the growth of their native homeland’s economy. Overseas Pakistanis can choose from a wide array of brokerage houses listed on the Exchange in several different sectors, build their investment portfolio and reap the potential rewards of investing in PSX.

Account Opening Process

Open your Bank Alfalah Roshan Digital Account through the link https://invest.bankalfalah.com/ops/Index.html

Select your brokerage firm (List of Available Brokers Provided Below)

Accept the Terms and conditions mentioned. (This will enable us to share your information with the selected broker and capital market entities to open your brokerage account & CDC depository account).

Add funds into your RDA brokerage account. (This will transfer funds from your Bank Alfalah Roshan Digital Account into your Bank Alfalah Stock Market Roshan Digital Account and enable you to invest).

 

 

Funds Repatriation Steps

English Script

To repatriate funds back to an international bank account, you may use the Investment Portfolio Securities (IPS) option through our online banking service. Please follow these steps:

-         Login to your internet banking account and select the Investment Portfolio Securities option

-         Select your RDA (Resident Foreign Currency) account and click on Proceed

-         Click on Proceed again to proceed with the transaction

-         On the next page, click on the Repatriation option

-         You will be directed to the Repatriation page where you will need to provide your personal details, beneficiary details, and remittance details. Once all the required information is provided, you may proceed by clicking the Repatriate button

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, ap IPS option mein internet banking ko use karty hoye RDA account sy apny international bank account mein funds repatriate kar skengy.

-         Internet Banking par login kjiye aur Investment Portfolio Securities ko muntakhib karain

-         RDA account select karain aur agey proceed kijiye

-         Proceed par click kjiye

-         Repatriation par click kjiye

Remitting Account Number is acutally the international bank account through which you can repatriate funds back to international bank account using Roshan Digital Account

  

INPC RDA

Islamic Naya Pakistan Certificates (for Roshan Digital Account Customers)

Bank Alfalah Islamic is proud to serve Pakistan in its growth and prosperity by facilitating Islamic Roshan Digital Account customers with this attractive investment opportunity with ease & convenience through a simple online process. Islamic Naya Pakistan Certificates (INPCs) are high-return yielding sovereign investment certificates issued by the State Bank of Pakistan (SBP) for Foreign Currency Value Account holders (FCVA) and Pakistani Rupee Value Account holders (NRVA). Along with lucrative returns for investors, these certificates also provide NRPs with an opportunity to contribute towards development of a progressive Pakistan. Customers have the option to subscribe to various tenors ranging from 3-Months to 5-Years.

Key Features

·         Denominated in PKR, USD, GBP and Euro

·         Short and long-term investment tenors of 3-Months, 6-Months, 12-Months, 3-Years and 5-Years

·         Fully and easily repatriable

·         No Zakat deduction

·         Premature encashment option (after at least one month of investment)

·         Option to raise Financing against Naya Pakistan Certificates pledged as a security.

·         Expected returns of up to 7% on USD denominated certificates and up to 11% on PKR denominated certificates

The rate of return for INPCs will be communicated by the State Bank of Pakistan from time to time, which can be viewed at the following link: https://www.sbp.org.pk/RDA/index.html

Minimum Investment

·         USD Denominated: USD 5,000 and integral multiples of USD 1,000

·         PKR Denominated: PKR 100,000 and integral multiples of PKR 10,000

·         GBP Denominated: GBP 5,000 and integral multiples of GBP 1,000

·         Euro Denominated: Euro 5,000 and integral multiples of Euro 1,000

 

For any further queries, be sure to check out our FAQs, email us at contactus@bankalfalah.com or contact us at our 24/7 dedicated helpline; +92 21 111 225 226.

For further information on Roshan Digital Account from State Bank of Pakistan, please visit http://www.sbp.org.pk/RDA/index.html or email at RDAsupport@sbp.org.pk

NPC RDA

Conventional Naya Pakistan Certificates (for Roshan Digital Account Customers)

Bank Alfalah is proud to serve Pakistan in its growth and prosperity by facilitating Roshan Digital Account customers with this attractive investment opportunity with ease & convenience through a simple online process.Naya Pakistan Certificates (NPCs) are high-interest yielding sovereign investment certificates issued by the State Bank of Pakistan (SBP) for Foreign Currency Value Account holders (FCVA) and Pakistani Rupee Value Account holders (NRVA).Along with lucrative returns for investors, these certificates also provide NRPs with an opportunity to contribute towards development of a progressive Pakistan. Customers have the option to subscribe to various tenors ranging from 3-Months to 5-Years.

Key Features

·         Offered in multiple currencies; PKR, USD, GBP, and EUR.

·         Short and long-term investment tenors of 3-Months, 6-Months, 12-Months, 3-Years and 5-Years

·         Fully and easily repatriable

·         No Zakat deduction

·         Premature encashment option

·         Option to raise Financing against Naya Pakistan Certificates pledged as a security.

·         High returns of up to 11% on your investments in multiple currency denominated certificates

The rate of return for NPCs will be communicated by the State Bank of Pakistan from time to time, which can be viewed at the following link: https://www.sbp.org.pk/RDA/index.html

Minimum Investment

·         USD/GBP/EUR Denominated Certificates – Min USD/GBP/EUR 5,000 with multiples of 1,000 thereon.

·         PKR Denominated Certificates – Min PKR 100,000 with multiples of PKR 10,000 thereon.

For any further queries, be sure to check out our FAQs, email us at contactus@bankalfalah.com or contact us at our 24/7 dedicated helpline; 0092 21 111 225 226.

For further information on Roshan Digital Account from State Bank of Pakistan, please visit http://www.sbp.org.pk/RDA/index.html or email at RDAsupport@sbp.org.pk

ALFA Mall

Alfa Mall Order Trakcer

English Script

Dear Customer, you can check the status of an order that you have placed on Alfa Mall through the Alfa app/Internet Banking. The steps are as follows:

·         Log in to the Alfa app

·         Go to the "Alfa Mall" section

·         Tap on "My Account"

·         Tap on "My Dashboard"

·         Tap on "Recent Order Details"

You can also track your order status by calling the bank's helpline at 021/042 111 225 111

Urdu Script

·         Alfa login kijiye > Alfa Mall par click kijiyie > My Account par jay > My Dashboard > Recent Order Details

Ya mazeed ap hamari helpline 021 111 225 111 par call kar ke bhi check kar skty hain.

 

AlfaMall offers several payment methods for Bank Alfalah customers.

1.    Pay by BAF account

2.    Pay by Alfa Wallet

3.    Pay using Credit Card

4.    Pay using Orbit Points

5.    Combination payment – Split the payment between your preferred mode of payment

6.    SBS Installments

Alfa Mall related

All the products displayed and provided on the platform belong to the merchants and are not the property of Bank Alfalah. AlfaMall is a Bank Alfalah platform providing you access to multiple merchants ('sellers'), who are providing their goods & services to you.

Live Photo Guidelines

English Script

Dear Customer, following are the guidelines for RDA customers while taking live photo on RDA portal in order to complete journey.

 

1.    Customer to hold CNIC or his/her Picture ID in the hand while taking selfie - picture. Customer face along with the ID should be captured in the frame.

2.    Customer to hold a book or paper/newspaper in one hand while taking picture. Customer face along with the book/ paper should be captured in the frame.

3.    Customer to place index finger on the cheek while taking selfie –picture.

4.    Customer to hold a pen/ pencil in one hand while taking picture. Customer face along with the pen/pencil should be captured in the frame.

5.    Customer to hold Wallet/ key(s) in one hand while taking picture. Customer face along with the wallet/ key(s) should be captured in the frame.

Urdu Script

Muaziz Saarif, RDA customers’ RDA account opening journey complete karny ke lye RDA portal par live photo nechy mentioned instructions ko follow karty hoye kar skengy.

1.    Customer selfie – picture lety hoye CNIC ya uski picture ID hath men pakry. Customer ka face ID ke sath frame men captured hona chahye.

2.    Customer picture lety hoye book or paper/newspaper hat men pakren. Customer ka face book/paper ke sath frame mein captured hona chahaye.

3.    Customer picture lety hoye shahdad ki ungli gaal par rakhen.

4.    Customer picture lety hoye pen/pencil ek hath men pakren. Customer ka face pen/pencil ke sath frame mein captured hona chahaye.

5.    Customer picture lety hoye wallet/key(s) ek hath men pakren. Customer ka face wallet/key(s) ke sath frame mein captured hona chahaye.

 

If RDA customer unable to complete application journey as stuck on live photo via I-Phone so, please guide the below procedure to customer for enabling mobile camera over I-Phone.

1.    From a Home screen on your Apple IPhone, navigate: Setting > Safari > If unavailable, swipe left to access the App library.

2.    From the ‘Safari’ menu screen tap Advanced > May require scrolling to the bottom of the screen.

3.    Tap the JavaScript switch to turn ON or OFF.

CRS

The Common Reporting Standard (CRS) is a new global information gathering and reporting requirement for financial institutions in participating countries, to help fight against tax evasion and protect the integrity of tax systems. For that purpose, Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) issued the standards for automatic exchange of financial information

How to Fill the form in Part A of form, write your “Full Name, Current residential address, Country, Postal Code, Date of Birth, City of Birth, Country of Birth and your mailing address”

In Part B of form, Under the heading of “Country/Jurisdiction of Tax Residence”, In your case as you mentioned that you are currently residing and working in Bahrain as per proof of income, so you should write “Bahrain” in that field, and in the next Column “Tax Identification Number (TIN) or Equivalent Number” mention any one of these equivalent numbers for e.g. (NTN, social security/insurance number, citizen/personal identification/service code/number or resident registration number). (If you don’t have any of these mentioned equivalent numbers) then please select reason A, B or C (which is applicable), if B is selected then also provide reason for not obtaining the equivalent numbers from authorities.

Part C: is where you will sign and write your name and date of signing the form.

Virtual Debit Card

To generate a virtual debit card (VDC) with Alfa Bank:

·         Log in to your Alfa Bank account

·         Go to the "Cards" section

·         Select "Debit Card"

·         Generate your VDC

Bank Alfalah Virtual Debit Card” is a digital card that allows you to make online eCommerce purchases internationally. Bank Alfalah Virtual Debit Card, powered by MasterCard, can be generated instantly by customer through Alfa App. Just like any Debit Card, you will get your own Card Number, Expiry Date and the three-digit CVV code, you can select your card limits. The only difference is that you will not receive any physical card.

WHY USE VIRTUAL DEBIT CARD:

·         Instant Generation: Without any hassle of filling out lengthy documentation, you can generate your Alfa Virtual Debit Card within minutes from Alfa.

·         No Activation Required: Alfa Virtual Debit Card does not require any activation. Just generate your card and start using it online.

·         Control over your Spending: Set your own daily transaction limit to avoid any overspending.

·         Secure Online Payments: Powered by MasterCard, all your transactions through Virtual Debit Card are 3D secure. This means that the cardholder will get a One Time Password (OTP) every time a transaction is attempted.

·         Global acceptance: Now you can use your Virtual Debit Card on domestic as well as on international websites.

WHERE TO USE ALFA VIRTUAL DEBIT CARD:

Alfa Virtual Debit Card can be used for all types of online payments which include:

·         Online Shopping

·         Food Delivery Services

·         Ride Hailing Services

·         Online Grocery Shopping

·         Fee Payment for School, College & Universities

·         Purchase of Bus, Train or Airlines tickets

·         Online Monthly Subscription for any service

Eligibility criteria

All (CASA) Current / Savings Account, RDA and Wallet Account Holders, can get access to this card.

1.    If the customer has a Bank Alfalah Account

 

Step#1. Download Alfa and click ‘Register Now

Step#2. Click on ‘Already Bank Alfalah Account Holder’ and enter the details.

Step#3. Click on Menu > my cards OR Click on Cards in ‘One Tap Launch’ Menu

Step#4. Click on Virtual Debit Card > Create Virtual Debit Card

Step#5. Choose Account as source in the Select Account Option > Set your maximum Monthly limit > Set the card expiry

Step#6. Accept the terms and conditions and Proceed

Step#7. Enter the 4-digit OTAC received on your registered number & email and confirm

Step#8.  Virtual Debit Card created

Upon card creation, your new Virtual Card’s details including the 16-digit card number, expiration date, and the card verification code will be visible on Alfa App. That’s all you need to shop online.

2.    If the customer does not have any account/wallet with Bank Alfalah

 

Step#1. Download Alfa and sign up for a new Alfa Account (Conventional Current Wallet)

Step#2. Click on Menu > my cards OR Click on Cards in ‘One Tap Launch’ Menu

Step#3. Click on Virtual Debit Card > Create Virtual Debit Card

Step#4. Choose Wallet as Source Account > Set your maximum monthly limit > Set the card expiry date

Step#5. Accept the terms and conditions and Proceed

Step#6. Enter the 6-digit OTP received on your registered number and confirm

Step#7. Virtual Debit Card created

 

3.    If the Customer has Alfa Wallet Account

 

Step#1. Click on Menu > my cards OR Click on Cards in ‘One Tap Launch’ Menu

Step#2. Click on Virtual Debit Card > Create Virtual Debit Card

Step#3. Choose Wallet as Source Account > Set your maximum monthly limit > Set the card expiry date > Accept the terms and conditions and Proceed

Step#4. Enter the 6-digit OTP received on your registered number and confirm

Step#5. Virtual Debit Card created

 

4.     If the customer has both Bank Alfalah Account and Alfa Account (Conventional Current Wallet)

 

Step#1. Login on Alfa

Step#2. Click on Menu > my cards OR Click on Cards in ‘One Tap Launch’ Menu

Step#3. Click on Virtual Debit Card > Create Virtual Debit Card

Step#4. Choose Account as source in the Select Account Option > Enter Amount that needs to be transferred to the wallet > Set your maximum monthly limit > Set the card expiry

Step#5. Accept the terms and conditions and Proceed

Step#6. Enter the 4-digit OTAC received on your registered number & email and confirm

Step#7. Virtual Debit Card created

 

5.    If the customer has a wallet other than Alfa Account (Conventional Current Wallet)

 

Step#1. Sign up for a new Alfa Account (Conventional Current Wallet)

Step#2. Click on Menu > my cards OR Click on Cards in ‘One Tap Launch’ Menu

Step#3. Click on Virtual Debit Card > Create Virtual Debit Card

Step#4. Choose Wallet as Source Account > Set your maximum monthly limit > Set the card expiry date

Step#5. Accept the terms and conditions and Proceed

Step#6. Enter the 6-digit OTP received on your registered number and confirm

Step#7. Virtual Debit Card created

 

6.    If the customer has a Bank Alfalah credit card only

 

Step#1. Download Alfa and sign up for a new Alfa Account (Conventional Current Wallet) Step#2. Click on Menu > my cards OR Click on Cards in ‘One Tap Launch’ Menu

Step#3. Click on Virtual Debit Card > Create Virtual Debit Card

Step#4. Choose Wallet as Source Account > Set your maximum monthly limit > Set the card expiry date

Step#5. Accept the terms and conditions and Proceed

Step#6. Enter the 6-digit OTP received on your registered number and confirm

Step#7. Virtual Debit Card create

 

Transaction limits and number of transactions

 

Virtual Debit Card created on T-24/RDA Customers

·         Monthly Transaction Limit = Max. PKR 500,000 PKR equivalent

·         Domestic and international transactions are allowed

Virtual Debit Card created on Level 1 wallet

·         Per Transaction limit = Max. PKR 50,000

·         Monthly Transaction Limit = Max. 50,000 PKR equivalent

·         Only Domestic transactions are allowed

Virtual Debit Card created on Level 0 wallet

·         Per Transaction limit = Max. PKR 25,000

·         Monthly Transaction Limit = Max. PKR 25,000 PKR equivalent     

·         Only Domestic transactions are allowed

Associated Charges

Charged Item/ Transaction

Charges

Card Issuance Fee

Rs.200 + 16%FED

International Usage Charges:

Purchases in USD and PKR.
Note: Third currency transactions will be first converted into USD as per rate quoted by the card schemes

Up to 5% over prevailing market rate or as per SBP directives

Voucher retrieval fee

Rs. 500/- + 16%FED

Arbitration Charges

USD 500/- + 16%FED

 

What is meant by Arbitration Charges & Voucher retrieval fee?

If a card is used in a foreign currency (FCY) on a cross border merchant, and a dispute arises, the scheme may charge a fee to retrieve the case from the international merchant. This fee is referred to as arbitration and dispute charges and is in addition to any internal charges that may apply.

Retrieval charges pertain to the charges billed to the customer in case where the dispute has gone against the customer

 

Arbitration charges pertain to the charges billed to the customer when the dispute after being debated by the Issuer and Acquirer is forwarded to the Franchise for final decision

Neither of the charges is billed to the merchant in VDC case

3-D Secure

3-D secure ensures safe internet transactions through requiring a 6-digit code, from the customer, provided to by SMS or e-Mail. With this service, when you use your Bank Alfalah Virtual Debit Card/Debit Card or Credit Card on websites that have incorporated the “Verified by Visa”, “American Express Safe Key” or “MasterCard Secure Code” sign, you will receive a One-Time Password (OTP) by SMS or e-Mail on entering the required password will your transaction be processed. The objective is to provide a safe, secure and seamless online payment experience and ensuring the integrity of the payment process and all parties involved i.e. Card Issuer, Merchant and Customer.

1-Bill Credit Card Payment Charges:

Dear Customer, you may be charged a fee for making a payment on a Bank Alfalah credit card through other banks. This fee is typically referred to as a "1-bill charge" and is used to cover the costs of processing the payment through an external bank's network.

1.    Up to Rs. 10K - Rs. 10/-

2.    Rs. 10K to 100K - Rs. 25/-

3.    Rs. 100K to 250K - Rs. 50/-

4.    Rs. 250K to 1M - Rs. 100/-

5.    Rs. 1M+ - Rs. 200/-

SMS Banking

1. SMS on transactions through Digital Channels – FREE
English Script

Bank Alfalah is offering its customers Free SMS Alerts on transactions done through Digital Channels including ATM and POS transactions. If you have not started receiving your Free SMS Alerts on transactions through Digital Channels, please contact us by using any of the following mediums:

·         Type ‘FREE (space) <Account Number>’ and send to 8287 to auto-update for Free Alerts

·         Contact Helpline 042/021 111 225 111 and request for Free Alerts

·         Visit the branch and request for Free Alerts

 

Urdu Srcipt

 

Bank Alfalah apny customers ko digital channels js men ATM aur POS transcations par free SMS alerts ki facility dy rha hai. Agar apny ab tak digital channels transcations par free SMS alerts ki service nai li hai to kindly nechy mentioned process ko follow kar ke activate karwiye.

·         Type ‘Free (space) < Account Numbr >’ aur send karain 8287 par auto-update free alerts ke lye

·         Helpline 042/021 111 225 111 par contact kar ke fee alerts ki request karain

·         Branch visit kar ke free alerts ki request karain

 

2. SMS Alerts on all transactions with language option – Charged as per prevailing SOC

English Script

To avail SMS Alerts on all transactions, with multi-language option, customers are required to subscribe their account(s) by using any of the following mediums:

  1. Contact Helpline 021 111 225 111 and request for all Alerts
  2. Visit the branch and request for all Alerts

 

Urdu Script

Tamam transactions par SMS alerts multi-language options ke sath SMS alerts avail karny ke lye customers nechy mentioned methods ke through service avail kar skty hain.

·         Helpline 042/021 111 225 111 par contact kar ke SMS alerts ki request karain

·         Branch visit kar ke SMS alerts ki request karain

 

PULL SMS

SMS Pull Banking Services Rs. 50+16% FED per month

Branch Banking SMS Alert Fee Rs.160+16% FED per month

 To block promotions from BAF8287 customer needs to type UNSUB or REG and send to 8006409

To block promotions from BAF8645 customer needs to type UNSUB or REG and send to 8006410

To block all promotions, customer needs to type REG and send to 3627. (This will result in blocking all promotional and marketing campaigns from every marketing company)

Transactions offered through SMS banking (Pull SMS Services):

Inquiry Services:

Now customer can inquire, A/C balance, mini statement, credit card details, Orbits info, Cheque book request, permanent blocking of Debit card, temporary blocking of IB & Alfa, Debit card online transaction activation & Deactivation.

·         For A/C Balance, type AB

·         For Mini Statement, type MS

·         For Credit Card details, type CC (this tanx. is available for Account subscribes having &4F Credit Cards)

·         For Orbits Inquiry, type Orbits(space)<13 digits CNIC > 

·         For Cheque Book request, type CHQ(space)<No. of leaves > (space) < Last 4 digits of BAF account number > 

·         For Permanent Blocking of Debit Card, type DCBlock(space) < Last 4 digits of Debit Card No > 

·         For Temporary Blocking of IB and Alfa services, type ALFABlock(space) < 13 digit CNIC > 

·         For Debit Card Activation on Online tranx. (internet), DCONUNE(space) < tast 4 digits of Debit Card > 

·         For Debit Card Deactivation on Online tranx. (Internet), DCOFFUNE(space)<Last 4 digits of Debit Card

 

Financial Services:

·         For Bill Payment (Prepaid), type bpr < Space > <Network > < Space > < Amount > 

·         For Bill Payment (Postpaid), type bps < Space > < Network > < Space > < Amount > 

·         For payment of BAF Credit Card bill through BAF account, type CCP(space)<Last 4 digits of Credit Card > (space) < Amount > (space)< Last 4 digits of BAF account number > 

 

Note: Bill Payment (i.e. Financial Service) is ONLY applicable on the mobile number registered against customers account.

New Services added in SMS Banking (Pull Services):

1.    Issuance of Cheque Book:

Provide the following information in the format specified:

Code: CHQ (space) No. of leaves (space) Last 4 digits of account

For example, if you require a cheque book with 50 leaves and the last four digits of your account number are 1234, the format would be: CHQ 50 1234

2.    Credit Card Payment from BAF account:

Provide the following information in the specified format:

Code: CCP (space) Payment: Rs. 10 (amount to be paid) (space) Cell number: <Your registered cell number>

For example, if you want to make a payment of Rs. 10 from your account against your credit card, and your registered cell number is 1234567890, the format would be: CCP 10 1234567890

 

3.    A: Activating Internet Session for Online Tranx (Debit Card)

To activate an internet session for online transactions using your debit card, please provide the following information in the specified format:

Code: INTERNET (space) YES (space) Last 4 digits of account

For example, if you want to activate an internet session for online transactions and the last four digits of your account number are 1234, the format would be: INTERNET YES 1234

 B: Deactivating Debit Card for Online Tranx

To deactivate an internet session for online transactions using your debit card, please provide the following information in the specified format:

Code: INTERNET (space) NO (space) Last 4 digits of account

For example, if you want to deactivate an internet session for online transactions and the last four digits of your account number are 1234, the format would be: INTERNET NO 1234

4.    Permanent Blocking of Debit Card

Code: DCBLOCK (space) > Last 4 digits of Debit Card >

To permanently block your debit card, please provide the following information in the specified format:

Code: DCBLOCK (space) Last 4 digits of Debit Card

For example, if you want to permanently block your debit card and the last four digits of your debit card number are 1234, the format would be: DCBLOCK 1234 

 

5.    Temporary Blocking of Internet/Alfa

·         Code: ALFABLOCK (space) < 13 digits CNIC > 

·         Correct message shown and IB/Alfa is shown as BLOCKED on IB Back Office.

·         No tranx. Processed on IB/Alfa after BLOCKING IB/Alf.

To temporarily block your internet/Alfa service; please provide the following information in the specified format:

Code: ALFABLOCK (space) 13 digits CNIC

For example, if you want to temporarily block your internet/Alfa service and your 13-digit CNIC number is 1234567890123, the format would be:

ALFABLOCK 1234567890123

6.    Updating CNIC Issuance Date

To update the CNIC issuance date in the system, please provide the following information in the specified format:

Code: CU (space) 13 digits CNIC (space) Issuance Date

For example, if you want to update the CNIC issuance date for your 13-digit CNIC number 1234567890123 with an issuance date of 01/01/2022, the format would be CU 1234567890123 01/01/2022

 

3.SMS Banking (Pull SMS) – Charged as per prevailing SOC
Bank Alfalah offers its customers via its SMS Banking channel which is the freedom to get their Account information & do financial transactions (including Mobile bill and BAF Credit Card bill through BAF account) by sending an SMS to 8287. By subscribing to this service, customers can now get their Account Balance, Last 5 transactions, Credit Card information, process Permanent Blocking of Debit Card, Temporary Blocking of Internet Banking and ALFA, Activation and Deactivation of E-Commerce transactions, initiate Cheque book requests, inquire about Orbits points, pay off the bill of their registered mobile number and Credit Card through their Bank Alfalah account by sending predefined texts to Bank Alfalah short code 8287.
Following are the codes to type and send to 8287 to use this facility:

    • To check your account balance, please type "AB"
    • For Mini Statement, type MS
    • For Credit Card details, type CC
    • For Permanent Blocking of Debit Card, type DCBLOCK(space)<Last 4 digits of Debit Card>
    • For Temporary Blocking of Internet Banking/Alfa, type ALFABLOCK(space)<13 digits CNIC>
    • To Activate E-Commerce Tranx, type INTERNET(space)<ON>(space)<Last 4 digits of account>
    • To Deactivate E-Commerce, type INTERNET(space)<OFF>(space)<Last 4 digits of account>
    • For paying off BAF Credit Card bill from BAF a/c, type CCP(space)<Last 4 digits of Credit Card>(space)<Payment amount>(space)<Last 4 digits of account>
    • For Bill Payment (Prepaid), type BPR(space)<Network>(space)<Amount>
    • For Bill Payment (Postpaid), type BPS(space)<Network>(space)<Amount>
    • For new Cheque Book, type CHQ(space)<No. of leaves>(space)<Last 4 digits of account>
    • For updating CNIC expiry, type CU(space)<13 digits CNIC>(space)<Issuance Date in DD/MM/YYYY>
    • For Orbits Inquiry, type Orbits(space)<13 digits CNIC>
    • For assistance, type HELP and send to 8287.

To avail SMS Banking, customers are required to subscribe their account(s) by using any of the following mediums:

a)    Type ‘SMSBANKING’ and send to 8287 to receive a call from Bank Alfalah representative

b)    Contact Helpline 021 111 225 111 and request for SMS Banking (Pull SMS)

c)     Visit the branch and request for SMS Banking (Pull SMS)

 

 

To update your mobile network (in case of ported network), please type "MNP" and send it to Bank Alfalah's short code 8287. This will initiate the process to update your mobile network information with the bank.

 

 

Mobile network (ported network) ko update karne ke liye, "MNP" likh kar Bank Alfalah ke short code 8287 par bhejen.

DEBIT CARD Charges (July-Dec 2023)

Basic Debit Card Issuances/Annual

Here are the annual charges for various debit cards:

(Conventional Banking)

·         Visa Classic Debit Card 2300 + 16% FED

·         Visa Gold Debit Card 2800 + 16% FED

·         Visa Pehchaan Gold Debit Card 2800 + 16% FED

·         Visa Platinum Debit Card 5000 + 16% FED

·         PayPak Debit Card 2000 + 16% FED

·         Visa Signature Debit Card 14000 + 16% FED

·         Visa Premier Signature Debit Card Exempted for fees

 (Islamic Banking)

·         Visa Classic Debit Card 2300 + 16% FED

·         Visa Gold Debit Card 2800 + 16% FED

·         PayPak Classic Debit Card 2000 + 16% FED

·         Islamic Visa Signature Power Pack Debit Card 14000 + 16% FED

·         Islamic Visa Premier Signature Debit Card Exempted for fees

·         Pay Pak Debit Card (Asaan & Freelancer Digital Account): 2000 + 16% FED

·         Gold Debit Card (Asaan & Freelancer Digital Account): 2800 + 16% FED

·         Classic Debit Card (Asaan & Freelancer Digital Account): 2300 + 16% FED

 

Basic Debit Card Replacement Charges

Please have the Debit Card replacement charges as under:

-         Classic Debit Card: 1600+16%FED

-         Debit Card Replacement Fee on Roshan Digital Account: 6600+16% FED

-         Gold Debit Card: 1800+16%FED

-         Pay Pak Debit Card: 1600+16%FED

-         Platinum Debit Card: 3000+16%FED

-         Signature Debit Card: 3000+16%FED

-         CON Premier Signature Debit Card: FREE

-         Isl Premier Signature Debit Card: FREE

Please have the Supplementary Debit Card charges as under:

Supplementary Debit Card Issuances/Annual

-         Classic Debit Card: 1150+16%FED

-         Gold Debit Card: 1400+16%FED

-         Gold Debit Card for RDA customers: 1400+16%FED

-         Pay Pak Debit Card: 1000 +16%FED

-         Platinum Debit Card: 2500+16%FED

-         Signature Debit Card: 7000+16%FED

-         Premier Signature Debit Card: FREE

-         Gold Debit Card: 1400+16%FED

-         Pay Pak Debit Card: 1000+16%FED

-         Platinum Debit Card: 2500+16%FED

-         Signature Debit Card: 7000+16%FED

Classic Credit Card annual charges are as under:

·         Basic: Rs 3500 + 16% FED (New Acquisition)

·         Supplementary (New Acquisition): Rs 1750 + 16% FED

Gold Credit Card:

·         Basic: Rs 9000 + 16% FED

·         Supplementary: Rs 4500 + 16% FED

Platinum Credit Card annual charges are as under:

·         Basic: Rs 17000 + 16% FED (New Acquisition)

·         Supplementary: Rs 8500 + 16% FED (New Acquisition)

Optimus Credit Card annual charges are as under:

·         Basic: Rs 10000 + 16% FED

·         Supplementary: Rs 5000 + 16% FED

AMEX Credit Card annual charges are as under:

·         Basic: Rs 10000 + 16% FED

·         Supplementary: Rs 5000 + 16% FED

Ultra Cash Back Credit Card annual charges are as under:

·         Basic: Rs 7000 + 16% FED

·         Supplementary: Rs 3000 + 16% FED

Card Replacment/Up-gradation Fee:

Here are the replacement charges for the mentioned credit cards:

Classic Credit Card replamcent charges are as under:

·         Primary Card: Rs 1000 + 16% FED

·         Supplementary Card: Rs 1000 + 16% FED

Gold Credit Card replamcent charges are as under:

·         Primary Card: Rs 1000 + 16% FED

·         Supplementary Card: Rs 1000 + 16% FED

Platinum Credit Card replamcent charges are as under:

·         Primary Card: Rs 2000 + 16% FED

·         Supplementary Card: Rs 1000 + 16% FED

Premier Platinum Credit Card replamcent charges are as under:

·         Primary Card: Rs 2000 + 16% FED

·         Supplementary Card: Rs 1000 + 16% FED

Optimus Credit Card replamcent charges are as under:

·         Primary Card: Rs 2000 + 16% FED

·         Supplementary Card: Rs 1000 + 16% FED

AMEX Credit Card replamcent charges are as under:

·         Primary Card: Rs 1000 + 16% FED

·         Supplementary Card: Rs 1000 + 16% FED

Ultra Credit Card replamcent charges are as under:

·         Primary Card: Rs 1000 + 16% FED

·         Supplementary Card: Rs 1000 + 16% FED

Other Fee:

Here are the charges associated with various transactions and services for the mentioned credit card:

Cheque Return Charges/Rejected Autopay Service Fee

·         1200+16% FED

Step by Step/Credit on Phone to SBS Processing Charges:

·         Rs. 1000 + 16% FED or 2.5% of the transaction amount, whichever is higher

Step by Step/Credit on Phone to SBS Premature Settlement Charges:

·         5% on the balance amount or Rs. 1,000 + 16% FED, whichever is higher

Credit Cover Premium

·         Up to 0.85% of outstanding amount

Utility Bill Payment from Credit Card Customer Service Charges

·         Rs. 35+16%FED per utility bill (below Rs. 5,000/- through Call, Direct Debit)

·         Rs. 55+16%FED per utility bill (above Rs. 5,000/- through Call, Direct Debit)

BTF Processing Fee:

·         Rs. 600 + 16% FED or 2.5% of the transaction amount, whichever is higher.

Late Fee:

·         PKR 1,850/- or 10% of the minimum amount due, whichever is higher.

Cash Withdrawal Fee:

·         Rs. 1,200 + 16% FED or 3% of the cash advance amount, whichever is higher.

Late Fee

·         Rs.1,850 or 10% of minimum amount, whichever is higher

Over-limit Fee:

·         2% of the over-limit amount or Rs. 1,600 + 16% FED, whichever is higher.

1-Link member bank Local ATM:

·         Rs. 23.44+16% FED per transaction

·         From Visa member bank International ATM Rs.350+16% FED- or 3.5% of cash withdrawal amount, whichever is higher

Receipt on ATM Cash Withdrawal and Balance Enquiry

·         Up to Rs. 2.50

 

CASH DEPOSIT MACHINE [CDM]

For Deposits to Other Bank Accounts:

Amount Range Charges

Up to Rs. 10,000 PKR 100

Rs. 10,001 to 100,000 PKR 150

Rs. 100,001 to 250,000 PKR 300

Rs. 250,001 to 500,000 PKR 500

Rs. 500,001 and above PKR 1,000 or 0.1% of the deposited amount, whichever is higher

Important Conditions for Spend Base Criteria

  1. Annual fees will be levied on new acquisitions only and on cards that were issued from July 2021 onwards.
  2. Customers need to spend the required threshold in two months from the date when annual fees is levied
  3. Cumulative spend on either basic or supplementary card can be considered for reversal for both basic and supplementary cards annual fees

 

  1. Transactions not to be considered for spend base reversals:
    1. All service charges and other fees
    2. Cash Advance
    3. Utility Bill Payments
    4. SBS plans
    5. BTF
    6. Alfa App transactions
    7. Alfa Mall transactions

 

5.    Retail (POS & Online) transactions that were converted to SBS later can be considered for fees reversal

  1. In case of Prorate fees on supplementary credit card, customer to spend 50% of actual spending 50% of the required actual spending for annual fee reversal (charged 2nd time in same calendar year).

Premier Banking

Bank Alfalah Premier is envisaged to provide the High Net worth (HNW) clientele of Pakistan with a world class banking experience where they will receive un-paralleled advantages. Bank Alfalah Premier will offer high level of personalized services, more rewarding in-branch experience, a wide array of product suite along with unique lifestyle experiences that are tailored to client requirements.

As a Bank Alfalah Premier customer you can avail several services free of charge or at a discounted rate.

Bank Alfalah Convential Premier

Eligibility Criteria

Eligibility:

In order to qualify as a Convential Premier Banking Customer, you need to maintain a minimum quarterly average balance/minimum three months’ average balance as per the below mentioned criteria:

Type

Minimum Threshold (Quarterly Average Balance)

Current Account

PKR 2 Million

Savings Account

PKR 5 Million

Current and Savings

PKR 3 Million in Savings Account and 1 Million in Current Account

 

Bank Alfalah Islamic Premier

Eligibility Criteria

Eligibility:

In order to qualify as an Islamic Premier Banking Customer, you need to maintain a minimum quarterly average balance/minimum three months’ average balance as per the below mentioned criteria:

Type

Minimum Threshold (Quarterly Average Balance)

CASA (Current Account / Saving Account)

PKR 3 Million

TDR* (Term Deposit Receipt)

PKR 5 Million

 

Bank Alfalah Premier

As a Bank Alfalah Premier customer you can avail several services free of charge or at a discounted rate.

Eligibility

To qualify as a Premier customer, you must maintain quarterly average balance as per the below mentioned grid:

Type

Minimum Threshold

Current Account

PKR 2 Million

Savings Account

PKR 5 Million

Current and Savings (Combination)

PKR 3 Million in Savings Account and

PKR 1 Million in Current Account

 

Banking Services

 

Premier customers will be able to avail a list of waivers based on the average quarterly balance maintained in PKR Million slab wise as given below:

 

PKR 2 Million - PKR 2.999 Million

PKR 3 Million - PKR 6.999 Million

PKR 7 Million & Above
