Roshan Apni Car (Conventional Banking)

In order to apply for Roshan Apni Car (Conventional) please follow the process mentioned below.

  • Customer will initiate the auto facility request from RDA webpage on Bank Alfalah Conventional https://www.bankalfalah.com/personal-banking/loans/alfalah-roshan-apni-car-for-roshan-digital-account-holders
  • Customer is required to fill an online application form on Islamic Roshan Apni Car Web Portal.

And click the below-mentioned ‘Calculator Link’ to view the estimated installment plans regarding Alfalah Roshan Apni car (Conventional) https://www.bankalfalah.com/personal-banking/loans/roshan-apni-car-calculator/

  • Customer is required to fill an online application form on Islamic Roshan Apni Car Web Portal

RAAST

·         Raast is Pakistan`s instant and digital payment system that will allow you to Send & Receive Money among individuals, businesses, and government entities quickly, securely and easily via Raast ID i.e. Mobile Number and IBAN.

·         RAAST will connect you with every bank. RAAST offers a simple, fast, secure and convenient way to transfer money from one bank account to another.

·         Your Raast ID is your mobile number which can be linked to your desired BAFL account. Instead of sharing bank account numbers, you can now share your RAAST ID with others and start receiving funds in your linked account

Alfa App

Registration

To be able to receive funds on Raast ID, User must first register themselves through Raast ID Management tab available in Side Menu.

·         User will click on Raast ID from side menu

·         Registered Mobile Number will be displayed as My Raast ID

·         User can select account for linking to Raast ID

·         Confirmation prompt will appear, User will click on yes

·         User will enter OTAC

·         Registration complete. Account is linked with Raast ID. User can now receive funds through their mobile number.

 

RAAST REGISTRATION FROM INTERNET BANKING:

-         Login to Internet Banking

-         Go to Overview

-         Click on Raast-ID Management

-         Enter CNIC#

-         Enter Name

-         Enter Raast-ID (Mobile#)

-         Select Account number (For Link)

-         Enter Account

-         Click on link Account

                                                                                                                                 

 

·         RAAST Pakistan ka instant aur digital payment system hai, jis k zariey aap fori aur baa-asaani paise receive aur transfer kar saktae hain RAAST ID per aur IBAN per.

·         RAAST apko har us bank se connect karega jo currently Raast per enabled hain, ye ek asaan, fast aur secure funds transfer ka Zariah hai.

·         RAAST ID apka mobile# hoga jo aap apne BAFL account se link kar saktae hain. Ab ap apna Bank account number share kie bina RAAST ID, yani mobile number per paise mangwa saktae hain.

English

Urdu

Alfa App

Registration

Funds receive karny ke lye user ko Raast ID par register hona lazmi hai, through Raast ID Management tab ke jo Side Menu men available hai.

·         User Raast ID par click karega side menu sy.

·         Registered Mobile Number as a Raast ID display hoga.

·         User account select karega Raast ID ko link karny ke lye.

·         Confirmation prompt ayga screen par, user yes par click karega.

·         User OTAC enter krega.

·         Registration complete hojayg. Account linked hojayga Raast ID sy. User mobile numbe ke through funds receive kar sakhega.

RAAST ID Registration/ Re-Link from Alfa:

You can Register/Re-Link your RAAST ID through Alfa Application, please follow the steps below:

1. Login to Alfa application
2. Tap on Hamburger menu on top left
3. Click on RAAST ID
4. Tap on toggle to select account
5: Tap on Register.                                                                                              
You can also request for RAAST ID activation by calling our helpline at 021-111-225-111.

RAAST ID De-Link from Alfa:

You can De-Link your RAAST ID through Alfa Application, please follow the steps below:

1. Login to Alfa application
2. Tap on Hamburger menu on top left
3. Tap on De-link tab
4. Tap on toggle to de-select account
5: Tap on De-linking & proceed.                                                                        
You can also De-Link your RAAST ID by calling our helpline at 021-111-225-111.

Raast Payment - IBAN

·         User will select Send Money

·         User will select Raast Payment

Note: Transaction can also be initiated through My Payees

·         User will select from Account

·         User will choose Raast Beneficiary Type: > ID > IBAN

·         User will enter IBAN and amount

·         User will enter purpose of payment

·         User will view transaction details and select send now

·         Confirmation prompt will appear, User will click on yes

·         User will enter OTAC and click on Pay now

·         User can create a payee by selecting toggle and entering payee name

·         Payment is successfully made to IBAN

·         Users can add payee to favorites, share receipt & save PDF/photo

 

Raast Payment – Raast ID

·         User will click on Send Money

·         User will click on Raast Payment

Note: Transaction can also be initiated through My Payees

·         User will select from Account

·         User will select Raast ID from Beneficiary type dropdown

·         User can select from already created payee or can enter mobile number by clicking on other

·         User will enter amount

·         User will enter purpose of payment

·         User will view transaction details and click on send now

·         Confirmation prompt will appear, User will click on yes

·         User will enter OTAC and click on Pay now

·         User can create a payee by selecting toggle and entering payee name

·         Payment is successfully made to Raast ID

·         Users can add payee to favorites, share receipt & save PDF/photo

 

Below are current Raast enabled banks list, on which customers can transfer funds.

Participant name

ALLIED BANK LTD

ASKARI BANK LTD

BANK AL FALAH LIMITED

BANK AL HABIB LTD

FAYSAL BANK LIMITED

HABIB BANK LIMITED

HABIB METROPOLITAN BANK LTD

J.S.BANK LIMITED

SONERI BANK LTD

ST. CHARTERED BANK PAKISTAN

UNITED BANK LIMITED

SUMMIT BANK LIMITED

Telenor MicroFinance Bank

National Rural Support Program - NRSP

Meezan Bank Limited

Bank of Punjab

 

RAAST DE-LINK from Internet banking:

De-Linking RAAST ID through Internet Banking:

-         Login to Internet Banking

-         Go to Overview

-         Click on RAAST-ID Management

-         Select De-link account from drop down menu

-         Click on Unlink account

-         RAAST Registration/Link from Internet banking:

You can Register/Re-Link your RAAST ID through internet banking, please follow the steps below:

 

-         Log in to internet banking

-         Go to overview

-         Click on RAAST-ID Management

-         Select the account number to link from the drop-down menu

-         Click on submit

 

TRANSFER FROM INTERNET BANKING ON RAAST ID/IBAN#:

To make a transfer through Raast on internet banking, follow these steps:

-         Login to Internet Banking

-         Go to Services > Transfer

-         Click on Raast

-         Select Source Account

-         Select to other

-         Enter Raast ID (Mobile number) or IBAN#

-         Click "Get Title"

-         Enter Amount

-         Enter Purpose of Payment

-         Click "Proceed"

Account Opening Documentation

https://baflearn.bankalfalah.com/doc/Account%20Opening%20Checklist%20-%2022%20December%202021.pdf

Dear Customer, kindly confirm if you're a salaried person or a business person?

Account Opening Documentation for Salaried Account

·         CNIC/NICOP/SNIC/POC/ARC issued by NADRA/ NARA (original seen by bank officer) OR Passport, having valid visa on it or any other proof of legal stay along with passport (Foreign National Individuals Only)

·         Salary slip / Account Statement/ Job Certificate or Letter (it should not be more than 3 months old).

·         Proof of employment, Employee Card/ Job Card attested copy of service card or certificate form the employer.

·         For Retired Persons, a copy of Retirement Letter/ Proof of Retirement

For Non-Resident Pakistani customers, Iqama / proper salary evidence required issued by employer or competent authorities (Govt. authorities/Labor or manpower ministries etc.)

Account Opening Documentation for Student Account:

·         CNIC/NICOP/SNIC/POC/ARC issued by NADRA/ NARA (original seen by bank officer) OR Passport, having valid visa on it or any other proof of legal stay along with passport (Foreign National Individuals Only)

·         Valid student card

·         Financing source/ Source of income (Self-declaration (of customer) for source and beneficial ownership of funds duly approved by BM/OM).

Source of Income of the fund provide

Account Opening Documentation for Sole Proprietorship Account:

·         CNIC/NICOP/SNIC/POC/ARC issued by NADRA/ NARA (original seen by bank officer) OR Passport, having valid visa on it or any other proof of legal stay along with

Passport (Foreign National Individuals Only)

·         Attested copy of Registration (for registered concern)/Membership (where applicable)

·         Proprietorship declaration on business letter head.

·         Customer`s request for opening of proprietorship account required (on business letter head)

·         Sales Tax registration or NTN Certificate of Proprietor along with online verification of NTN through FBR website by the branch staff with sign and stamp (wherever applicable).

Rubber stamp (as per title of A/c & Letter head) of the Business required to be affixed on SSC/AODs (where signature of customer is affixed).

Joint Venture Account:

·         Each authorized person’s copy of CNIC/NICOP/SNIC/POC/ARC issued by NADRA/ NARA (original seen by bank officer) OR Passport, having valid visa on it or any other proof of legal stay along with passport (Foreign National Individuals Only)

·         NTN certificate in the name of joint venture (wherever applicable).

·         List of Directors having complete details on Company's Letter Head, signed and Stamped by the CEO/Company Secretary for public limited company

·         Joint venture agreement duly signed by all parties.

·         Power of attorney in favor of authorized signatories representing the JV parties.

·         Authority letter in favor of person authorized to operate the account.

·         Complete documents of all parties forming joint-venture. (With respect to their entities).

 

Account Opening Documentation for Company Account:

·         Each authorized person’s copy of CNIC/NICOP/SNIC/POC/ARC issued by NADRA/ NARA (original seen by bank officer) OR Passport, having valid visa on it or any other proof of

Legal stay along with passport (Foreign National Individuals Only)

·         NTN certificate in the name of company (wherever applicable).

·         Sales Tax Registration (wherever applicable).

·         Resolution of Board of directors for opening the account specifying the person(s) authorized to open and operate the company account to be obtained on company letter head. (Not applicable for Single Member Company

·         Certificate of incorporation

·         Certificate of commencement of business, (wherever applicable) and OR SECP Registered Declaration for Commencement of business (For Public Limited Companies)

·         Memorandum & Article of Association or check annexure IV

·         Certified copy of Latest ‘Form-A/Form-B’

·         Incorporate Form II in case of newly incorporated company and Form A/ Form C whichever is applicable; and Form 29 in already incorporated companies

·         List of Directors having complete details on Company's Letter Head, signed and stamped by the CEO/Company Secretary (Only required in case list is different from Form-A/B supported by updated Form 29)

 

*CTC copy required of above all

 

·         Approval from Board of directors for opening the account on company letter-head.

 

1.    For Natural Persons or legal persons holding shares equal to 25% or above in an entity, identification and verification of individual (natural person) shareholders holding shares equal to 25% or above directly or indirectly of that legal, copy of CNICs & NADRA verification (in case of Foreign National copy of Passport) of such natural person is required).

 

Account Opening Documentation for Self-Employed Account:

·         Copy of CNIC/NICOP/SNIC/POC/ARC issued by NADRA/ NARA (original seen by bank

officer)

·         Attested copy of Registration/Membership

·         Registration certificate for registered concerns

·         Sales tax registration or NTN certificate, wherever applicable.

·         Certificate or proof of membership of trade bodies etc., wherever applicable.

·         Proof of source of Funds/ Income

 

Account Opening Documentation for Pension Account:

·         Copy of CNIC/NICOP/SNIC/POC/ARC issued by NADRA/ NARA (original seen by bank officer)

·         Purpose of bank account must be clearly mentioned as Pension in KYC

·         Option form for direct disbursement of pension

·         Proof of Pension i.e. copy of pension book or copy of retirement letter or any other acceptable document detailing pension amount payable to the pensioner.

·         Indemnity bond

·         Non-Marriage Certificate (In case of family pension, from the widow/widower, unmarried daughter or sister as the case)

Copy of PPO/ Option Form A [Pension Payment Order]

 

Account Opening Documentation for Partnership Account:

·         Each partner’s copy of CNIC/NICOP/SNIC/POC/ARC issued by NADRA/ NARA (original seen by bank officer) OR Passport, having valid visa on it or any other proof of legal stay along

with passport (Foreign National Individuals Only)

·         NTN certificate in the name of Partnership

·         Partnership deed along with the Registration Certificate (with

updated changes/amendments) of concerned Register will be obtained along with the said Undertaking

·         In case, Partnership is unregistered this fact shall be clearly marked/mentioned on the AOF

·         Authority letter from all partners on partnership Firm’s letter head

·         Rubber stamp

·         Source of Income

o    Receipt of Payment against the Work, OR

o    Account Statement, OR

o    Particulars of Income/ Funds Providers (e.g. Family Members/ Guardian/ Stipends/ Social Benefits etc.), OR

o    Tax Statement/ Return/ Certificate, OR

o    Any other Document evidencing Source of Income

 

Account Opening Documentation for Minor Account:

·         Birth certificate

·         Form-B,

·         Student ID card

·         Guardian details cnic & source of income

·         Court order must be obtained in case legal guardian

 

Account Opening Documentation for Photo accounts: illiterate customers/ customers with shaky signatures:

 

·         In Photo accounts customer's both thumb impressions (LHT & RHT) is to be affixed on the

S. S. Card (BAF-AOO-003), AOF and on the reverse of a passport size photograph of the applicant.

·         The account of illiterate customers can be opened by the branches only when they call on the Bank personally and affix their RHT & LHT thumb impressions on the AOF, documents, legal indemnity and S.S cards in front of the OM / Branch Manager and all required formalities / documentation have been completed / obtained.

·         Illiterate account holder shall have to affix thumb impression on the cheques while issuing in presence of branch officials CSM/OM/BM.

·         Illiterate/ shaky signatures indemnity as per format attached

·         3 Photographs along with account holder's right and left hand thumb impression on SS Card and on the reverse of the passport size photograph of the applicant.

 

Account Opening Documentation for Fee Collection Account:

·         For opening of New Fee Collection Account Branches shall forward the request to

Respective Group Head for approval, after that, approval shall be sent to IT Division.

·         IT division shall ensure the inclusion of the customer in banking application i.e. (T-24) with mandatory fields like (Bill No., Student Name, Challan No. etc.) which are required to be filled at the time of each posting.

 

After deploying the required EXE in LIVE system at all BAL branches, ITD has to intimate System &

Operations which will after receiving the intimation from IT Division, issue the necessary circular to BAL branches for compliance.

Account Opening Documentation for Housewives/Households/Unemployed/Students:

·         Original Scanned valid CNIC/SNIC.

·         Student ID card or any other professional/social details (if available).

·         Details of fund provider including Name, Father’s/Husband’s name, ID number, DOB and Occupational Details.

·         Documentary Income Proof of Fund provider.

·         Photographs.

·         Declaration Form for Zakat exemption (for PKR saving Account, to be submitted at parent branch before 1st of Shaban).

Account Opening Documentation for Retired Individuals:

·         Original Scanned valid CNIC/SNIC.

·         Documentary Income Proof of Terminal Benefits/Pension Book etc. or any other supporting document.

·         In case of dependent retired individual, the documentation as above of the fund provider’s income/source of fund.

·         Photograph.

·         Declaration Form for Zakat exemption (for PKR saving Account, to be submitted at parent branch before 1st of Shaban).

Account Opening Documentation for Landlord/Agriculturist:

·         Original Scanned valid CNIC/SNIC.

·         Appropriate proof of land holding e.g. Passbook, Land revenue receipt, property documents or any other acceptable relevant document.

·         Photograph.

·         Declaration Form for Zakat exemption (for PKR saving Account, to be submitted at parent branch before 1st of Shaban).

Account Opening Documentation for Freelance professionals:

·         For freelancers an online registration or account detail of the relevant website or portal or a statement of account or any other acceptable proof can be accepted, OR

·         For Partners working in a registered partnership, the partnership deed along with the Registration Certificate (with updated changes/amendments) of concerned Register will be obtained along with the said Undertaking

 

Account Opening Documentation for Account Opening Form dully filled by Parent/Guardian:

·         Proof of Date of Birth of Minor (B-Form)

·         Additional information about minor

·         Copy of Parent/Guardian’s CNIC along with Biometric Verification

·         Copy of Minor’s B-Form (Original Seen)

·         Proof of Income of Parent/Guardian

·         Proof of Guardianship in case of Guardian

·         Specimen Signature Card of Parent/Guardian

·         Account to be opened by Pakistani Residents and Pakistani Nationals only

·          

Note: Any other document deemed necessary as per Bank Policy, as per the account

Account Opening Documentation for Housewife/ House Hold/ Widow/Un-employed/ Student etc:

·         Valid copy of Identity documents of customer and fund provider as per General

·         Documentation Section is required,

·         Self-declaration (of the customer) regarding his/ her source and beneficial ownership of the

·         funds duly approved by BM/OM to ensure compliance of the relevant regulatory requirements

·         in true spirit.

·         Source of Income / Funds document of the fund provider as applicable

·         Name & CNIC Number (for Pakistani Nationals Only) of the Customer (i.e. Housewife/

·         House Hold/ Widow/Un-employed/ /Student etc.) & his/ her fund provider should be

·         screened out through Alfalah Screening system against all available screening lists and

·         ensure that the relationship doesn’t involve any sanctions / Designated / Proscribed element.

·         The screening results in the form of printout should be attached with AODs.

 

Roshan Digital Account

Roshan Digital account is a State Bank of Pakistan driven initiative; in collaboration with commercial banks operating in Pakistan to provide innovative banking solutions for millions of Non Resident Pakistanis (NRPs) seeking to undertake banking, payment and investment activities in Pakistan.  

The same has the following four categories:

1. Roshan digital account- PKR (Current and Savings account) – Can be opened by Non-residents only

2. Roshan digital account- FCY (Current and Savings account) – Can be opened by Nonresidents, and residents who have assets abroad declared with FBR (more details in the FAQs)

Non-residents can apply for the product from the link https://invest.bankalfalah.com/ops/Index.html and clicking “Open an account”, while residents can apply for it at the branch.

Invest in Naya Pakistan Certificates to Earn Great Returns.

Features

·         Offered in multiple currencies; PKR, USD, CAD, GBP, Euro, AED and SAR

·         No minimum balance requirement

·         Account can be 16%FED by Foreign Inward Remittances only originating from the account holder himself/herself through Home remittances or SWIFT, in any currency.

·         Multiple investment opportunities: Naya Pakistan Certificate, Access to Stock Market, Term Deposit booking* via Alfa, etc.

·         Easy repatriation of funds

·         Free Debit Card

·         Free SMS alerts

·         Funds Transfer Facility

·         Utility Bill Payment

·         24/7 Internet Banking

·         Free E-Statements

·         Free first cheque book *For PKR Roshan Digital Accounts only

Eligibility Criteria

Product will be offered to individuals above the Age of 18, who are:

·         Non-Resident Pakistanis

·         Foreign Nationals having Pakistan Origin Card (POC)

·         Employees or officials of the 16% Federal Government or a Provincial Government posted Abroad

·         Resident individuals having declared their assets held abroad, as per wealth statement Declared in the latest tax return with the 16%FEDeral Board of Revenue (FBR). (For FCY Roshan Digital account only).

Required Documents for Non-Resident applicants:

·         To process your application, the following supporting documents will be required:

·         Scanned Copy of Your CNIC/NICOP/POC

·         Scanned copy of Your Passport (first 2 pages, Pakistani and/or foreign/other country, latest exit stamp on Pakistani Passport)

·         Photograph (Passport size)

·         Live photo (to be taken on the website)

·         Signature (scanned on white page)

·         Scanned copies of Overseas Pakistani Foundation (OPF) Card (if applicable)

·         Proof of NRP Status (scanned copy of POC, visa, entry/ exit stamps etc.)

·         Proof of profession and Source of Income/Funds

·         The customer will also be communicated in case any further documentation is required for their case.

Required Documents for Resident applicants:

The same will be subject to requirements as per existing process of opening accounts as the branches, including wealth statement where foreign assets have been declared.

Helpline numbers

English Script

·         Our helpline number for General Banking is 021-111-225-111 & 042-111-225-111

·         Our helpline number for Premier Banking/RDA is 0092-21-111-225-226

·         Our helpline number for Branchless Banking is 021-111-225-229

·         Our helpline number for Platinum Credit Card is 0800-22225

·         Our helpline number for Alfa is 021-111-225-224

·         Our helpline number for American Express is 021-111-226-111 & 042-111-226-111

·         Our helpline number for Roshan Digital Account is 0092-21-111-225-226

·         Our helpline number for BISP is 021-111-427-111

Urdu Script

·         General Banking ke lye hamari helpline number hai 021-111-225-111 & 042-111-225-111

·         Premier Banking/RDA ke lye hamari helpline number hai 0092-21-111-225-226

·         Branchless Banking ke lye hamari helpline number hai 021-111-225-229

·         Platinum ke lye hamari helpline number hai 0800-22225

·         Alfa ke lye hamari helpline hai 021-111-225-224

·         American Express ke lye hamari helpline number hai 021-111-226-111 & 042-111-226-111

Rohan Apni Car (Conventional banking)

Roshan Digital Account (RDA) is a major initiative of State Bank of Pakistan, in collaboration with commercial operating in Pakistan. These accounts provide innovative banking solutions for millions of Non Resident Pakistanis banks (NRPs) seeking to undertake banking, payment and investment activities in Pakistan.

Product Types

Vehicle Category:

Financing facility available for Locally Manufactured Brand New Vehicles only

Loan Size:

Minimum PKR 200,000/- and Maximum PKR 7,500,000/ (exceeding Rs. 7.5 million can be allowed on approval from Head of Consumer & Digital Risk and Head of Consumer Finance (CFG))

Down Payment / Equity Requirement:

  • Min 15% of Vehicle’s Value Up to Rs.6.0M Financing & Min20%of Vehicle’s Value for Financing aboveRs.6.0M
  • 0% Equity against Lien Based Financing

Financing Tenor:

2 – 7 Years (Brand New Locally Manufactured Vehicles only)

Bank Alfalah Roshan Apni Car Product Features 7

Mode of Payment:

Monthly installments are to be deposited in Auto Loan Repayment Account.

Or

Monthly installments may be paid through Direct Debit Instructions from PKR Roshan Digital Account.

In case of Direct Debit Instructions mandatory for Foreign Roshan Digital Account Holder to open Roshan Digital Account in Pak Rupee.

Benefits for Customer:

Fast Track Processing Quick and hassle free processing of Auto loan referrals made under RDA Auto Loan within 5 business days (case approval) instead of average 9-10 business days as in case of standard cases. This includes:

  • Minimum documentation requirement
  • Easy & flexible terms
  • Priority processing for Lien based segment within 48 hours as verifications are waived

Privilege Markup Rates Standard Segment: 1 Year KIBOR + 1.00% Lien Based Segment: SBP Floor Rate*+ 1.00%

*SBP Floor Rate” published by State Bank of Pakistan, prevailing rate at the time of disbursement will be applicable

 Lien Based Financing Option Available on Standard Financing:

  • 100% lien shall be marked equivalent to finance amount on Roshan Digital Account or Naya Pakistan Certificate till the maturity of auto loan
  • Minimum balance in Roshan Digital Account or investment in Naya Pakistan Certificate should be equivalent to finance amount        

Documentation Required

Mandatory Requirements

To Avail Bank Alfalah RDA Roshan Apni Car Facility

  • Must be Bank Alfalah Roshan Digital Account Holder
  • Local Nominee / Co-borrower in Pakistan is mandatory Nominee / Co-Borrower has to be from the following categories: Parents, Siblings, Spouse, or Children (Upon Documented Relation Proof through NADRA Certificate or written Undertaking)

Basic Documentation (Mandatory)

  • Complete Application Form
  • Copy of CNIC/NICOP/POC/Smart ID
  • Latest Photographs

Lien Based Segment:

Only Basic Documentation

Salaried Individuals:

Salary Slip / Salary Certificate

Bureau Report of Country of Residence

Self Employed Individuals / Professionals:

Tax Returns

Commercial Registration Certificate (where applicable)

06 months Bank Statement or Income Verification Report

Account Maintenance Certificate (to be furnished if required by the Bank)

Bureau Report of Country of Residence

Remittance Based:

Remitter Job / Income Proof

Remitter Passport Copy

6 months remittance slips / 6 months Bank Statement of Remittee

 

Eligibility Criteria

Income Segment

Criteria

Salaried

Minimum Age 21 Years to 65 Years at time of loan maturity

U$D 3,000/- per month or equivalent (Interbank exchange rate of decision date)

Currently employed, with a total employment experience of 06 months

Self Employed Businessmen/Professional

Minimum Age 21 to 70 years at time of loan maturity

U$D 4,000/- per month or equivalent (Interbank exchange rate of decision date)

Income calculation through bank statement or tax returns

Minimum 1 Years in current Business

Remittance based financing

Regular remittance credits to his / her family members (Nominee / Co-borrower) in Pakistan

There is a continuity of remittance – at least 6 regular deposits in Co-borrower’s account through Foreign Account or Roshan Digital Account or Remittance Slips.

Lien based financing

Roshan Digital Account holders can avail auto loan against lien on their Pak Rupee Roshan Digital Account or Pak Rupee Naya Pakistan Certificate

100% lien shall be marked equivalent to finance amount on Roshan Digital Account or Naya Pakistan Certificate till the maturity of auto loan.

Financing against Lien on Naya Pakistan Certificate shall be extended with respect to the term / period of Certificate. Where RDA holder wishes to avail facility for extended period he shall arrange the Certificates as per the financing tenure

 

Roshan Apni Car (Islamic banking)

Bank Alfalah Islamic Roshan Apni Car is an Auto Facility where RDA holders can enjoy Auto Facility from Bank Alfalah Islamic on Privilege terms.

Product Features:

  • Financing facility is available for Locally manufactured brand new vehicles
  • Financing Tenure: 1-7 years

Benefits:

  • Fast Track Processing Quick and hassle free processing of Auto Finance referrals made under RDA Auto Finance. This includes:

·         Minimum documentation requirement

·         Easy & flexible terms

·         Priority processing for Lien based segment.

  • Privilege Profit Rates

·         Standard Segment: 1 Year KIBOR* + 1.00%

·         Lien Based Segment: SBP Floor Rate**+ 1.00%

* KIBOR rate (1 year Offer Side) on the 1st of the month will be used.

** (“SBP Floor Rate” published by State Bank of Pakistan, prevailing rate at the time of disbursement will be applicable)

Product Types

Ijarah mode of financing will be executed.

  1. Lien base financing
  2. Non Lien base financing

Security Deposit / Equity Requirement

·         Min 15% of Vehicle’s Value Up to Rs.6.0M Financing & Min 20% of Vehicle’s Value for Financing above Rs. 6.0M

·         0% Equity against Lien Based Facility

Eligibility Criteria

Must be Bank Alfalah Roshan Digital Account Holder.

Local Nominee in Pakistan is mandatory.

Salaried

·         Minimum Age 21 Years to 65 Years at time of Facility maturity

·         U$D 3,000/- per month or equivalent

·         Currently employed, with a total employment experience of 06 months

 Self Employed Businessmen / Professional

·         Minimum Age 21 to 70 years at time of Facility maturity

·         U$D 4,000/- per month or equivalent

·         Minimum 1 Years in current Business

Documentation Required

Lien Based

Only Basic documentation

Salaried Individuals

Salary slip/Salary certificate

Bureau Report of country of residence

SEP/SEB

Tax returns

Commercial registration Certificate (where applicable)

6-month Bank statement or Income Verification Report

Account maintenance certificate

Bureau Report of country of residence

Remittance based

Remitter job/Income Proof

Remitter Passport copy

6 months remittance slips / 6 months bank statement

Roshan Apna Ghar (Conventional banking)

RDA – Roshan Apna Ghar

Roshan Apna Ghar provides quick and convenient solutions to get housing finance in easy and affordable monthly installments. This facility will be available for customers who either willing to keep their investment as lien against their net financing amount as collateral or avail financing without cash collateral. Further, this will also be available to all the customer of Govt Mark-up Subsidy Scheme (G-MSS) for housing finance as per already defined criteria under respective tiers.

Salient Features

·         Customer must be a Bank Alfalah Roshan Digital Account Holder

·         Maximum financing against property value

·         Exclusive Price Offering

·         Flexibility to make partial pre-payments with zero charges after first year

·         For first year 1% will be charged upon Early Termination afterwards NO charges will be levied.

·         Processing fee Rs. 4,000/- (exclusive of 16%FED)

·         Optional life Insurance covering death (due to any cause) and accidental/natural disability

·         Property Insurance (covering the financing amount) absolutely FREE for customers

·         Govt Mark-up subsidy scheme (GMSS) for housing finance will be applicable as per already defined criteria under respective tier

Without Lien

Following criteria will be applicable to those RDA customers who are willing to avail house finance facility without lien marking and does not eligible / qualifies for GMSS:

Citizenship

All non-resident RDA accountholders having valid NICOP

Product Category

Buy, Build, Renovate

Target Market

Salaried Individual

Non-salaried individual

Co-applicant

Co-applicant is mandatory.

Co-applicant will be an immediate family member like spouse, parents, adult siblings & children. At least one should be permanently living in Pakistan.

Co-applicant for income clubbing

100% Co-applicant income will be clubbed in case of spouse.

75% Co-applicant income will be clubbed in case of other than spouse.

For the purpose of income clubbing, only a non-resident Pakistanis can be considered.

Maximum number of co-applicants

Four co-applicants are allowed

Age (Applicant & Co-applicant)

Salaried Individual

23 to 60 years

Non-salaried individual

23 to 65 years

Financing Range (Buy, Build)

Minimum Rs. 500,000/-

Maximum No cap

Financing Range (Renovate only)

Minimum Rs. 500,000/-

Maximum Rs. 10 million

Financing Tenure

3 to 25 Years

Debt to Equity Ratio

Maximum financing (debt) up to 85% of property value subject to Finance amount and customer segment.

Debt to Equity Ratio (Renovation only)

Financing up to 30 % of property value

Number of housing units at a time

At a time one financing facility may be allowed

Debt Burden Ratio

45% of the net disposable income

Employment Status (for salaried individual only)

Permanent & Contractual

Employment / Business Tenure

Salaried: 2 years

Non-Salaried: 3 Years (2 Years for existing BAFL lending relationships)

 

With Lien

·         105% lien shall be marked equivalent to finance amount on Roshan Digital Account or Naya Pakistan Certificate till the maturity of loan.

·         Minimum balance in Roshan Digital Account or investment in Naya Pakistan Certificate should be equivalent to finance amount with additional 5% Margin.

 

Citizenship

All non-resident RDA accountholders having valid NICOP & POC

Product Category

Buy, Build, Renovate

Target Market

Salaried

Non- Salaried

Co-applicant

Co-applicant is not mandatory.

If opted it will be an immediate family member like spouse, parents, adult siblings & children. Further, applicant also has an option of appointing a “nominee” to carry out any assignment on his/her behalf having no legal obligations on nominee.

Co-applicant for income clubbing

100% Co-applicant income will be clubbed.

For the purpose of income clubbing, only a non-resident Pakistanis can be considered.

Maximum number of co-applicants

Four co-applicants are allowed

Age (Applicant & Co-applicant)

Salaried Individual

23 to 60 years

Non-salaried individual

23 to 65 years

Financing Range (Buy & Build)

Minimum Rs. 500,000/-

Maximum No cap

Financing Range (Renovate only)

Minimum Rs. 500,000/-

Maximum Rs. 10 million

Financing Tenure

3 to 25 Years

Debt to Equity Ratio (Buy& Build)

Maximum up to 99% of property value

Debt to Equity Ratio (only Renovate)

Financing up to 40 % of property value

Number of housing units at a time

At a time one financing facility may be allowed

Debt Burden Ratio

Not applicable

Employment Status (for salaried individual only)

Permanent & Contractual

Employment / Business Tenure

Minimum overall employment / business tenure will be one year

 

Documentation

Following list will be applicable for regular HF customers applying under product A and B. For GMSS, same list of documents will be applicable as defined in GMSS product scheme.

Non-Lien Based:

Salaried Individual:

·         Digital loan application (Please click “Apply Now” at bottom of this page)

·         Copy of Co-Applicant’s CNIC/ NICOP

·         Scan copy coloured photographs of applicant and co-applicant(s) each.

·         Employer’s certificate including tenor/designation/renumeration details.

·         Employment Contract (in case of contractual employee)

·         Latest salary slip.

·         Bank Statement – last 6 months (Original OR duly attested by the bank with stamp / notary public).

·         Copies/ details of any financing facility being availed in the country of employment or in Pakistan

·         Copies of latest tax documents (where applicable)

·         Credit Bureau Report of stay country

 

Non -Salaried Individual:

·         Digital loan application (Please click “Apply Now” at bottom of this page)

·         Copy of Co-Applicant’s CNIC/ NICOP

·         Scan copy coloured photographs of applicant and co-applicant(s) each.

·         Valid Business Proof

·         Bank Statement – last 12 months (Original OR duly attested by the bank with stamp / notary public)

·         Copies/ details of any financing facility being availed in the country of employment or in Pakistan

·         Copies of educational qualification degree / certificates (in case of self-employed professional)

·         Copies of last 2 years’ tax documents where applicable

·         Credit Bureau Report of stay country

·         Lien Based:

·         Digital loan application (Please click “Apply Now” at bottom of this page)

·         Copy of Co-Applicant’s CNIC/ NICOP

·         Scan copy coloured photographs of applicant and co-applicant(s) each.

·         Valid proof of income documents

Lien Based:

·         Digital loan application (Please click “Apply Now” at bottom of this page)

·         Copy of Co-Applicant’s CNIC/ NICOP

·         Scan copy coloured photographs of applicant and co-applicant(s) each.

·         Valid proof of income documents

Roshan Apna Ghar (Islamic Banking)

Islamic Roshan Apna Ghar provides quick and convenient solutions to get housing finance in easy and affordable monthly installments. This facility will be available for all RDA customers who are either willing to keep their RDA balance/INPC investment as lien against their net financing amount as collateral or avail financing without cash collateral. Further, this will also be available to all the customers of Govt. Subsidy Scheme (GSS) for housing finance as per already defined criteria under respective tiers.

Salient Features

·         Customer must be a Bank Alfalah Roshan Digital Account Holder.

·         Maximum financing against property value.

·         Exclusive Price Offering.

·         Flexibility to make partial payments with zero charges after first year.

·         For first year 1% will be charged upon Early Termination afterwards NO charges will be levied.

·         Processing fee Rs. 4,000/- (exclusive of 16%FED).

·         Optional life Takaful covering death (due to any cause) and accidental/natural disability.

·         Property Takaful expenses shall be borne by the bank.

·         Govt. subsidy scheme as per SBP IH&SMEFD Circular No. 03 of 2021 for housing finance will be applicable as per already defined criteria under respective tiers.

Without Lien

Citizenship

All non-resident RDA accountholders having valid NICOP

Product Category

Buy, Build, Renovate

Target Market

Salaried Individual

Non-salaried individual

Co-applicant

Co-applicant is mandatory.

Co-applicant will be an immediate family member like spouse, parents, adult siblings & children. At least one should be permanently living in Pakistan.

Co-applicant for income clubbing

100% Co-applicant income will be clubbed in case of spouse.

75% Co-applicant income will be clubbed in case of other than spouse.

For the purpose of income clubbing, only non-resident Pakistanis can be considered.

Maximum number of co-applicants

Four co-applicants are allowed

Age (Applicant & Co-applicant)

Salaried Individual

20 to 60 years

Non-salaried individual

20 to 65 years

Financing Range (Buy, Build)

Minimum Rs. 500,000/-

Maximum No cap

Financing Range (Renovate only)

Minimum Rs. 500,000/-

Maximum Rs. 10 million

Financing Tenure

3 to 25 Years

Finance to Equity Ratio

Maximum financing (debt) up to 85% of property value

Finance to Equity Ratio (Renovation only)

Financing up to 30 % of property value

Number of housing units at a time

At a time one financing facility may be allowed

Net Monthly Income

There will be no minimum income criteria

Debt Burden Ratio

50% of the net disposable income

Employment Status (for salaried individual only)

Permanent & Contractual

Employment / Business Tenure

Minimum overall employment / business tenure will be two years

 

With Lien

All non-resident RDA accountholders having valid NICOP & POC

Product Category

Buy, Build, Renovate

Target Market

Salaried

Non- Salaried

Minimum overall employment / business tenure will be one year

 

Documentation

Following list will be applicable for regular HM customers applying under product A and B. For GMSS, same list of documents will be applicable as defined in GMSS product scheme.

 

Salaried Individual:

·         Duly filled application form.

·         Applicant’s copy of NICOP

·         Copy of Co-Applicant’s CNIC/ NICOP

·         Two passport-sized coloured photographs of applicant and co-applicant(s) each.

·         Employer’s certificate including tenor/designation/renumeration details.

·         Employment Contract (if applicable)

·         Last three-month salary slip.

·         Copy of Passport (if applicable/optional)

·         Copy of Visa / Work permit / Residence Permit (Iqaama etc.)

·         Copy of Professional Association Membership Certificate / Practice License (if applicable)

·         Bank Statement – last 12 months (Original OR duly attested by the bank with stamp / notary public) through embassy.

·         Copies/ details of any financing facility being availed in the country of employment or in Pakistan

·         Copies of educational qualification degree / certificates.

·         Copy of Rental Documents (if applicable)

·         Copy of recent Credit Card Bills. (if applicable)

·         Copies of last 2 years’ tax documents where applicable

·         Credit Bureau Report of stay country

Non -Salaried Individual:

·         Duly filled application form.

·         Applicant’s copy of NICOP

·         Copy of Co-Applicant’s CNIC/ NICOP

·         Two passport-sized coloured photographs of applicant and co-applicant(s) each.

·         Valid Business Proof

·         Copy of Passport (if applicable/optional)

·         Copy of Visa / Work permit / Residence Permit (Iqaama etc.)

·         Bank Statement – last 12 months (Original OR duly attested by the bank with stamp / notary public) through embassy.

·         Copies/ details of any financing facility being availed in the country of employment or in Pakistan

·         Copies of educational qualification degree / certificates.

·         Copy of Rental Documents (if applicable)

·         Copy of recent Credit Card Bills. (if applicable)

·         Copies of last 2 years’ tax documents where applicable

·         Credit Bureau Report of stay country

Non-Lien Based:

·         Digital finance application (Please click “Apply Now” at bottom of this page)

·         Copy of Co-Applicant’s CNIC/ NICOP

·         Scan copy colored photographs of applicant and co-applicant(s) each.

·         Valid proof of income documents

Debit Cards

The eligibility criteria of the product are based upon deposit requirement of respective account.

Please note, in order to have a Premier Visa Signature Debit Card, you need to maintain six monthly average balance as per the following thresholds:

  • Current Account: PKR 2 Million, OR
  • Current & Savings (Combination): PKR 3 Million in Savings and PKR 1 Million in Current Account, OR
  • Saving Account: PKR 5 Million

Please refer below mentioned table for card variant

Below is the ATM cash withdrawal limit in one go from BAFL ATM.

·         PKR 100,000 from BAFL debit card

·         PKR 20,000 from any other bank card

·         Magnetic Strip Debit card limit is same i.e. 20,000 in one go

Here are the annual charges for various debit cards:

(Conventional Banking)

·         Visa Classic Debit Card 2300 + 16% FED

·         Visa Gold Debit Card 2800 + 16% FED

 (Islamic Banking)

·         Visa Classic Debit Card 2300 + 16% FED

·         Visa Gold Debit Card 2800 + 16% FED

·         PayPak Classic Debit Card 2000 + 16% FED

·         Islamic Visa Signature Power Pack Debit Card 14000 + 16% FED

·         Islamic Visa Premier Signature Debit Card Exempted for fees

·         Gold Debit Card (Asaan & Freelancer Digital Account): 2800 + 16% FED

·         Classic Debit Card (Asaan & Freelancer Digital Account): 2300 + 16% FED

 

Basic Debit Card Replacement Charges

Please have the Debit Card replacement charges as under:

-         Classic Debit Card: 1600+16%FED

-         Debit Card Replacement Fee on Roshan Digital Account: 6600+16% FED

-         Gold Debit Card: 1800+16%FED

-         Pay Pak Debit Card: 1600+16%FED

-         Platinum Debit Card: 3000+16%FED

-         Signature Debit Card: 3000+16%FED

-         CON Premier Signature Debit Card: FREE

-         Isl Premier Signature Debit Card: FREE

Please have the Supplementary Debit Card charges as under:

Supplementary Debit Card Issuances/Annual

-         Classic Debit Card: 1150+16%FED

-         Gold Debit Card: 1400+16%FED

-         Gold Debit Card for RDA customers: 1400+16%FED

-         Pay Pak Debit Card: 1000 +16%FED

-         Platinum Debit Card: 2500+16%FED

-         Signature Debit Card: 7000+16%FED

-         Premier Signature Debit Card: FREE

 

Supplementary Debit Replacement Fee:

Please have the Supplementary Debit Card replacement charges as under:

-         Classic Debit Card: 1150+16%FED

-         Gold Debit Card: 1400+16%FED

-         Pay Pak Debit Card: 1000+16%FED

-         Platinum Debit Card: 2500+16%FED

-         Signature Debit Card: 7000+16%FED

Credit Cards

Instant Cli

Specific segments are only those customers who are being approached by bank for limit enhancement. We can’t provide below email address to customers who are approaching bank themselves for limit enhancement.

Lien based (secured)

Credit card issued on lien based (secured) means card is being issued against a fixed deposit amount in your account.

Clean limit

Credit card issued on clean limit means card is being issued based on bank’s assessment criteria where proof of income is required.

 

Card Categories, Age & Salary Ranges:

-         Visa Ultra: Age 30, Salary Range PKR 20,000 - PKR 50,000

-         Visa Classic: Age 30, Salary Range PKR 20,000 - PKR 50,000

-         Visa Gold: Age 35, Salary Range PKR 50,000 - PKR 100,000

-         Titanium/Optimus: Age 35, Salary Range PKR 75,000 - PKR 125,000

-         Visa Platinum & American Express Card: Age 35-60, Salary Range > PKR 100,000

-         Premier Platinum & Platinum Plus: Age 30-65, Salary Range > PKR 200,000        

Basic Documentation:

For Salaried Persons:

-         Application Form

-         CNIC

-         Latest Salary Slip/Certificate

For Self-Employed:

-         Application Form

-         CNIC

-         6-month Bank Statement

-         Proprietorship letter or proof of business

Card Categories and Limits:

-         Premier Platinum Credit Card: Min: PKR 300,000, Max: PKR 7,000,000

-         Platinum Credit Card: Min: PKR 300,000, Max: PKR 7,000,000

-         Amex Credit Card: Min: PKR 150,000, Max: PKR 7,000,000

-         Master Optimus Credit Card: Min: PKR 125,000, Max: PKR 1,000,000

-         Gold Credit Card: Min: PKR 75,000, Max: PKR 650,000

-         Ultra Credit Card: Min: PKR 25,000, Max: PKR 499,000

-         Classic Credit Card: Min: PKR 25,000, Max: PKR 180,000

 

Sectors Restricted for Credit Card Applications

·         Hospitality industry (Hotels / Restaurants)

·         Entertainment (Cinemas / Parks – TV Channels excluded)

·         Travel / Airlines

Income Requirements - (Payroll/Permanent/Contractual Staff/Bank Alfalah Staff) All Cards

Rs. 75,000 Average Account Balance

 

  • LTM: Large Target Market (Approved A&B GOP/Payroll & STS/Armed Forces/Salaried
  • STM: Small Target Market (Approved C&G/ Unapproved/ Self-employed businessmen & self-employed professionals.  
  • RH: Rich Hit (customer with 12+ month history in bureau)
  • NRH: Non-Rich Hit

Important Conditions for Spend Base Criteria

  1. Annual fees will be levied on new acquisitions only and on cards that were issued from July 2021 onwards
  2. Customers need to spend the required threshold in two months from the date when annual fees are levied
  3. Cumulative spend on either basic or supplementary card can be considered for reversal for both basic and supplementary cards annual fees
  4. Transactions not to be considered for spend base reversals:
    1. All service charges and other fees
    2. Cash Advance
    3. BTF (Balance Transfer Facility)
    4. COP (Credit On Phone)

 

Alfa App transactions, Alfa Mall transactions, Payments by QR code, Utility Bill Payments & SBS plans are also considered spend in addition to other spend base criteria.

 

  1. Retail (POS & Online) transactions that were converted to SBS later can be considered for fees reversal
  2. In case of Prorate fees on supplementary credit card, customer to spend 50% of actual spending 50% of the required actual spending for annual fee reversal (charged 2nd time in same calendar year)

CDM

CDM stand for Cash Deposit Machine (CDM) is a machine that lets you make Deposits and Payments Transactions by Cash. All successful transactions are immediately credited and customers will be issued a Deposit Slip for confirming the Transactions.

Cash Deposit into Bank Alfalah Account

1.    Select ‘Deposit to Alfalah’ from the main screen.

2.    Enter CNIC and provide thumb impression for biometric verification.

3.    Enter Bank Alfalah Account number and Mobile number.

4.    Validate account details.

5.    Deposit cash into the machine and verify cash count on screen and press deposit.

6.    Collect receipt on successful transaction.

Cash Deposit into Other Bank Account

1.    Select ‘Deposit to Alfalah’ from the main screen.

2.    Enter CNIC and provide thumb impression for biometric verification.

3.    Select desired bank from the given list.

4.    Enter Bank Alfalah Account number and Mobile number.

5.    Validate account details.

6.    Deposit cash into the machine and verify cash count on screen and press deposit.

7.    Collect receipt on successful transaction.

Utility Bill Payment

1.    Select ‘Utility Bill Payment’ from the main screen.

2.    Enter CNIC and provide thumb impression for biometric verification.

3.    Select Biller Type (Electricity, Gas, Water, Internet or PTCL).

4.    Select Billing Company.

5.    Enter Mobile Number and Consumer Number.

6.    Verify the fetched details and amount.

7.    Deposit cash into the machine and verify cash count on screen and press deposit.

8.    Collect receipt on successful transaction.

Other Bank Accounts

Charges for depositing cash through a Cash Deposit Machine (CDM) for Other Bank Accounts. The charges are based on the deposited amount and are as follows:

·         Up to Rs. 10,000: PKR 100

·         Rs. 10,001 to 100,000: PKR 150

·         Rs. 100,001 to 250,000: PKR 300

·         Rs. 250,001 to 500,000: PKR 500

·         Rs. 500,001 and above: PKR 1,000 or 0.1%, whichever is higher

 

Visit www.bankalfalah.com/personal-banking/self-service-banking/atm-cash-cheque-deposit-machine  & download the complete list of CDM locations.

Cheque Deposit Via CDM

·         Cheque Deposit Selection, Customer will select Cheque Deposit option.

·         Customer will ask to select “CHEQUE DEPOSIT”

·         Customer will ask to select the option either want to deposit in BAFL cheque or other bank cheque.

·         If customer selects the option “Bank Alfalah Cheque”, Customer will ask to select the option of instant Deposit or cheque deposit.

·         Cheque amounting as applicable will be deposited in instant cash deposit as same has been credited on real time basis. Further cheque amounting greater than 50,000 will be cheque and authorized by branch (CBC will be performed by branch before authorizing the transaction above Rs 50000.

·         Upon selecting cheque deposit option customer will ask to input CNIC Number.

·         Customer will ask to place right thumb on biometric device for BIO verification.

·         Customer will ask to input his mobile number.

·         Customer will ask to input the account number.

·         Title fetch screen will have appeared on successful input of account number.

·         Customer will ask to deposit cheque into the CCDM.

·         Scan image of cheque appeared on the screen and customer will ask to enter the amount.

·         Thanking screen will have appeared upon successful cheque deposit.

 

 

 

Hajj

This is to inform you that Hajj application 2022 will be accept by branches from 9th May to 13th May. For detailed information and submission of Hajj application you are advised to kindly visit the nearest Bank Alfalah branch.

 

Dates

·         Online application registrations for Hajj this year would be received till 13th May 2022

·         Collections by the branches shall begin from 9th to 13th May 2022

·         A token money of PKR 50,000/- shall be deposited with the bank along with the application

·         The applicants can submit their applications online through Hajj portal www.hajiinfo.org

 

Quota

·         Pakistan had received a Hajj quota of 81,132 pilgrims this year with 40% under the government scheme and 60% under private scheme

 

Age Limits

·         The upper age limit for pilgrims had been fixed at 65 years

 

Cost

·         A total amount of Hajj will be announced after getting confirmation from Saudi Arabia. However, it is expected that the cost of Hajj this year may be around PKR 700,000 to PKR 10,00,000

 

Vaccination

·         As per the policy, pilgrims would be required to be fully vaccinated with a booster dose

·         Pilgrims will have to undergo a PCR test at least 72 hours before the departure

 

Alfalah Rapid

What is Rapid?

Rapid is a portal to limitless possibilities! It is a platform where you can open your account yourself digitally with just a few a clicks, apply for Bank Alfalah Cards, conveniently download e-statements, subscribe for SMS alerts and so much more.

To access Bank Alfalah Rapid, please visit rapid.bankalfalah.com or Call 042/021-111-225-111

For RAPID account, please use the following links for Conventional and Islamic Banking respectively.

·         CONV https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Home.aspx

·         IBG https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Index.aspx

Also customers can now open Bank Alfalah Account Digitally. Customers can simply download Alfa or visit rapid.bankalfalah.com and open an account via self-remote portal of rapid or via Alfa app.

Rapid Features

1) Bank Alfalah Accounts:

You can now open an account with Bank Alfalah from anywhere through Rapid. Choose the best option that suits your needs and start enjoying banking through our vast branch network and self-service solutions.

·         Current Account: Open Current Account to get the transactional convenience for your everyday banking needs.

·         Saving Account: Open Saving Account to grow your savings and get attractive returns.

2) Cards:

·         Rapid enables you to apply for our wide range of Debit and Credit Cards to enjoy various deals and discounts with convenience.

·         Debit Cards: Bank Alfalah Debit Cards bring to you a convenient and secure solution to access your funds from any ATM (depending on card scheme) or make purchases at any POS.

·         Credit Cards: Bank Alfalah chip-based Credit Cards open up a world of lifestyle privileges and financial freedom that allow you to live life just the way you want to! Become part of the largest credit card family in the country and enjoy unparalleled services and discounts every time you travel, shop or dine out.

3) Self-Service Banking:

Through Rapid you can opt-in for our widespread range of self-service banking features to make your banking experience smoother than ever before.

·         E-Statement Subscription: Receive updated account statement via e-mail with our e-statement subscription service.

·         SMS Subscription: Subscribe for SMS banking to get free SMS alerts and other banking services on your phone.

·         Cheque Book Request: Get your cheque book issued conveniently with our cheque book request feature.

·         Electronic Transaction Block/Unblock: Block or unblock your electronic transactions in three easy steps.

·         CNIC Expiry Update: Update your CNIC expiry details conveniently with the CNIC Expiry Update feature.

·         Internet Banking Registration: Subscribe for Bank Alfalah Internet Banking and enjoy our banking services anywhere anytime.

·         Withholding Tax Certificate: Download your Withholding Tax Certificate and Statement. You can use this feature to file your tax returns with ease.

Eligibility Criteria:

Who can apply for an Account through Bank Alfalah RAPID?

·         At present, only Pakistani Resident Individuals aged 18 or above with a valid CNIC can apply for a new account through Bank Alfalah RAPID.

Alfalah Rapid Account (Onboarding Tutorial)

·         Please visit rapid.bankalfalah.com from any browser.

·         Click on Alfalah Rapid.

·         Please use the following links for Conventional Banking and Islamic respectively.

Conventional Banking: https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Home.aspx

Islamic Banking: https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Index.aspx

·         Click “Open your Account now” to open your RAPID Account with Bank Alfalah.

·         Select your Account type -Current or Savings Account according to your transactional needs.

·         Select Preferred Product by reading more about each of our product categories.

·         Read the Document Checklist to ensure you have all documents prepared with you.

·         Select Start Now to start your RAPID Account Opening Process.

 

Stage 0: Verification Details

·         On this screen, please enter your Identity type, ID Number, Issue Date, Email address, Mobile network and Mobile Number for verification purposes.

·         In addition, please upload a picture of your CNIC front and back.

·         Once done, press Save and Next.

·         You shall be required to verify your email and cell phone number through the OTAC to proceed further.

 

Stage 1: Personal Details

·         On this screen, please enter Personal Details including Name, Father’s/Husband’s Name, Mother’s Maiden Name, Gender, DOB, Place of Birth, Country of Residence, and ID card expiry date.

·         On this screen, please enter Next of Kin’s details and your contact details (current and permanent addresses).

·         Next, if you hold dual nationality please fill details accordingly and provide CRS details.

 

Stage 2: Occupational Details (For Salaried Individuals)

·         On this screen, you are required to enter Occupational Details including Name of Employer, Profession, Source of Funds, Expected Monthly Salary and Office Address.

·         For Know your Customer(KYC) purposes, please enter Purpose of account, Modes of Deposit/withdrawal as well as the amount expected to be credited.

·         Press Save and Next to proceed to Stage 3 of the RAPID Account Opening Form.

 

Stage 2: Occupational Details (For others)

-         On this screen, you are required to enter Occupational Details including Profession, Source of Funds, Funds Provider and Expected Monthly Salary.

-         For Know your Customer(KYC) purposes, please enter Purpose of account, Modes of Deposit/withdrawal as well as the amount expected to be credited.

-         Press Save and Next to proceed to Stage 3 of the RAPID Account Opening Form.

 

Stage 3: Banking Requirements

-         On this screen, you are required to enter Account Details including Account Type and Category, Product Type, and Title. In addition, please specify the services you require, e.g. Debit Card type, cheque book, e-statement and SMS Alert facilities.

-         Press Save and Next to proceed to Stage 4 of the RAPID Account Opening Form.

 

Stage 4: Documents Upload

-         On this screen, you are required to upload photos of original documents including Scanned copy of your Signature, Proof of Address, Proof of Income and other tax details.

-         Once uploaded, press Save and Next to proceed to Stage 5 of the RAPID Account Opening Form.

 

Stage 5: T&C’s and Declaration

-         This is the final step of Account Application Process.

-         On this screen, you must agree to the Terms & Conditions of Account Opening at Bank Alfalah.

-         Press Save and Submit to submit your RAPID Account Opening Form.

 

Acknowledgement

-         Once the form is submitted, customer receives an acknowledgment on screen and through an email.

-         After submission, Bank Alfalah shall review the Account Opening request and activate the account within 24 Hours (1 Working Day) in case of no discrepancy.

-         Once the account is activated, you will receive a Verification call on your registered cell phone number within 14 days from your parent branch.

-         In case of a discrepancy, one of the representatives of the bank shall revert to the customer for resolution within timeline.

-         Visit any BAFL Branch or Biometrically enabled ATM for Biometric Verification within 60 days. Prior to biometric verification, transaction limit shall be restricted up to Rs. 200,000/- per month.

Alfa QR

Dear Customer, please visit the mentioned link in order to get informations for Alfa QR: https://www.bankalfalah.com/personal-banking/digital-banking/alfa-qr/

How can your banking app make your payments easier? AlfaQR enables our valued Alfa users to make payments with just 3 taps within the app. With AlfaPay you can simply scan AlfaQR codes to make instant payments at over 100,000 Masterpass merchants across Pakistan. Payments can be made using your Bank Alfalah Account, Credit Card, Wallet or with Orbits.

How to Pay

·         Customer makes a purchase at any store.

·         Merchants’ QR is placed at each transaction point

·         Customer logs into the Alfa app and taps on the QR icon to open the QR scanner

·         Customer scans merchants’ QR code and selects the source of fund transfer i.e. Bank Account, Credit Card, Wallet or Orbits.

·         Customer reviews amount and confirms the transaction.

Where to find merchants with QR enabled payments?

Alfa app offers a selection of locators to suit our app users’ requirements. The Locator provides the directions to various Branches, ATMs, CDMs, Digital Corner & QR Merchants.

QR merchants offers an extensive list of merchants’ who cater to QR enabled payments on a regular basis. For customer flexibility, merchants may be filtered to suit customer requirements

·         Food

·         Electronics

·         Movies

·         Fashion

Alfa QR Locator provides the following merchant details;

·         Merchant details

·         Merchant Directions

·         Discounts offered by the merchant (if any)

·         Discounts offered by Bank Alfalah (if any)

Fees Applicable

QR based payments are free for Alfa users with no hidden charges

Lounge Access

Your Bank Alfalah Cards gives you complimentary airport lounge access with Visa LoungeKey at selected destinations worldwide­ ensuring a serene and luxurious travelling experience. To explore the complete list of participating lounges and to register for LoungeKey access, please visit www.Loungekey.com

Following Bank Alfalah Cards are eligible to access VISA Lounge Key:

1.    Alfalah VISA Signature Debit Card

2.    Alfalah Premier VISA Signature Debit Card

3.    Alfalah Islamic VISA Signature Debit Card

4.    Alfalah Islamic Premier VISA Signature Debit Card 

5.    Alfalah VISA Platinum Credit Card

6.    Alfalah VISA Premier Platinum Credit Card

FACILITIES AVAILABLE

·         Access to airport lounges regardless of class of ticket or airline

·         Complimentary drinks and snacks

·         Complimentary newspapers and magazines

·         Wi-Fi, laptop and mobile charging facilities

·         Conference rooms and entertainment facilities

Terms & Conditions – Alfalah VISA Signature and Premier Signature Debit Card

·         The Cardholder is entitled to unlimited lounge visits (Cardholder only) in a calendar year

·         To be eligible for unlimited visits, the Cardholder needs to complete one (1) international transaction of minimum USD 1 in each calendar year

·         The international transaction of minimum USD 1 can be performing at POS or e-commerce, provided that it may take up to ten (10) days for such transaction to become visible in lounge key’s systems.

·         The Cardholders can initially avail one (1) complimentary visit each year prior to meet the Eligibility Condition

·         Upon successfully satisfying the Eligibility Condition, the Cardholder becomes eligible for additional unlimited visits entitlement for the year

·         In-case of non-eligibility customer shall be charged with $32 per visit

·         Annual lounge visit entitlement and the requirement to meet the Eligibility Condition will reset from 1 Jan in subsequent years

·         Cardholders will need to mention “Lounge Key” to reception staff in order to avail the facility

·         The benefit of access to the Lounge is free for valid/active Bank Alfalah Cardholders and their Supplementary Cardholders only

·         Guests are not eligible for complimentary airport lounge access. Entry for guests is subject to rules and regulations of the respective lounge and may vary from lounge to lounge.

·         Guest visits are charged at $32 per visit per guest           

·         This complimentary privilege is accessible to Bank Alfalah Cardholders, irrespective of class of travel or airline

·         Participating lounges and facilities are subject to change anytime as per Visa policy. Customers should visit www.Loungekey.com for updated information prior to travelling

·         All Conditions of Use of LoungeKey available on LoungeKey portal shall apply

Terms & Conditions – Alfalah VISA Platinum and Premier Platinum Credit Card

·         The Cardholder is entitled to 6 lounge visits in a calendar year

·         Additional visits are charged at $32 per visit

·         Guests are not eligible for complimentary airport lounge access. Entry for guests is subject to rules and regulations of the respective lounge and may vary from lounge to lounge.

·         Guest visits are charged at $32 per visit per guest           

·         The benefit of access to the Lounge is free for valid/active Bank Alfalah Cardholders and their Supplementary Cardholders only

·         Cardholders will need to mention “Lounge Key” to reception staff in order to avail the facility

·         This complimentary privilege is accessible to Bank Alfalah Cardholders, irrespective of class of travel or airline

·         Participating lounges and facilities are subject to change anytime as per Visa policy. Customers should visit www.Loungekey.com for updated information prior to travelling

·         All Conditions of Use of LoungeKey available on LoungeKey portal shall apply

EASY STEPS TO ACCESS VISA LOUNGEKEY:

·         Visit the LoungeKey website at www.Loungekey.com for one-time registration of your Bank Alfalah Cards

·         Use Lounge Finder, on the LoungeKey website or mobile app, to access the full list of available airport lounges

·         Simply present your eligible Bank Alfalah Card at the lounge reception and mention the keyword “LoungeKey”

·         Your card will be used to register your visit and give you complimentary access to the lounge facilities

LoungeKey App

Download the LoungeKey app through Apple Store or Google Play; find lounges faster, review their visit history, entitlement and remaining visits.

Difference between Full Lounge and Hybrid Lounge

Hybrid lounge is basically a sub lounge which is on a smaller area (infrastructure wise) as compared to full lounge. We offer same banking services in both.

Mastercard Lounge Access (Dragon Pass)

Bank Alfalah Optimus MasterCard cardholders can avail lounge benefits provided by MasterCard. Earlier cardholders could avail them through LoungeKey platform but now MasterCard has switched to a new service provider, Master Card Airport Pass MEA, a Mobile Application and Web Solution, partnered via Dragon Pass for an enhanced customer travelling experience.

The cardholder can register their eligible MasterCard card and display their digital membership number at the lounge reception to gain access. The fulfillment method would be completely digitized as cardholders will not be required to present their card. The mobile application and web solution would work in similar ways. However, MasterCard recommends usage of the mobile app due to the real time customer experience it would offer.

 

Mobile App:

The mobile app can be downloaded via the following links, https://downloadapp.dragonpass.com.cn/mastercardairport-pass-mea

App Store:  https://apps.apple.com/us/app/mastercard-airport-pass-mea/id1493489553

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dragonpass.en.mcme

Web Link: https://mastercardmea.dragonpass.com/

Registration Process:

2.    Cardholders simply need to download ‘MasterCard Airport Pass’ mobile app via the mentioned link(s)

3.    Enter the eligible MasterCard card details along with some required personal details

4.    Create a Password to complete registration process

Lounge Access:

From the app homepage a cardholder has two routes;

1. Use the Search bar to find available lounges and then select a lounge and click “Member Access” to access from the lounge page.

2. On the bottom app menu click “My Visits”.

User and issuer Benefits:

1.    Easy app download and registration process

2.    Convenience through Geo location feature that displays lounges nearby which the cardholders can select or change and choose another one

3.     Clear benefit entitlements communicated as per specific card

Terms and Conditions:

Ø  Lounge locations, eligible lounges, etc. are effectively communicated to avoid customer inconvenience in the form of lounge declines, incorrect charges, etc.

Ø  All payments will be clearly presented to the cardholder in app prior to the lounge visit, and the cardholder can provide their active consent to the applicable charges before provision of lounge access. This helps to remove any unknown charges and avoid customer complaints.

Ø  Touchless entry at the lounge using QR code

Ø  Availability of guest passes for purchase through wallet

Ø  Ability to view visit receipt

Ø  Ability to receive E-receipts for applicable charges

Ø  End to End digital fulfillment

Ø  Mobile data is not required as membership number generated in the app is shown at the lounge.

Ø  DragonPass will enable the eligible BINs automatically. Hence, completion of Lounge implementation forms/ deal implementation sheets is not required.

Ø  DragonPass can share monthly Lounge visit reports to the issuer upon raising requirement with account manager and completion of necessary forms.

Note: Participating lounges and facilities are subject to change anytime as per MasterCard policy. All Conditions of use of MasterCard Airport Pass shall apply

Amex Card (Loungebuddy)

Introduction:

LoungeBuddy is an American Express Company acquired in 2019. It enables customers to discover, book and access more than 360 lounges in 58 countries. Whether you want to relax or be productive, LoungeBuddy provides American Express Card holders the opportunity to escape the airport hustle through its network of international lounges and their facilities. This facility is exclusively for American Express Card holders and all payments are to be made through the specified card type only, no separate registration is required.

Facilities:

·         In general, lounges are filled with the below complimentary amenities, however, they are subject to T&Cs and availability in each lounge.

·         Premium food and snacks

·         Fast WiFi

·         Abundant power outlets

·         Prayer rooms

·         Flight monitors

·         New papers and magazines

·         Television

 

Links:

Website: https://www.loungebuddy.com/

App: IOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/loungebuddy-airport-lounges/id674176920

Android: currently they can only access through website, no app available.

Lounge Access Enjoy our premium lounge facilities through the following

1. Browse lounges at your arrival or departure airport on our website or mobile app.

2. Select a lounge and purchase access.

3. Show your confirmation to the front desk staff to gain access
