Important Terms & Conditions

·         CIP Lounge is only applicable on international travel

·         Only CIP Lounge of Karachi, Lahore and Islamabad are included in the offer

·         One guest is allowed on Premier Platinum & Platinum Credit Card

·         Customer just needs to present his Bank Alfalah credit card at the lounged to enjoy access to CIP lounge

·         PKR 1 transaction will be made to validate the activation of card

·         Offer is valid on both basic & supplementary cards

·         Cardholders can enjoy the access to CIP lounge for free on all eligible cards.

·         CIP Lounge facility is being offered at Karachi, Lahore and Islamabad (New Airport as well)

·         In addition, it is only for international flights.

·         Same is also available on website: https://www.bankalfalah.com/personal-banking/cards/privilegesdiscounts/cip-lounge/

 

SBS on Merchant’s QR

Engligh Scrpit

Dear Customer, this is to inform you all that bank launched an SBS installments plan offer on QR. Following are the campaign details.

How to avail SBS installment plan on QR?

 

·         Customer scans the QR at any retailer and selects ‘credit card’ as source of payment

·         Customer selects the desired Credit Card and enters the amount.

·         If transaction amount is more than PKR 3,000. App asks customer about payment in installments

·         If customer selects ‘Yes’, pay in installments screens appears. Customer selects Tenure, clicks the check box

·         After accepting T&Cs, customer will proceed the installment plan

 

Terms and Conditions:

 

·         Pay in installments by scanning QR will only be available for credit card customers (source of payment should be credit card).

·         This is the SBS we are offering at retail location.

·         Customer scan QR via Alfa APP at any retails merchant.

·         Customer can choose any mode of payment but if he wants SBS plan customer need to select credit card.

·         Pay in installments by scanning QR will be available for transaction amount more than PKR 3,000.

·         If the customer chooses to pay in installments, his credit card limit equal to the transaction amount will be locked for the tenure selected by the customer.

·         The customer will receive the confirmation SMS for SBS booking within 3 days.

·         Standard SBS rates (Processing fee, Mark-up Rates & Pre-closure penalty) as per Bank Alfalah’s SOC will apply. https://www.bankalfalah.com/schedule-of-charges/

·         0% interest rate (markup) will be charged. Processing fee will be charged based on tenure and it will appear on screen as well. Processing fee is as follows;

 

Tenure

Processing Fee %

3 Months

6%

6 Months

10%

9 Months

13%

12 Months

18%

 

Urdu Scrpit

Muaziz Saarif, aap ko mutala karne ke liye hai ke bank ne QR par SBS installments plan offer launch kiya hai. Jis ki tafseelat niche di gayi hain.

SBS installment plan QR se kaise hasil karein?

-      Customer QR ko kisi bhi retailer par scan karein aur payment source ke taur par "credit card" ka intikhab karein

-      Customer desired credit card kae baad desired amount select karain

-      Agar transaction ki raqam PKR 3,000 se zyada hai toh app ke zariye customer installments par payment karwa skty hain

-      Agar customer "Yes" ko karengy, toh pay installments screen par appear hoga. Customer tenure select kar ke  checkbox par click karega

-      T&C accept kar ke customer installment plan proceed karega

 

Terms aur Conditions:

 

-      QR scan karke installment par payment sirf credit card ke customers ke liye hai (payment source credit card hona chahiye)

-      SBS retail location par offer kiya ja rha hai

-      Customer Alfa App ke zariye kisi bhi retailer merchant par QR scan kar sakta hai

-      Customer koi bhi payment mode select sakte hain lekin agar woh SBS plan chahte hain toh Customer ko credit card select krna hoga

-      QR scan karke installment par transaction ki rakam PKR 3,000 se zyada honi chahye

-      Agar customer insallment mein ada karna chahta hai, toh uske credit card limit ko tenure ke liye hold kar diya jayega. Customer ko SBS booking ki tasdeeqi SMS 3 din ke andar hasil hojayga

-      Standard SBS rates (Processing fee, Mark-up Rates & Pre-closure penalty) Bank Alfalah ke SOC ke mutabiq lagu honge https://www.bankalfalah.com/schedule-of-charges/

-      0% interest rate (markup) charge kiya jayega. Processing fee tenure ke hisab se charge kiya jayega aur yeh screen par bhi zahir hoga. Processing fees tenure ke sath nechy di gae hain

 

Tenure

Processing Fee %

3 Months

6%

6 Months

10%

9 Months

13%

12 Months

18%

 

Alfa Fee Payments & Donations

Educational Fees Payments

To make a payment for educational fees through the Alfa mobile app, please follow these steps:

·         Launch the Alfa app on your mobile device.

·         Navigate to the "Payments" section within the app.

·         Select the "PayPro" option from the available payment options.

·         Input the "Consumer Number" corresponding to the educational institution you wish to pay fees for

·         Enter the desired payment amount and confirm the payment

CAS School Fee Payments through Alfa

To pay CAS School fees through Alfa:

-         Log in to Alfa app

-         Tap on Payments

-         Tap on 1Link

-         Select Payment Type

-         Enter 1Link Invoice Number

Sindh Club Members

To make club payments for Sindh Club members using Alfa:

-         Login to Alfa app

-         Tap on Payments

-         Tap on PayPro

-         Enter Consumer Number

Bahria University

To pay Bahria University fees through Alfa:

-         Login to the Alfa app

-         Tap on Payments

-         Tap on Fee Payments

-         Select Bahria University as the recipient

-         Enter Consumer Number


Karachi GYMkhana

To pay Karachi Gymkhana fees through Alfa:

-         Login to the Alfa app

-         Tap on Payments

-         Tap on KuickPay

-         Enter the Consumer Number for Karachi Gymkhana

-         Tap on Fetch Details

-         Enter the OTAC (One Time Authorization Code)

-         Submit the details

-         Enter the fee amount

-         Choose payment method

-         Confirm payment details

-         Wait for payment processing and receipt generation

LACAS School Fee

To pay LACAS School fees through Alfa:

-         Login to the Alfa app

-         Tap on Payments

-         Tap on Fee Payments

-         Select LACAS School as the recipient/Institute

-         Enter student ID or name and fee amount

-         Choose payment method

-         Confirm payment details

-         Wait for payment processing and receipt generation

-         Tap on Payments

-         Tap on Fee Payments

-         Select Virtas Learning Circle as the recipient/Institute

-         Enter student ID or name and fee amount

-         Choose payment method

-         Confirm payment details

-         Wait for payment processing and receipt generation

Donate to JDC

To donate to JDC through Alfa:

-         Login to the Alfa app

-         Scan the QR code for JDC

-         Select the preferred payment instrument (e.g. debit/credit card, bank account)

-         Enter the donation amount

-         Confirm the payment details

-         Wait for the payment processing and receipt generation

Al-Khidmat Foundation

To donate to Al-Khidmat Foundation using Bank Alfalah Cash Deposit Machines:

-         Visit a Bank Alfalah Cash Deposit Machine (CDM)

-         Select the "Donation" option on the CDM screen

-         Enter your CNIC number and perform thumb verification

 

 

-         Select Al-Khidmat Foundation as the recipient

-         Enter your mobile number and the desired donation amount

-         Deposit cash into the machine

-         Wait for the confirmation of the successful donation

 

Pay your Zakat online to multiple institutes 

You can donate through Alfa App or Internet Banking

Through Alfa App

·         Login to Alfa

·         Tap on Payments

·         Tap on Donations

·         Select the

Through Internet Banking

·         Login to Internet Banking

·         Click on Service

·         Click on Donations

Bank Alfalah Debit Cards

Debit Card is backed by a customer accounts maintained at Bank Alfalah branches. It is a buy now and pay now option. No monthly repayment, no interest charged. Debit cards are categorized with controlled use of account balance with respect to per day use limit.

Bank Alfalah PayPak Debit Card

Bank Alfalah Paypak Classic Debit Card is locally accepted. The Card is welcomed at all locations displaying the PayPak/1Link/MNet logos on POS terminals. This includes up to 27,000 major establishments in Pakistan. Bank Alfalah Paypak Classic Debit Card can be used to pay for shopping, meals, travel, entertainment, holiday, fuel etc. They are also up to 8,000 ATMs to withdraw cash from your available Bank Account balance. By getting Bank Alfalah Paypak Classic Debit Card, you can access your account at Bank Alfalah from anywhere in Pakistan.

Features & Benefits

The Bank Alfalah Paypak Classic Debit Card offers following key benefits:

·         Dual interface enabled card, supporting NFC (contactless) and Chip & PIN technology

·         Avail unlimited access to your account nationwide with a simple swipe

·         Enjoy sign up bonus of 50 Orbits and 0.25 Orbits on every retail transaction of Rs.100/-

·         Enjoy complete freedom of cash withdrawal and payments wherever you are

·         Local Acceptability

·         No minimum income required

Bank Alfalah VISA Classic Debit Card

Bank Alfalah VISA Classic Debit Card is a plastic payment card that provides the cardholders electronic access to their bank accounts. The card can be used to make purchases at merchant establishments across Pakistan and abroad. It can also be used to withdraw cash from any point where there’s a logo of VISA/Electron/Plus ATM/1 Link ATMs/Mnet.

The card is differentiated based on limits – allows flexibility and control to the customers. The card can be used locally and internationally.

Features & Benefits

·         Dual interface enabled card, supporting NFC (contactless) and Chip & PIN technology

·         Experience 3D secure ecommerce facility

·         Enjoy sign up bonus of 50 Orbits and 0.25 Orbits on every retail transaction of Rs.100/-

·         Avail unlimited access to your account around the world with a simple swipe

·         Enjoy complete freedom of cash withdrawal and payments wherever you are

·         Global Acceptability

·         No minimum income required

Bank Alfalah VISA Signature Debit Card

Bank Alfalah has introduced Pakistan’s first VISA Signature Debit Card, a card for High Net Worth Clients. This card is specially designed for people who love travelling and also are willing to keep a deposit relationship with the bank. It is a card which is top of the line in the debit card product suite and offers unmatched features and benefits. There are two variants for Signature:

·         Conventional – offered through all Bank Alfalah Conventional Branches

The premier and conventional versions are differentiated based on their Fees. For updated charges, please refer to the Bank Schedule of Charges

Global concierge services:

We are available and dedicated 24/7, to prioritizing your lifestyle needs.

Discounts:

You can enjoy a 30% discount at over 250 fine dining and shopping partners both locally and internationally.

Complimentary insurance:

Avail protection and extended warranty on your purchases along with insured travel plans.

Features & Benefits

The Bank Alfalah VISA Signature Debit Card offers 6 key benefits FREE OF CHARGE:

·         Dual interface enabled card, supporting NFC (contactless) and Chip & PIN technology

·         Experience 3D secure ecommerce facility

·         Enjoy sign up bonus of 400 Orbits and 0.40 Orbits on every retail transaction of Rs.100/-

·         Unlimited and Complimentary Access to over 650 lounges worldwide

·         Upto 30% discount at over 250+ restaurants and lifestyle partners worldwide

·         Unmatched benefits at over 900 Prestigious Hotels Worldwide

·         Peace of mind with purchase protection, extended warranty & travel inconvenience coverage

·         Higher transactional limits which give you the flexibility to be in complete control of your spending needs

Bank Alfalah Signature Debit Card

Eligibility

Dear Customer, Bank Alfalah VISA Signature Debit Card will be offered to new customers based on opening an account in the branch with minimum of PKR 1 million deposit. For existing customer, average 12 months’ balance in the account should equal PKR 1 million.

Bank Alfalah Pehchaan Debit Card

Bank Alfalah Pehchaan Debit Card is especially designed to empower women and help them take charge of their lives. The carefully crafted, customized plastic design is a reflection of individualism, strength and “Pehchaan” which the Bank Alfalah Pehchaan Debit Card aspires to empower women with.

Bank Alfalah Pehchaan Debit Card is a plastic payment card that provides the cardholders electronic access to their bank accounts. The card can be used to make purchases at merchant establishments across Pakistan and abroad. It can also be used to withdraw cash from any point where there’s a logo of VISA/Electron/Plus ATM/1 Link ATMs/Mnet.

The card is differentiated based on limits – allows greater flexibility to the customers for usage both locally and internationally. This card can only be issued with Alfalah Pehchaan Account.

Features & Benefits

·         Dual interface enabled card, supporting NFC (contactless) and Chip & PIN technology

·         Experience 3D secure ecommerce facility

·         Enjoy sign up bonus of 100 Orbits and 0.25 Orbits on every retail transaction of Rs.100/-

·         Avail unlimited access to your account around the world with a simple swipe

·         Enjoy complete freedom of cash withdrawal and payments wherever you are

Bank Alfalah VISA Credit Cards

Welcome to the world of Bank Alfalah VISA Classic Credit Card! As a Bank Alfalah VISA Classic Credit Card member, you can enjoy numerous benefits and privileges. This card is designed for customers who are predominately young and salaried. They prefer a free card.

Features & Benefits

Global Reach and Acceptability

The Bank Alfalah Credit Card carries the Visa logo, hence ensuring worldwide acceptability at more than 30 million establishments and ATMs worldwide.

Exclusive Discounts

When we claim to make you enjoy life today, we truly fulfill that promise. Alfalah Credit Cards opens a world of exciting discounts whether for shopping, fine dining, or world class travelling. Click here for our ongoing discounts and promotions.

Fablous Rewards

Use your Credit Card and earn Orbits.

 

SBS installment Plans

Our ongoing SBS instalment Plan promotions allow you to purchase countless home and lifestyle products through your Alfalah Silver Credit Card and repay the transaction amount in Equal Monthly instalment (EMI). You can choose tenures of 3,6,12,18,24,30 and 36 months for repayment. Click here https://www.bankalfalah.com/personal-banking/cards/instalment-products/step-by-step-instalment-plans for our ongoing instalment Plan offerings. You can also convert any of your retail transaction of Rs. 3,000 and above into an instalment Plan.

Cash Advance

Bank Alfalah Credit Card’s cash advance facility allows you to withdraw instant cash from any Bank Alfalah branch across Pakistan and at any ATM worldwide, displaying VISA and 1link logo. The service charges for cash advance will be applied from the day of the transaction. A cash advance fee will also apply for each cash withdrawal.

Supplementary Credit Cards

You can share the benefits and privileges of your Bank Alfalah Credit Card with your loved ones. The Bank Alfalah Credit Card offers you up to 6 supplementary cards. Any individual with a minimum age of 13 years is eligible to become a supplementary cardholder.

World Cup Campaign

Dear Customer, this is to inform you that Bank Alfalah has the launched World Cup Campaign. Customer just needs to follow the below journey to participate.

 

User journey via Alfa

·         Customer needs to login Alfa app

·         The two teams playing will be visible on main screen (below the banners or instead of the banners)

·         Consumer can vote on whichever team they predict is going to win until the match start

 Points Criteria

·         Tapping on a team will qualify the customer to be a part of this campaign

·         Maximum 5 transactional points can be awarded to a customer per match

 Points Calculation

·         Points will be rewarded on the basis of transaction type only if customer has participated in selecting the team on the day one point will be rewarded against each type of transactions

·         5 types of transactions which are included in the Campaign are as under:

 

1.    Send money

2.    Utility Bill payment

3.    Bundles/ Top up

4.    Credit Card payment

5.    TDR

 

Terms and Conditions

·         Transactional points will be rewarded on the basis of transaction type only if customer has participated in selecting the team irrespective of whether or not the selected team wins. Transaction done on the day of match or on the day of voting will be counted

·         Without selecting the team, transactional points will not be rewarded

·         Customer with the highest number of points will win up to 500,000 orbits at the end of the campaign

·         In the case of multiple users with the same number of highest points, the reward will be equally divided

·         Bonus orbits will be awarded, on top of 500,000 orbits, for matches played by Pakistan team and for the semi-final and final matches. (10K orbits for Pakistan group stage matches, 25K for Semi-finals and 50K for the Final).

·         In case of more than 10K, 25K, 50K winners for bonus orbits, the first 10K, 25K or 50K voters will be rewarded the equal number of orbits

·         A minimum of 1 orbit will be awarded to the winner according to the criteria mentioned above

·         Winners can be awarded orbits up to 2 decimals

·         Alfalah reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to terminate, amend or extend, modify, add or remove portions of these T&Cs or the module, at any time by updating these T&Cs. The Customers shall be bound by any such revisions and should therefore periodically view Terms and Conditions accordingly

·         Alfalah reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to disqualify any participant that tampers or attempts to tamper with the competition or violates the T&Cs in any manner

·         Voting results will be updated within 24 working hours

·         Orbits will be rewarded in 10 working days

·         When match is abandoned, no points will be rewarded

·         Campaign will be expired on 17th Nov 2022.

·         Any teams can be selected.

·         Wallet and Islamic customers are not included in the campaign

Alfa Term Deposit (Alfa TDR)

Alfa Term Deposit

With Alfa Term Deposit, you can easily fix a savings amount for 1 month, 3 months, 6 months, or 12 months duration and earn profit on a monthly basis or at the time of completion of your chosen duration, as per the Bank’s prevailing rate sheet for PKR Term Deposit. You can easily book a Term deposit digitally, anytime, anywhere – without having to go to a branch. Simply download & login to Alfa app, go to ‘Savings’ section, and tap on ‘Alfa Term Deposit’

Booking In Just 10 Seconds through ALFA (Available on Android & iOS) Alfa > Savings > Alfa Term Deposit

Product Features

1. Instant Term Deposit booking

2. Real time Early encashment

3. Option to update maturity instructions

4. Booking confirmation through a downloadable digital term deposit receipt

5. Booking from as low as Rs.500 & up to Rs.10 Million per customer

6. Special rate sheet for Alfa Term Deposits will apply

7. Option to view Term deposit rate sheet during booking

 8. Online submission of Zakat exemption form

9. Visibility of Withholding Tax Certificate

Customer Journey

1. Download & Login on Alfa app

2. Go to “Savings” section

3. Tap on “Alfa Term Deposit”

4. Click on “Book a Term Deposit” for investing in Term Deposits

5. Click on “My Term Deposit” for Tracking and much more.

Book a Term Deposit

1. Select Account Details

2. Enter Booking Amount

3. Select Tenor of investment

a)    1 Month

b)    3 Months

c)     6 Months

d)    12 Months

4. Select Profit Payment Frequency

a)    Monthly

b)    At Maturity

5. Select Instructions on Maturity

a.    Encash at Maturity

b.    Rollover Principal Only

c.     Rollover Principal + Profit

6. Zakat Exemption (Muslim/Non-Muslim)

My Term Deposit

1. Early Encashment with rate revision penalty as per Bank’s SOC

2. Flexibility of changing Maturity Instructions post booking

3. WHT Certificate showing profit paid and Tax deducted

4. Term Deposit Receipt and visibility of all TDRs booked via Alfa

Extra

Difference b/w Islamic and Conventional Account

Conventional Banking

Bank Alfalah offers a comprehensive deposit product suite designed to meet the diverse needs of our customers. Our deposit products include a range of interest and non-interest bearing accounts aimed at providing daily banking services through our vast branch network, transactional privileges and self-service digital banking solutions.

Islamic Banking

Bank Alfalah Islamic Banking offers a wide range of Shariah-compliant deposit accounts. These include basic banking accounts, term deposits, foreign currency and structured savings products, all designed while observing Shariah principles.

Conventional Banking

Islamic Banking

Bank Alfalah offers a comprehensive deposit product suite designed to meet the diverse needs of our customers. Our deposit products include a range of interest and non-interest bearing accounts aimed at providing daily banking services through our vast branch network, transactional privileges and self-service digital banking solutions.

Bank Alfalah Islamic Banking offers a wide range of Shariah-compliant deposit accounts. These include basic banking accounts, term deposits, foreign currency and structured savings products, all designed while observing Shariah principles.

 

Difference b/w Current & Saving Account

Current Account: it is a bank account that you can take money from at any time and that usually earns no interest.

Saving Account: it is an account that allows you to store cash securely and also you to earn interest on your money.

 

Alfalah Debit Card

The Alfalah Debit Card is a plastic payment card providing cardholders electronic access to their bank accounts. They can use it for purchases at numerous merchant establishments across Pakistan and abroad, and also for withdrawing cash from ATMs displaying the following logos: VISA | Electron | Plus | 1-Link | MNET.

Alfalah Credit Card

The Alfalah Credit Card boasts the largest circulation in Pakistan and is accepted globally. Cardholders get an unsecured line of credit, which they may use and then pay back the Bank later. The Card may be used at locations displaying the VISA*, MasterCard*, American Express*, 1-Link, Union Pay, and +Plus logos. Core target customers for Alfalah Credit Cards include salaried (government and private) and self-employed individuals who meet the eligibility criteria.

Alfalah Internet Banking

 Now our customers do not need a debit card to sign up and transact from an online account. They can sign up for Alfalah Internet Banking and access it online from anywhere, anytime. They can log in at bankalfalah.com.

Alfa is Bank Alfalah’s mobile banking app that can be downloaded to any smartphone from the App Store for iOS users or the Play Store for Android users. If the customer is already an Alfalah Internet Banking user, he/she can use the same credentials to log on to Alfa.

Be cautious

Dear Customer, Bank Alfalah will never call you from it's UAN helpline 021 111-225-111 or any other number to ask you for your login ID/CNIC/Verification/password/PIN/OTP/Card Number/CVV/Card Expiry date. Kindly do not share such information with anyone.

There is no IFSC code but swift code, which is ALFHPKKAXXX.

Routing code is required for outward payments to US instead of incoming wire to Pakistan.

You Must Know

What happens if you do not use this account for a long period?

English Script

If an account remains inactive for 12 months or more, it will be considered as dormant. During this period, no withdrawal will be allowed until the account is reactivated. Dormant account can be reactivated by providing the required documentation and fulfilling the necessary formalities as per bank's policy.

Urdu Script

Agar kisi account par 12 mahine se zyada tak koi debit ya credit transaction na ho to wo account dormant hojata hai. Is muddat ke doran jab tak account ko dobara re-activate na kiya jaye, koi bhi withdrawal allow nahi hota hai. Dromant account ko bank ki policy ke mutabiq reactivate kar skty hain is ke lye apni branch ya qaareebi branch visit kjiye.

English Script

To reactivate a deactivated account, a customer must visit the bank in person and request reactivation in writing at their concerned branch or any other Bank Alfalah branch. They will also need to provide their original SNIC/CNIC/Passport/Pakistan Origin Card (POC)/ National Identity as a proof of identity.

Urdu Script

Deactivated account ko reactivate karwany ke lye, customer ko in person branch visit kar ke account reactivation ki request deni hogi. Mazeed customer ko apna original original SNIC/CNIC/Passport/Pakistan Origin Card (POC)/ National Identity dena hoga.

Average Accont Balance

Dear Customer, according to banking terminologies, average monthly balance or AMB is the average amount that you must keep in your account every month. A maintenance charge is levied if the account's average monthly balance is not maintained (i.e Rs 5000 for current accounts). The amount is computed at the end of each month.

1. Withholding tax Implementation on IBFT remittances

This is to inform you that deduction of Withholding tax on IBFT remittances (i.e. commercial remittances) will be implemented to customers from now onwards for the fiscal year (i.e. from July 2021 – June 2022) against export services related to IT and other than IT services. As per the taxation department charges are mentioned below:

 

Revised withholding tax rates are as below:

·         0.25% for services related to IT services

·         1% for services related to other than IT services

2. DCC Transactions - Charging OIF and Exchange Rate:

Starting on January 1, 2023, customers who use their credit or debit cards for online or point-of-sale international transactions that are settled in a foreign currency will be charged a Market Adjustment Fee, as per SOCs. This fee is intended to account for the difference between the rate offered by the card networks and the open market exchange rate, and will be applied to all such transactions. The fee is known as DCC and is used to cover the cost of providing DCC service and ensure that customers are charged a fair and transparent rate for the DCC transaction.

3.Market Adjustment Charges on DCC Transactions:

The market adjustment rate is the difference between the merchant rate (i.e. the rate charged by Visa, MasterCard, American Express) and the open market rate that will be charged to customers for Dynamic Currency Conversion (DCC) transactions starting on January 1, 2023. DCC is a service that allows customers to pay in their own currency, rather than the local currency, when making a purchase at a foreign merchant. The market adjustment rate is used to account for any difference between the merchant rate and the open market rate, so that customers are charged a fair and transparent rate for the DCC transaction.

4. How the market adjustment fee is calculated on DCC transactions:

For example:

Customer performs a DCC transaction of PKR 950. The scheme rate, provided by Visa, MasterCard, or American Express, is $1 = PKR 226.25. However, the bank procurement rate, or the rate at which the bank buys dollars from the open market, is $1 = PKR 243.82.

In this case, the scheme will divide the transaction amount by the scheme provided rate (950/226.25) which results in an extra $4.2 that needs to be paid by the bank. However, since the bank has to buy dollars from the open market for settlement at a rate of PKR 243.82, the amount paid is higher in PKR terms (243.82 x 4.2 = PKR 1024.044).

To cover this additional cost, the bank will charge the customer the difference amount (PKR 1024.044 - PKR 950 = PKR 73.77) as a market adjustment fee. This fee is intended to ensure that the customer is aware of the cost of the DCC service and the cost of the transaction and that they are charged a fair and transparent rate.

Procurement rate refers to the rate at which a bank buys a foreign currency from the open market to settle international transactions.

Scheme rate refers to the rate set by card networks like Visa, MasterCard or Amex for transactions on their network.

Delivery of Cheque Book/Debit Card in Pakistan through Any Branch

Customer may request BAFL to deliver his/her Cheque Book/VDebit Card in any branch in Pakistan if customer is present in Pakistan.
